117a3(mdo sde): po la gnod pa dang / btsun mo la gnod par 'gyur ro// skar mda' rgyal gyis song la/ dud bas tshogs pa lta bu dgra can byung na/ yul de'i sgra can du byung na/ yul
117a4(mdo sde): de'i 'khor ma rung bar 'gyur ro// srod la skar mda' byung na bkra shis so// / skar mda'i ri bong gis khrag ltar dmar bar snang bar 'bar ba/ lhang na rgyal po dang dam
117a5(mdo sde): dpon la gnod do// skar mda' mtshan mo zla ba la phog gam/ nyin par nyi ma la phog mi'i bgag po zla ba 'am/ skar mda' la mos par byed pa de 'chi'o// skar rab
117a6(mdo sde): tu 'bar bas gza' 'am/ rgya skar mngon par phog na/ de la mos pa rnams la rung bar 'gyur ro// nyin par skar mda' me'i 'od lta bur ltung na/ yul 'khor gyis dbang po dang /
117a7(mdo sde): yul du bcas te rnam par 'jig go// yul gyis gang du skar mda' sgra grags par byung na/ yul der rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rkun po'i drag shul snang bar 'gyur ro//
117a8(mdo sde): nam mkha' las sgra byung ba'i ltas kyis mtshan ma bstan pa/ rlung gnyis phan mtshan nas phrad pa las gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra byung ste/ de yang sa las babs pa dang /
117b1(mdo sde): gyen du 'byung ba dang / thung ngu dang rgyal ring po khong du chud par bya'o// nyi ma rtse la sgra byung na/ rgyal rigs la gnod do// snga gro sgra byung na rmang rigs la gnod do// nyi ma/
117b2(mdo sde): phyed kyis che na sgra byung na/ bram ze'i sde la gnod do// nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyis tshe sgra byung na/ rje'u rigs kyis tshogs la gnod do// nyi ma nub ka'i dus kyis tshe sgra byung na/
117b3(mdo sde): rigs ngan rnams la gnod do// nam gyis bzhi mthun gyis thor ngas sgra byung na/ lo la gnod do// mtshan gyis gung la sgra byung na ni/ srin po mang po phung bar 'gyur ro//
117b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' ban bun la sgra byung na/ glang po che dang / rta ma rung bar byed do// nam langs nas sgra byung na/ 'dron po la gnod do// sgra byung ba thung ba dal na/ gnod pa chung ngur
117b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// sgra ring du song ba dang / 'jigs pa 'byung ngo // dus gsum gang yang rung ba'i 'tshams su sgra byang phyogs logs su ltung na/ bram ze dam pa 'chi bar
117b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rgyu skar gyis tshegs/ gang gis nyi ma la sgra byung na/ de la rten pa'i bram ze gang yin pa la gnod do// bden brim bral gyis phyogs nas sgra byung
117b7(mdo sde): drag shul gyis las byed pa la gnod do// rlung gis phyogs nas sgra byung na/ mtha' khob kyis lho bal la gnod do// me'i phyogs nas sgra byung na/ me tsha ba las gnod do//
117b8(mdo sde): phyogs ring du sgra 'byin pa der ni/ dpa'o rnams dang / sbrul po che la gnod do// nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'khyim pa'i ltas kyis bye brag bstan pa/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od dang /
118a1(mdo sde): til mar
118a2(mdo sde): rlung dang / gcig tu 'dres pa las byung ba ni/ 'od khyim pa zhes bya'o// de la mar dang / chu dang dngul dang / 'o ma dang / thi ba lta bu'i kha dog du
118a3(mdo sde): khyim na/ char pa 'bab po// bong bu dang rnga mo dang / shing rta lta bu'i khyim pa las rab tu zhig ste/ rnam par gyes shing kha dog ngan par snang na/ mi dge bar 'gyur ro//
118a4(mdo sde): nyi ma dang / zla ba gnyis ka nyin mtshan du 'od 'khyim pa rtag tu 'gro na/ bcing ba dang / mtshon dang / nad 'byung ngo // ba bzhin du 'khyims na/ chu mngon par skye'o//
118a5(mdo sde): 'ja' 'dra ba'i dbyibs su 'khyim ni/ mtshon mang po 'byung ngo // rdul 'dra bar 'khyim na/ mu ge 'byung ngo // sum rim du 'khyim na/ grong dang rgyal po la mi
118a6(mdo sde): dge bo// rgya skyegs gis khu ba dang / zho mdog 'dra bar khyims na/ 'thab mo dang / g.yul 'byung ngo // ser por 'khyims na/ yul 'khor gsum du khags
118a7(mdo sde): par ston// skye bo dang ldang sngon du 'khyims na sbrum ma 'chi bo// nor 'dra ba'i phyi ma dang / sum tsha'i dum bu zhig 'khyims na/ char pa bral du 'bab po// mtshan dus gsum
118a8(mdo sde): du 'khyim na/ grong mi dang / rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma gsum gyi bar du 'jam zhing snum par 'khyims na/ 'char ba 'bab po rtsug por 'khyims na/ zla ba gcig na 'ji
118a9(mdo sde): pa 'byung bar ston to// skar ma dang gzi' thog tu 'khyims pas gnod na/ rang gis mthus las byung ba'i 'bras bur bstan par bya'o// / 'ja' zug pa'i ltas
118b1(mdo sde): kyis mtshan ma bstan pa/ rlung dang sprin dang / nyi ma'i 'od las byung ba ni 'ja' zhes bya'o// 'jig tshon sna tshogs su snang na char 'bab bo// chu'i nang du zug na char rab tu che'i/
118b2(mdo sde): tshon dkar po la sogs pa ni/ bram ze la sogs pa la gnod do// ser skye dang me'i mdogs pa dang / me tog rma zang zang rtsa ser ba lta bu'i 'ja' zug na/ yul du 'jig
118b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// 'ja sngon por zug na/ lo ma rung bar 'gyur ro// 'dzi'i dbus nyi tshe zhig chags mi zad par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na rgyal po la
118b4(mdo sde): gnod/ nub phyogs su mtshan mo 'ja' zug na/ mi gtso bo la gnod do// char pa 'bab pa de'i tshe 'ja' zug na/ char chad do// char mi 'bab pa de'i tshe 'ja' zug na
118b5(mdo sde): char 'bab po// shar phyogs su 'ja' zug na char 'bab bo// lha phyogs su la sogs pa phyogs gsum du 'ja' zug na/ bram ze la sogs pa la mchod pa 'odang ngo //
118b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du lho phyogs su 'ja' zug na/ rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang rmang rigs la gnod do// dus gsum gyis 'tshams su 'ja' zug na/ yul 'jig par byed
118b7(mdo sde): do/ nyi ma'i rtse la lho phyogs su 'ja' zug na/ 'tshems su 'ja' zug na/ bud med ma rung bar 'gyur ro// lan gnyis su 'ja' zug na bde ba 'phel ba dang /
118b8(mdo sde): lo legs par 'gyur ro// tshes grang bzang po dang / rgyu skar bzang po dang / yud tsam dang / byed pa dang / gza' bza' po dang / rgyu skar khyim dang / skabs bzang
118b9(mdo sde): mi la 'jig pa yongs do/
119a1(mdo sde): ma dad 'ama'ar
119a2(mdo sde): po'i tshe 'ja' zug na dge' bas ste/ rgyal po'i srid skye/ rkun po spa bskod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyi 'dra ba dang / dbyug pa 'dra ba dang / dri
119a3(mdo sde): za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / phyogs tshig pa dang bcas par snang ba yang / tshul gong ma dang 'dra bar tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang gza' la sogs pa bzang ngan gyis tshul gong na/
119a4(mdo sde): ma za bar rtogs pa'i mis shes par bya'o// de lta bu snang bar gyur pa de'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du char 'bab pa na/ zhi ba yin legs par 'gyur ro//
119a5(mdo sde): sa g.yos pa'i ltas kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa/ de la chos ma yin pa'i mthu las byung ba'i dus su skar ma drag shul can dang / yud tsam dang / zang cig dang / tshes grangs/
119a6(mdo sde): dang mi bzad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yos na/ skye bo thams cad kyis phun gsum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro// tshes grangs bzang po las g.yos na/ rab
119a7(mdo sde): tu dge ba zhes bya'o// skar ma tshes grangs la sogs pa bzang ngan 'dres pa'i tshe sa g.yos na/ phan gnod kyis 'bras bu yang 'dres mar 'byung ngo // tshes grangs bzang po la
119a8(mdo sde): sa g.yos na/ skye bo'i chos legs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// sa g.yos bzhin du yul gzhan du song na/ yul der gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ste/ de yang chos
119a9(mdo sde): nyams pa'i nyes pa ma byas na/ sa g.yos kyang legs par 'gyur te/ de dag tu char 'bab cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnam lcags rnon pos lhung ba'i sgra drag pos sa rab
119b1(mdo sde): tu g.yos na/ skye bo 'thab cing khon pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas kyis zas par 'gyur ro// sa g.yo' ba g.yas phyogs su 'gro zhing 'brug sgra ltar gnyen zhing zab pa'i sgra grags la/
119b2(mdo sde): dus tshigs dang / tshes grangs bzang ba la ma 'khrul ba'i/ skabs su sa g.yos na dge bar 'gyur ro// nam gza' skar drag po'i dus su sa g.yos pa'i dus na/ ri dgas dang /
119b3(mdo sde): bya rnams me 'bar ba bzhin du gyur la/ gzhan yang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma'i ltas dag snang na/ 'jig rten du gnod pa drag po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dang gza' dge ba'i
119b4(mdo sde): dus su yang de ltar gyur na/ de'i tshe dge ba'i 'bras bu dge bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i ltas kyis mtshan ma byung la/ bya rnams kyang khrag khrig lang long med cing / rab tu zhi ba dang
119b5(mdo sde): rlung yang zhi bar gyur pa ni/ de ba bas kyang rab tu dge ba zhes bya ste/ mi dga' ba'i ltas ngan drag po yang zhi bar 'gyur ro// sa g.yos pa'i 'og tu gal te char pa 'bab
119b6(mdo sde): na/ de'i bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nad med par 'gyur ro// sa g.yos pa'i rjes la skar mda' chen po ltung bar gyur na/ de'i tshe skye bo ltogs pa dang / mtshon dang
119b7(mdo sde): nad kyi zad par 'gyur ro// nam sa g.yos pa'i rjes pa/ rlung drag po la ngas pas bsam khyir bzhin 'gro bar gyur pa'i che na/ mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sa g.yo'i zhing
119b8(mdo sde): 'gro ba dang / rlung ldang ba dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od rnams dang / 'di rnams mthun par 'gro na bkra shis te dge'o// de lta bu'i mthun par mi 'gro zhings g.yon mi dge ste/
120a1(mdo sde): smad pa yin no// zla ba byed rnying lan gsum g.yos pa/ zla ba gcig la spyir sa drug g.yos par gyur na/ dgra'i tshogs 'ong bar ston to// yug
120a2(mdo sde): gang du g.yo ba der rdung par yang dang yang zhag gcig gam/ zhag bdun/ zhag bcu gcig gam/ zla ba phyed dam/ zla ba re re zhing g.yo 'am/ zla ba drug du 'am/ zla ba
120a3(mdo sde): bcu 'am/ lo bcu'i bar du 'am/ de bas kyang lhag par lan mang du g.yos sam/ de lam nyid 'gyur du sa g.yos/ yul phun gsum tshogs par/ dang ldan pa'i rgyal
120a4(mdo sde): por/ dmag dang 'khor du bcas pa ma rung bar 'gyur/ yul der rgyal po gzhan byed de/ de yang yul der rab tu 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed pas/ yul de nyid dgon par
120a5(mdo sde): gyur nas/ ri dag gnas par 'gyur ro// tshul gong ma bzhin du dpyid zla tha chung la g.yos na/ gnod pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu na 'byung ngo // dbyer rna ba g.yos na/ rnam
120a6(mdo sde): par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag bcu gnyis na 'byung ngo // dbyar bla 'bring po la g.yos na/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag nyi shu rtsa lnga na 'byung ngo // dbyar tha chung la
120a7(mdo sde): g.yos na/ 'bras bu bdun bcu rtsa lngan 'byung ngo // ston zla ra ba la sa g.yos na/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag brgyad nas 'byung ngo // ston zla 'bring po la g.yos
120a8(mdo sde): na/ 'bras bu zla ba gnyis na 'byung ngo // ston zla ba chung la g.yos na 'bras bu zla ba gsum na 'byung ngo // gun zla ra ba la sa g.yos na/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhag
120b1(mdo sde): brgyad nas 'byung ngo // dgun zla 'bring po la sa g.yos na/ 'bras bu zhag lnga bcu rtsa ldan 'byung ngo // dgun zla chung la g.yos na/ 'bras bu zhag brgyad na 'byung ngo //
120b2(mdo sde): dpyid zla ra ba la sa g.yos na/ zhag lnga bcu rtsa gsum na/ 'bras bu 'byung bar skar mkhan gyis blar bya'o// de ltar sa g.yos pa'i 'bras bu ni/ de ltar bstan pa yin no//
120b3(mdo sde): de ltar zla ba'i mig kyang sa g.yos pa'i dmigs kyang / yar gyis tshes gcig dang / mar gyis tshes nyi shu gsum dang / yar gyis tshes bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dang
120b4(mdo sde): nyi shu dgu dang / gsum bcu ste/ dus tshigs 'di rnams lta bu'i dus su/ su g.yos pa'i 'bras bu ni tshul de ltar lta'o// nam zla bcu gnyis kyis ngo kun la/ sa rtag
120b5(mdo sde): par g.yos te/ shing yang 'gul/ chu yang g.yos te/ mer mer byed cing de ltar dus tshigs ma yin par g.yos te/ rlung langs pas/ shing yang bcas/ grong dang
120b6(mdo sde): grong khyer dang / grong 'dabs dang / grong de na rten pa'i skye bo rnams med par gyur te/ gcan zan gyis zil gyi non nas/ yul 'phrog du gyur te/ de ltar sa g.yos pa ni//
120b7(mdo sde): gnod pa'i 'bras bu lo bco lnga na yul phyogs der su yang mi gnas par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar smin drug gis nyi ma la sag yos na/ grong khyer ma la brtad mar shor te/
120b8(mdo sde): shing rtsi yang tshig gos nag po gyon po'i sde dang / nor bu mkhan rnams dang / 'gar ba dang / bram ze mi 'byin pa'i spyod byed pa rnams la mi dger/ 'byung khyangs nas/ nor
121a1(mdo sde): bu dbyung ba rnams dang / 'phel ba rnams kyang srubs par 'gyur/ yul de na rten pa'i ba glang ba rnams dang / shing rta la 'dren pa'i mi dang / bram
121a2(mdo sde): ze dang / 'breg mkhan pu dro'i las byed pa dang / yul der sil 'du zhes bya ba'i yul gyis mi dang / yul a ma pa dang / yul chu klung lnga zhes bya ba na gnas pa'i mi dang /
121a3(mdo sde): yul shi ba'i ba zhes bya ba dang / yul pa si ti zhes bya ba dang / yul pra ta la zhes bya ba dang / yul rta la d+ha na zhes bya ba dang / yul gang khrod na gnas pa rnams dang / lho phyo
121a4(mdo sde): kyis lung pa na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ltar sa g.yos pas gzi' brjid nyams te/ nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur/ than chen dang / ma rkun dang /
121a5(mdo sde): pha rol gyis dgra rnams kyis gnod pa drag po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar snang ma'i nyin mo sa g.yos na/ sa bon thams cad chung zos par 'gyur te/ sa la 'bra btabs
121a6(mdo sde): yang mi skye/ de dang 'dra bar rtsa yang dkon na/ nags khrod nas chung zad cig 'khrung ba yang dkon no// bud med sbrum ma rnams kyis rum rab tu mi bde/ mu ge dang / mtshon dang
121a7(mdo sde): nad kyis zad de/ skye bo sum ca gcig gnas par 'gyur ro// mi'i dbang po chen po'i bdag nyid can can dang / dpal dang ldan pa'i mi mchog rnams dang / bram ze gzing
121a8(mdo sde): brjid can mang po dang / ba glang phyug pa dbang dang ldan pa dang / yul ba'i pa sha dang / yul sha ta ru dang / yul sil 'du dang / i yul an dang / chu bo 'di nyi ti'i 'gran
121b1(mdo sde): na gnas pa dang / chu bo e ra ba ti'i 'gram na gnas pa dang / yul ku ta na gnas pa'i mi dang / chu bo can tra ba ga gnas pa'i mi dang / chu bo su dan zhes 'byung ba dang /
121b2(mdo sde): chu bo 'di dag gis 'gram na gnas pa'i mi dang / chu bo 'di dag gas 'gram na gnas pa'i mi dang / yul nags 'grogs chu dang ldan pa dang / chu bo a tro ta dang / se ra sa ti
121b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / yul sa pra rta zhes zhes bya ba rnams dang / ra bdog pa'i gtso bo zhes bya ba dang / 'di rnams sa bzhi g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
121b4(mdo sde): rgyu skar mgo'i nyi ma la sa g.yos na/ sman pa rnam dang / nang spang byed pa'i sman pa rnams dang / tsa so ma zhes bya ba la skoms du sbyar te/ zung ba'i chos bzhin byed pa rnams dang
121b5(mdo sde): tsA so ma sgoms du mthung ba rnams dang / bram ze nag khrod na gnas shing dka' thub byed pa rnams la mi rung bar 'gyur/ yul dbus ma da tser char 'bebs te/ lo legs par
121b6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bde bar 'gyur/ rgyal po nang phan tshun mi mthun te/ rtsod par 'gyur/ yul a b+hi sha ha'i mi dang / yul shur se na dang / chu bo tshar ma na ti na gnas pa dang /
121b7(mdo sde): yul ka la'i dang / yul bang sa'i mi dang / yul ban tsa la'i lho phyogs dang / yul mA g+nanas pa'i mi dang / mi la gnod par 'gyur ro// yul su la'i mi dang /
121b8(mdo sde): yul be sha la'i mi dang / yul ma la zhes bya ba'i 'khor mi dang / 'di rnams la gnod pa rnam pa drug 'byung ste/ chom rkun dang / mes 'jigs pa dang / mings dang / zan
122a1(mdo sde): chen la sogs pa dang / khyad zhugs pa'i gnod pa rnams kyis skye bo zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar lag la sa g.yos na/
122a2(mdo sde): shing 'o ma can rnams dang / 'o ma ma rung bar 'gyur/ zan skoms phyogs su ma rung bar 'gyur/ 'drin po rnams dang / gcan zan dang / rgyal mo thogs ma'i nya 'chor
122a3(mdo sde): ba la sogs pa rnams dang / 'obs rko zhing khron pa rko ba dang / sdig pa'i las can rkun po rnams dang / gdol po dang / yul shar phyogs dang / yul pun da par rta dang /
122a4(mdo sde): mu stegs gcer pu pa dang / yul o tra dang / yul pi li na'i da'i mi dang / yul sha ba ri'i mi rnams dang / nag 'brog chu dang / ldan pa'i a ta so ka zhes bya ba dang /
122a5(mdo sde): yul gzhan yang de dang 'dra ba/ chu dang ldan pa'i nag 'brog kyang gnod pa drag po mi bde ba sna tshogs/ rnam drug gis gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyung ro// /
122a6(mdo sde): rgyu skar nams so'i nyi ma la sa g.yos na/ chang tsheng dang / gsal shing dang / mtshon thogs pa'i mi dang / khur ba mchod pa'i mi dang / gdugs phyed pa'i mi dang /
122a7(mdo sde): shing mkhan rnams dang / mi gsod pa'i gshed pa rnams dang / ga tsas dang / 'gro ba'i tshong pa rnams dang / 'khor lo byed pa dang / 'khor lo bslob pa rnams dang /
122a8(mdo sde): lhang tsher thags cing sbyor ba dang / sha mchong dang / dung mchong dang / grong na gnas pa'i tshong pa dang / gang dag skye bo phal po che dang / lhan cig gnas pas tshong pa dang / tshul
122b1(mdo sde): gcan rnams dang / phal cher babs pas lo la yang gnod par 'gyur/ rgyal po dang / lho ga'i gnas na gnas pa'i rgyal phran rnams dang / rgyal phran de dag la phyogs
122b2(mdo sde): sa'i yul mi rnams dang / yul gyis mchog dang / to ka zhes bya ba dang / mon yul ka ma run gnas pa'i mi de rnams dang / spyang ki mang po rnams la sA g+harlod par 'gyuraro//
122b3(mdo sde): rgyu skar rgyal gyis nyi ma la sa g.yos na/ mi dge ba byas pa dang / bram ze dam pa dang / rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams dang / rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu dang / dpon
122b4(mdo sde): sna phra mo dang / mi mang po'i tshogs dang / blon po dang / dge slong rnams dang / sprang po dang / bram ze dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / chos la rab tu brtson pa rnams dang /
122b5(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po byed pa'i mi rnams dang la gnod par 'gyur ro// de ltar shar phyogs dang / yul ta ma lib ta'i grong rdal dang / shar phyogs dang gling du mar ti pa dang /
122b6(mdo sde): mon yul ka ma ru pa dang / shar phyogs kyis rgya mtsho'i gling na gnas pa nas/ gling pa dang / gser gyis gling na gnas pa dang / chu bo 'aka' rgya mtsho'i gling na gnas pa
122b7(mdo sde): dang / 'gram na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod par 'gyuraro// // rgyu skar skags kyis nyi ma las g.yos na/ klu rnams dang / sbrul rnams dang / dug sbrul rnams dang /
122b8(mdo sde): grog ma rnams dang / grol mo mang po rnams dang / srin bu sna tshogs dang / khyim dang thig ma gcig pa rnams dang / dug sbyor zhing byed pa'i mi rnams dang / sems can
122b9(mdo sde): dug rnam dang
123a1(mdo sde): gang dag ri khrod na gnas pa'i rnams dang / yul mtha' khob na rku phrog byed cing 'joms pa'i mi rnams dang / zos pa dang / rku thabs/
123a2(mdo sde): kyis thab mo 'gyed pa'i mi rnams dang / sdig pa'i las dga' ba'i mi rnams dang / mi blun po rnams dang / mi ngan pa rnams dang / tshig ngan pa smra ba rnams dang /
123a3(mdo sde): yul to sa la dang / yul ko sa la dang / grong khyer kan tsi dang / yul ling ga dang / yul an 'dra dang / yul an 'dra'i byang phyogs dang / yul yang ma'i
123a4(mdo sde): grong rdal nyams dga' ba dang / ri b+hir d+ha dang / ri b+hin d+ha'i byang phyogs kyis dngos dang / ri de'i drung dang / rtse mo dang / srang sran gnas pa'i skye bo rnams la gnod pa drag
123a5(mdo sde): po nang me dang / mi ngas dang / zan chen dang / ser ba dang / yang dang yang mtshan dkar 'gyed pas yul de phyogs na mya ngan byed cing / 'gro ste sa g.yos pas gza'
123a6(mdo sde): brjid nyams nas/ gnod pa de lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / rgyu skar mchu'i nyi ma la sa g.yos na/ rgyal po mya ngan byed par 'gyur/ mchod sbyin byed pa dang / dad pa
123a7(mdo sde): rnams ltogs par 'gyur/ mi mang po 'du ba dang / dag ston byed pa dang / lha'i gtso bo la mchod sbyin byed pa rnams dang / sngags pa thams cad ni ldog par 'gyur ro//
123a8(mdo sde): gang dag btsas pa dang / cher skyes pa dang / gzhan yang mkhas pa'i mchog dang / rol mo mkhas ba klu snyan pa dang / rigs chen po blo dang ldan pa'i mi rnams dang /
123b1(mdo sde): 'bru nag po til dang / zas sran ma la sogs pa la gnod/ yul ga ling ga'i byed dang / ri byin d+ha'i ngos phyed la rten pa'i mi rnams las g.yos pa dang / sa rnam par g.yos na/
123b2(mdo sde): de dag la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / rgyu skar gre'i nyi ma la g.yos na/ dus tshigs log par 'gyur te/ de'i rlung drag po ldan par 'gyur/ brtan par byas pa
123b3(mdo sde): ma rung bar 'gyur/ yod pa'ang ma rung bar 'gyur// slad tshod ma dang / chos la dga' ba dang / g.yos mkhan dang / sho kham gis 'tshe ba dang / snam bu 'thag pa dang /
123b4(mdo sde): khyad par du chu bo in du'i lho phyogs kyis phyid dang / shar phyogs kyis phyed dang / yul ma ha gi ri ri khrod kyi sdong bu dang / yul dang lung pa'i nang nas gas pa'i ske bo
123b5(mdo sde): dang / ri kin da'i grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / de bzhin du yul shul pa ra ka dang / yul tshe ser che ba nag ri chu mang ba na gnas pa'i ba glang la sogs pa dang / skye bo mi
123b6(mdo sde): bsrung ba mang pos bskor cing / me tog rgyas par ldan zhing / gnas pa la sa g.yos te/ mdangs nyams na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar dba'i nyi ma la sa
123b7(mdo sde): g.yos na/ tshong pa rnams dang / gling phran na gnas pa'i mi dang / 'dron po lam na zhugs pa dang / mchod sbyin gyis snod dang / yo byad rnam dang / sbrul gyis gdong gis
123b8(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i mi rnams dang / bag ma lam bcu pa stsogs pa dang / bkra shis byed pa dang / yul ma he se ne'i grong rdal dang / grong khyer nyams dga' ba dang / ba glang gis khyu
124a1(mdo sde): mang po dang / ldan pa dang / chu bo go ta ba ri'i 'gram gyis yul dang / yul ma ha be na na dang / chu bo ma ha sa ri ti'i 'gram na gnas pa'i grong
124a2(mdo sde): rdal dang / grong 'dabs kyis mi dang / yul ang ga dang / mon yul bang gang dang / yul ka ling ka'i byed dang / yul ne kri ta dang / yul ga shi'i mi rnams dang /
124a3(mdo sde): slas bud med mang po la srel ba dang / snying las sems pa'i mi rnams dang / grong dang grong dam pa rnams dang / rgyal po la ston pas 'tshe ba'i mi de lta bu las sa g.yos
124a4(mdo sde): na/ gnod par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar me bzhin la sa g.yos na/ rdza mkhan dang sman pa dang / tshogs kyis gtso bo dang / blon po dang / dmag dpon rnams dang / glang
124a5(mdo sde): po 'dul sbyongs byed pa'i mi dang / chom rkun byed pa med pa dang / chom rkun byed pa'i gtso ri gong sa btsan lam rten pa'i mi rnams dang / bram ze srang bu se rel du thogs
124a6(mdo sde): pa sa'i cho bos rnams dang / lha don du gnyer pa rnams la smon pa'i mi rnams dang / bram ze lag brda'i kha don 'don pa dang / chos sprin gyis yo byad kyi tshogs spor ba dang /
124a7(mdo sde): yul ha se ni'i grong brdal nyams dga' ba dang / ri rma bya ba'i drung na gnas pa dang / ri ba ri yang tra'i drung na gnas pa dang / snying dong lung ba dang / lung ba bran mang po
124a8(mdo sde): sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / yul bang gur dang / yul sra sa dang / yul a mu tra za dang / 'di rnams las g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar na/
124b1(mdo sde): pas g.yos ri mo bri ba'i las rnams ma rung bar 'gyur/ ri mo bri ba rnams dang / shing mkhan rnams dang / bzo bo dang / gser mgar dang / rdo rjes bskor ba'i las byed
124b2(mdo sde): pa dang / bzang kan dang nor bu bdog pa dang / rgyan la dga' ba dang / tshong ba dang / mig sman sbyar shes pa'i mi dang / rgyan byed pa'i mi dang / yul pra pa ka shi dang / yul
124b3(mdo sde): a ni la'i grong brdal dang / yul ma gyi rma dang / yul a ban ti dang / ri sa h+ya'i drung dang / ri byin da'i 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dang / mi 'dra ma rnams la de ltar
124b4(mdo sde): sa g.yos na ngan par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar sa ri la sa g.yos na/ chom rkun byed pa'i mi rnams dang / mgar ba mkhan rnams dang / 'tshe zhing gnod pa'i mi rnams dang /
124b5(mdo sde): lam phrang 'joms pa'i mi rnams dang / yul gang ri'i byang phyogs kyis shod na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / rol mo mkhan dang / gzhan gang mkhan dang / dka' thub can zas su
124b6(mdo sde): rlung za ba dang / tshul ma yin pa'i dka' thub grub pa'i mi rnams dang / mi dge ba dam pa'i mi rnams dang / nga rgyal can rnams dang / yul sa ha ti'i mi dang / yul an da
124b7(mdo sde): re ta'i mi dang / yul ba'i bu la dang / yul ka tsa'i skye bo mang po phal po che dang / yul ba shud tra ka dang / yul de ra ka zhes bya ba'i grong dang chal chen po'i mi dang / gling sna tshogs
124b8(mdo sde): na bud med dmag gnas pa dang / rkang 'gros kyis gang bar rgyas shing / grong khyer kun be ra zhes bya ba la 'byor cing rgyas par gnas pa dang / ri dam pa phrad dza ya ho zhes bya ba'i drug
125a1(mdo sde): ta na gnas pa'i mi dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas pa'i mi dang / yul bris s+t+ri dang / yul an drag dang / ma du zhes bya ba'i mi dang / 'di dag
125a2(mdo sde): gis gnas rnams dang / mi'i sde d+ha sha rna ba zhes bya ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rgya mtsho mchu'i grong khyer rnam pa brgyad pa dang / grong khyer rnam pa brgyad pa dang / grong khyer rnam pa stong
125a3(mdo sde): snyed du gnas pa de dag las sa g.yos na rab tu gnod par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar sa ga la sa g.yos na/ mi las las bya ba'i rnam pa ma rung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze dam
125a4(mdo sde): me la rjed pa rnams dang gsal ba dang ma khrul par smra ba'i rnams dang / til dang / bal gyis sa bon dang / mon sran sde'u dang / bu ram shing gis khu ba dang / 'bru rnams dang / mi
125a5(mdo sde): rgan po rnams dang / mi phal cher gnas pa rnams dang / 'bras so ba dang / sa bon btab pa'i sman lam/ sran chung dang / sran ma dang / sran tsan sha ka dang / rgya sran nag po dang /
125a6(mdo sde): yungs dkar dang / yul ta ri mi dang / yul mang ku ra'i mi dang / yul ba ya na dang / de bzhin du yul ro ma ka'i dang / yul ba pa rna'i mi mA pos gang ba dang / yul ka ma ra
125a7(mdo sde): a di sta zhes bya ba na/ gnas pa'i mi de dag la sa g.yos na/ gnod 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / rgyu skar lha mtshams la sa g.yos na/ 'dza'o byams shing sdug par byed par
125a8(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chung ma dang / nor gyis bya ba la sogs pa rnams bcu gcig tu bshad pa/ gnyen zhing bag ma blang ba la sogs pa dang / yo byad spogs shing spel ba dang / bag
125b1(mdo sde): bka' thub dang ldan pa rnam dang
125b2(mdo sde): ma blang ba dang / mchod sbyin bya ba rnams dang / de dag gis las rnams bya ba dang / bkra shis par bya ba rnams dang / ltas su lta ba rnams dang / bram ze zhing dang ldan pa rnams
125b3(mdo sde): dang / thub pi dang ldan pa rnams dang / brtul zhugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / yul ka sha zhes bya ba na/ rgyal srid chen po rnam pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa'i yul dang /
125b4(mdo sde): rgyal mtsho'i mtha' khog yug na gnas pa/ 'bra ge'i mtshal nyams dga' ba'i gnas na/ 'bra gos srog 'tsho ba rnams dang / skad rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa'i 'jig
125b5(mdo sde): rten pa rnams/ gzi' brjid mi mngon par byed/ gzugs dang gos dang / rgyan dang spyod pa dang / byed pa dang / 'gro ba dang / cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zas
125b6(mdo sde): su nya sha za zhing / lus nyams bde ba skye ba de lta bu'i mi rnams la sa g.yos na rab tu gnod par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skad smin la sa yos na ri chen po snyil bar 'gyur//
125b7(mdo sde): 'jigs pa'i rlung dang rab tu ldan/ yul a ma ka zhes bya ba'i yul du/ yul ku sha ka'i mi dang / rkun po tshul ma yin pa dag gis phan tshun du gnod pa byed par 'gyur/ mi
125b8(mdo sde): g.yo can dang / brgyan po brgya'i mi dang / de bzhin du/ sgro lcags 'byed cing / rku ba'i mi rnams dang / yul in tra'i mi rnams dang / pu'i ngan na gnas pa rnams
125b9(mdo sde): 'jig par 'gyur/ 'dza ba'i dpung dang ldan pa rnams dang / yang byed par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po dang / bstobs dang ldan pa rnams kyang tshar chod pa dang / bya rog dang
126a1(mdo sde): ri dgas pri shi dang / gcan zan drag shug chen po rnams dang / yul ka ra dang / yul pa ra dang / yul shud sen gnas pa'i mi dang /
126a2(mdo sde): yul ma la la'i mi rnams dang / tho gar gis yul bag le dang / par sig gis yul dang / za hor gyis yul dang / ga bu sha'i yul gyis ri ba ri shes ni'i 'khor na
126a3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i mi dang / 'di rnams la sa g.yos na dgra drag po myur du 'byung zhing gnod par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar bsnams las g.yos na/ rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang
126a4(mdo sde): gnyis pa dang / de bzhin phug na gnas pa rnams dang / yi dgas sha za rnams pa dang / sems can gang dag rig gnas pa rnams dang / mu stegs myur 'byungs la
126a5(mdo sde): chu yang myur du skams par 'gyur ro// dgra rnams ri drag du song nas/ de nas dga' bar gnas chos kyis yo byad rnams dang / gang na nag tshal phun gsum tshogs pa dang
126a6(mdo sde): dgun ra gu ma shing gis khu ba dang / 'bras bu dngar po chung zad yod pa rnams dang / shing tin tu ka'i tshal dang / me tog sna tshogs rnams dang / 'bra dang / sa bon rnams
126a7(mdo sde): dang / 'bras la sogs rnams pa tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / khyim gyis las kun brtsams pa dang / brtan par bya ba rnams dang / brtsams pa bskyed cing bskrun pa'i
126a8(mdo sde): lam sna tshogs dang / ro langs byed pa rnams dang / yul su na dang / gog yul dang / yul ka ta ya mi dang / ba glang rdzi la sogs pa ri'i rtse mo dang phug dang / rdzing bu
126b1(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / rkang bzhi pa sna tshogs dang / dka' thub can shing thog dang / rtsa za ba rnams dang / yul ka sha'i byang phyogs kyis gnas yul sa brtsa
126b2(mdo sde): po la rten pa'i mi de rnams la sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar chu stod la sa g.yos na/ mi las skyes pa dang / 'dron po lam na gnas pa
126b3(mdo sde): dang / tshong dang / rgya mtsho rgyu zhing 'gro ba dang / kha zas nyams 'tshe ba dang / chu srin pra gsod pa dang / 'ug pa dang / chu srin na kra dang / chu srin ma ga ra dang / rus
126b4(mdo sde): sbal dang / rus dang / rigs dang btsun pa dang / phyug po dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / gzhon pa'i mchog bdog pa de dag la 'jigs pa chen po rab tu 'byung bar
126b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ chu'i las su bya ba dang / rdzing skyel ba dang / rdzing bu rko ba dang / tshal bu dang / bskyed mod tshal sna tshogs dang / nor dang 'bru dang / chang gis yo byad
126b6(mdo sde): sgor 'tsho ba'i mi/ yul ta ru na dang / yul ru ga ka si rir mi rnams dang / yul kam bu dza nas skyes pa'i mi rnams dang / tho gar gyis yul dang / yul h+ya na
126b7(mdo sde): nos skyes pa'i mi rnams dang / yul sha sA'i mi dang / phyag rdzi rnams dang / yul ka na nas skyes po'i mi rnams dang / rigs nyams pa'i mi dang / skye gnas ngan pa
126b8(mdo sde): la skyes pa'i mi dang / bya gag dang / bud med dang / chu bo chen po bag shu'i 'gram na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / gangs ri'i ri logs kyis ngos nyi ga no gnas pa'i mi dang /
127a1(mdo sde): ri ki dang / ring du gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / ri rgyud chad pa na gnas pa dang / lung ba na gnas pa rnams las g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro//
127a2(mdo sde): rgyu skar mchu smad la sa g.yos na/ bzo bo rnams la gnod pa 'gyur te/ lcags mgar dang / phya mkhan dang / mtshon mo snying mkhan dang / shing mkhan rnams dang / 'drigs
127a3(mdo sde): mkhan dang / phyug po rnams dang / rkun po rnams dang / bzo bo rnams dang / sna tshogs rnams dang / thos zlos 'don pa'i gtsam bu rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ yul gan ri'i
127a4(mdo sde): mi rnams dang / yul ke ka yang dang / yul kha sha pa rnams dang / gu zan yul ba gu na gnas pa'i grags pa gtum po rnams stong pa rnyed dang / bru sha yul la sogs
127a5(mdo sde): pa dang / yul sa ga bar de'i skye bo rnams gnod pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar gro bzhin la sa g.yos na/ rgyal sa bkur ba'i mi rnams dang / bram ze rigs
127a6(mdo sde): byed slob pa'i mi rnams dang / snyan ngag shes pa'i mi rnams dang / yul ga ngar nas yul ko bu bur pa'i bar dang / yul me ta ra na gnas pa'i rnams dang / sig nis kyis
127a7(mdo sde): yul gnyis dang / yul du pra sa ha dang / yul me la rjes pa'i mi dang / yul sa ka ke'i mi dang / yul lam pa ka'i mi dang / yul na kar ha ra dang / yul tsa ta bi sha
127a8(mdo sde): yang dang / yul gcig na gnas pa ma rung pa du ma dang / yul la ba zhes bya ba'i ri la gnas pa dang / mtha'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang / yul ki sad ta dang / yul
127a9(mdo sde): sta chos mkhas pa'i mi rnam dag
127b1(mdo sde): sab ti ra dang / yul ba ri ra za dang / yul bar na pu ri grong brdal dang / klu'i gnas rnams dang / 'di dag las sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
127b2(mdo sde): rgyu skar mod gre las g.yos na/ mi phyug po dang ra lug dang / bong bu dang rnga mo dang dri'u dang / wa dang / ri dgas kyis rnams grangs tha dad pa dang / ma he dang / 'phongs dang /
127b3(mdo sde): rtsal che ba dang / 'dun khang sna tshogs dang / grong khyer mtsho dpon rnams dang / yul kha ga nang / yul swa sti man ta dang / yul khi la dang / yul mun dang / yul ba
127b4(mdo sde): tA ka ra dang / yul gon za'i mi rnams dang / yul po za dang / yul sa la'i grong khyer bra sha yul dang / gu zan dang / yul tsin tra dang / chang zhim po sna tshogs
127b5(mdo sde): ngag la dag la dga' ba'i mi rnam dang / ri shI logs na gnas pa'i mi sna tshogs la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar mon gre la sa g.yos na/ sa'i
127b6(mdo sde): 'og na gnas pa rnams dang / rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / sems can gzhan yang chu la rten pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / rnga mo dang /
127b7(mdo sde): bya rnams dang / de bzhin du dmag mi dpa' bo dam pa dang / mtshon shag ti dang / ral gri kyog po dang / ral gri thogs pa'i mi rnams dang / yul pra lci'i mi dang / yul
127b8(mdo sde): lho phyogs kyis rgyud kyis ring la rten pa dang / lho phyogs kyis ri'i rgyud la dang srongs thub pa la gnas pa rnams dang / yul kho lo gcig pa zhes bya ba'i mi dang / bud med
127b9(mdo sde): de bzhin du rta dang glang po che dang /
128a1(mdo sde): nu ma ya cig pa rnams dang / dmag dpon skyes pa 'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// / rgyu skar khrum stong las g.yos//
128a2(mdo sde): cha dang mes 'tsho ba'i mi rnams dang / de bzhin du ba glang gsod cing / ma ho la dga' ba dang / nor bu de stsogs la tshong byed pa dang / yul su bi ra 'byor pa dang ldan pa
128a3(mdo sde): dang / lug gsod cing 'tsho ba'i mi dang / nags kyi 'tsho ba'i rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / rol mo khan dang / mi dam pa dang / rta rnams dang / yul ma la
128a4(mdo sde): la dang / yul ma la la ba dang / sgo 'byed cing rku ba'i mi ngan pa rnams dang / 'di dag la sa g.yos na gnod par 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar khrums smad la sa g.yos ma
128a5(mdo sde): tshong pa dang / chu la rten rnams dang / 'dron po lam du zhugs pa rnams dang / tshong po na rgya mtsho la gru bo che 'gro bar chas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba
128a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / rar rig rig pa rnams dang / chang tshong gis las byed pa dang / yul shi ba'i mi dang / yul ba'i yo ta'i mi dang / rgyal rigs a dzu ya na'i rgyud dang /
128a7(mdo sde): yul sin du dang / yul ha nu sa sma dang / kha che yul gyis mi dang / ri khrod zab mo na gnas pa'i ma dang / rtse rgod gnas pa'i yul dang / yul rnam pa du ma dang /
128a8(mdo sde): yul tang ga la dang / bar snad ga la'i mi dang / lha gu lang gis gnas me tog sna tshogs byed pas brgyan pa/ yul ri gnas brgyud ces bya ba na/ skye bo du mas ga
128b1(mdo sde): gong dang brgyan pa sna tshogs dang / tshon cha sna tshogs dang ldan par gyur pa sa g.yos na gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / rgyu skar nam grubs g.yos na/ 'thab mo'i
128b2(mdo sde): g.yul drag shul cher 'byung grong phun gsum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang / grong mi rnams dang / ri khrod na gnas pa dang / 'dun khang du gnas pa rnams dang / yul de
128b3(mdo sde): lha'i mi dang / yul a nu sha dang / tsa ka dang / yul dzi pa ra dang / yul mtha ra dang / yul sha ka dang / yul ban zhes bya ba dang / dpung gis bsnyems pa'i
128b4(mdo sde): dar+yal mchog dang ldan pa na/ rlom par gnas pa/ gar byed cing gla len pa dang / smad mchong mas 'tshe bas dang / yul sha na ka dang / yul a pi sar dang / yul
128b5(mdo sde): nan tir dang / yul tsar ma nan ti na/ gnas pa'i mi dang / dmag mi dang / dmag dpon dang / yul mi ti la'i grong brdal chen po// yul ni mi 'khor gyi grong
128b6(mdo sde): brdal gyis mi dang / bal yul nas shar phyog kyis yul 'di dag la sa g.yos na/ gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar tha skar las g.yos na/ rta rnams
128b7(mdo sde): la nad 'byung bar 'gyur/ grong du mi gnod pa 'byung / mi spun nang gsod pa 'byung / tha skar gyis ngo la rum du bu chags pu la mi dge'o// tha skar gyis dus su
128b8(mdo sde): bcas pa la dge ste/ de phan cad lo gsum na mi bde ba 'byung dam/ de nas lo bcu na 'chi bar 'gyur/ yul la ri dang / yul ti gar dang / yun pa ban ny+tsa li'i
129a1(mdo sde): skye bo rnams dang / yul ar dzu na'i ma'i rnams dang / yul da ru dang / nga ru dang / yul ngan bya dang / yul sa ti na'i mi rnams la gnod par/
129a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// // rgyu skar bra nye las g.yos/ rkun po rnams la gnod 'byung ngo // rgyan po byed pa dang / 'dud pa dang / sgo lcags 'byed cing rku ba dang / me tog tshong ba'i tshong
129a3(mdo sde): pa dang / dbyig dug sbyor zhing ldung pa'i mi dang 'khor lo byed pa dang / btson 'asrangs dang / gtum po sdig can rnams dang / rkun po rnams dang / g.yo'i byed pa rnams dang /
129a4(mdo sde): mi srun pa dang / 'phra mo byed pa dang / gdol pa dang / rigs ngan la sogs pa'i yul gyis mtha' na gnas pa rnams dang / rgya yul na rgya rnams dang / rgya dam pa rnams dang //
129a5(mdo sde): yul dga' ba bzang po zhes bya ba dang / yul su ba na gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / chu bo chen po si ta zhes pa'i 'gram na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dang / mtsho ma gros pa yid
129a6(mdo sde): bzhin zhes bya ba 'jigs rten rnams la grags pa de la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang / rigs sngags grub pa dang / rigs 'dzin gyis mchog rnams dang / drang
129a7(mdo sde): srong thub pa rnams kyis bsnyen par bya ba/ shing 'dzam bu'i skye bo mang po gnas pa dang / ke la sa ti se'i gangs dang / gangs mangs te/ nor bu can gyis ri dang / spos
129a8(mdo sde): ngad ldan pa gang ltar go dang / de bzhin du su ri par sha zhes bya ba ngos bzang ba dang / ri dang ris par ni zhes bya ba dang / byang phyogs ngos dang / gling rnam pa sna tshogs mang
129b1(mdo sde): po dang / ri rang rod dag na gnas pa'i gnod sprin dang / 'byung po dang sha za dang / dri za dang / srin po'i tshogs mang po dang / grub pa dang / rigs 'dzin dang / klu rnams dang /
129b2(mdo sde): de bzhin sman pa rnams stong rnyed la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// // de ltar sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhag bdun tshun chad du/ sa la phan pa'i sprin sngo gnag 'jam po
129b3(mdo sde): in tran stong zer mig rku ba'i sman rnams ri chen po 'dra ba las/ 'brug sgra zab mor bsgrogs cing nye bar 'brug sgra grag la/ glog rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyu zhing / nam mkha' la
129b4(mdo sde): sngon po shur shur po lta bur snang ba 'am/ sgra 'byung ba 'am/ skar mda' lta bu med la rlung mi drag pa ldang zhing chub ma lta bu mi sdug pa ni med/ sprin gyis gzugs bkra shis kyis
129b5(mdo sde): ri mo sna tshogs dang / dbang po rdo rje lta bur snang ba dang / nang par nyi ma char ba dang / nam mkha'i sprin del snyoms 'jam pa'i gzugs rgyang ring por song ba/ glog phan tshun
129b6(mdo sde): phro ba sbyin phro ba de lta bu ni/ dge ba'i mtshan ma yin no// sprin 'jigs la dal snyoms te/ bar chad med cing sprin gyis gzugs me sdug pa snang ba de lta bur snang na/ sprin gyis
129b7(mdo sde): mtshan de lta bu ni/ lha'i dbang pos sa g.yos par snyan pa yin no// de ltar gang dang gang du sa g.yos pa'i phan gnod gyis 'bras bu'i dmigs ni/ 'jigs shing sngangs pa/
129b8(mdo sde): med par yid maton la/ sa bon thams cad thob shig/ las dang so nam kyang bgyis shig/ rnam par rgyal bar bstan to// tshong pa yang gang du song yang 'jigs pa medo
130a1(mdo sde): hayong sa g.yos pa'i rjes la zhig bdun tshun chad du nam mkha' sprin gyis khyebs te/ thar chags su sprin bal ltar ngal snyoms par song la/
130a2(mdo sde): nub phyogs su nam mkha' la chu srin gyis byis pa gsod pa dang / sbal pa rnams dang / nya dang chu srin gyis 'dra ba'i gzugs snang la/ nang nub du nyi ma dang / zla ba 'char
130a3(mdo sde): ba'i tshe/ sprin gyis sgribs pa med te/ de ltar snang ba'i mtshan ma ni/ chu'i dkyil 'khor gyis sa g.yos pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar sa g.yos pa'i phan gnod kyis 'bras yang
130a4(mdo sde): drang srongs chen pos ji ltar mthong ba bzhin bstan par bya ste/ zang bu dang / ri ngos dang / zhing dang / mtsho mgram dang / de dag du sa bon thob shig sa smra ba dang / ha
130a5(mdo sde): cang chu che ba'i sa dang / 'dam rdzab can du btab pa na/ ma rung bar 'gyur ro// tshul de lta bu sa g.yos pa ni/ bkra shis te/ chu'i g.yos pa zhes bya'o// sa gam
130a6(mdo sde): pa'i rjes la/ zhag bdun tshun chad du/ rlung drag por langs la/ nang par dang / nub ka' nyi ma dang / zla ba dmar ser du snang na/ de lta bu'i mtshan mar snang bar mthong
130a7(mdo sde): ba ni/ de ni rlung gis g.yos pa zhes bya'o// / de'i phan gnod kyis 'bras bu bstan pa yan nyon cig/ de'i tshe she rab can bdag gar yang mi 'gro bar gob ste/ 'dul
130a8(mdo sde): ba la mtshon che bskyab pa'i brtsan khang brtsig pa dang / 'obs rko ba gyis shig/ rgyal po pha rol po dang / 'tshams gcig tu 'dug pa dang / brtsod par 'gyur te/ skye ba la/
130b1(mdo sde): 'jig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar sa g.yos pa thams cad ni/ lhag par ma rnams la gnod pa 'byung bar sgrags te/ de lta bu'i rlung gis g.yos pa zhes bya'o// sa g.yos
130b2(mdo sde): pa'i rjes la/ zhag bdun tshun chad du de'i tshe skar mda' shing drag po ldang ba dang / nang nub kyis tshe dmar por gyur la/ nyi ma dang zla ba yang dmar por snang ste/ tshul de ltar mthong
130b3(mdo sde): na de'i sa g.yos bye ste/ khyim rnams bsrungs kyang mes tshig par 'gyur/ du ba dang / me dang / mtshon rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ zla ba dgur char mi 'bab ste/ zhing tha bar lngas
130b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ de ltar sa g.yos pa ni ngan cing mi dge ste/ me'i sa g.yos pa zhes bya'o// de la snga gro g.yos na rgyal po dang / dmag mi dang ldan pa dang / rta dang glang po
130b5(mdo sde): che dang / dmag dpon dang blon por bcas pa la mi dge'o// nyi ma'i gung la g.yos na nad kyis 'debs so// phye 'phreng sa g.yos na/ ba glang phyugs dang rmang rigs
130b6(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du rje'u rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ nang par dang nyi ma nub pa dang / nam gyis gang sa mtshams su g.yos na/ rkun po dang / gos dmar po gyon pa'i
130b7(mdo sde): mi rnams la mi dge'o// zla ba mar gyi de'i nam cung las g.yos na/ gtum po drag shul ngan byed pa rnams la mi dge'o// zla ba yar gyi de'i nam cung las g.yos na/ chos
130b8(mdo sde): sbyin byed pa'i yo byad dang / bram ze mchod sbyin byed pa la gnod par 'gyur ro// / nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od dang / gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan ma bstan pa yul gang du
131a1(mdo sde): mi 'char ba'i tshe/ nyi ma 'dra bar nam mkha' la snang na/ de'i lho byang gis phyogs kun tu nyi mi'i dkyil gyis gzugs rab tu gsal ba yang
131a2(mdo sde): ma yin/ 'od dang zer kyang mi gsal la/ sprin gyis kyang nam kun chod na/ de ni char pa 'bab pa yin te/ dbyar kyi tshe ni nyi ma 'dra ba rtag par yang 'byung ngo // dus ma yin
131a3(mdo sde): pa dus gzhan gyis tshe nyi ma 'dra ba snang na/ 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yul gang du nyi ma 'dra ba dkar po shar na/ yul dang bram ze rnams la mi rung ngo // nyi ma
131a4(mdo sde): 'dra bar kha dog dmar po shar na/ rgyal rigs rnams dang / mtshon chas thogs pas 'tsho ba la gnod par shes par bya'o// nyi ma 'dra bar kha dog ser po 'am/ kha dog
131a5(mdo sde): sngon por 'gyur na/ rje'u rigs rnams dang / ba lang dang phyogs kyis 'tshe ba'i mi rnams la gnod par shes par bya'o// bar snang nas/ kha dog nag por shar na/ rmang rigs
131a6(mdo sde): rnams la gnod pa dang char chen por 'gyur ro// gal te nyi ma'i g.yas rol du nyi ma 'dra bar gyur na/ lha phyogs logs su 'jigs pa cher 'byung zhag bdun tshun chad du char ba
131a7(mdo sde): cher 'bab par bshad do// nyi ma'i byang phyogs ni nyi ma'i dmar bar snang na/ nyi ma 'dra bar kha dog dkar po 'dra ba byung / brtsod kyis kha dog ltar dmar la/ gal te sngon
131a8(mdo sde): po zlum por yang snang na/ zla ba lngan rgyal po 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de lta bu byung na de'i rjes la ltas ngan drag po 'byung ste/ rgyal po nang zab cing nang thab cing gsod pa dang /
131b1(mdo sde): khrag 'khris pa'i nad rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis nang na/ mi skyes pa'i gzugs 'dra ba/ 'go dang bcas pa gsal bar snang na/ zla
131b2(mdo sde): ba bzhin mi'i dbang po 'chi bar 'gyur ro// yul der rgyal sde dang bcas te ma rung bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis nang na/ zhags pa sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar
131b3(mdo sde): po shar bar nam snang ba'i tshe/ zla ba bzhi na mi'i dbang po ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang / yul du mi nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'jigs pa chen por shes par bya'o// nam
131b4(mdo sde): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ral gri gyen du 'greng ba ud dpal sngon po'i 'dab ma dang / 'dra ba cha zungs dang bcas pa bsal bar snang ba dang / gong du zhags par snang ba de nyid
131b5(mdo sde): kyis 'bras bu yung 'dir bstan te/ khyad par du mi mang po mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis nang na/ ril pa sbyin blugs lta bu 'am/ reng
131b6(mdo sde): ring po 'am/ phul lta bu snang na/ zla ba gsum tshun chad du bram ze rnams dang / rgyal po la yang gnod pa 'byung ba bsten te/ de'i tshe lo ma rung bar 'gyur ba'i char mo
131b7(mdo sde): che 'bab pa dang / mu ge 'byang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dkyil gyis nang na bsil yab 'dra ba dang / yang na sbrul 'dra ba snang na/ zla ba gsum nas yul du 'jig nas
131b8(mdo sde): yul du 'jig pa drag po 'byung bar ston/ mi sbrul gyi zin pa rnams kyang / sbrul gyis dug gis phog pas mi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis nang na gal te/
132a1(mdo sde): bya rog lta bu sna bu ngam/ 'on te bya snang na bram ze rnams dang / rgyal po la gnod pa zla phyed dang gsum na 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang nyi ma'i
132a2(mdo sde): nang na bya rgod kyis gzugs dang / gcan zan mri ga tiTI gzugs lta bu snang na/ zla ba phyed dang gnyis nas gnod pa 'byung ba'o// wa'i gzugs lta bu snang zla ba gcig na gnod
132a3(mdo sde): pa 'byung ngo // lung bod gis gzugs lta bu snang na/ zhag bcu gnod pa 'byung ngo // yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis nang na/ dbyig pa lta bu 'am/ gtan pa sbom po
132a4(mdo sde): lta bu nyi ma'i nang na snang na/ rgyal po nang phan mtshan gcig pas gcig srin che bas bsnyems pa dang / rgya mtsho'i la dbang ba'i mi'i dbang po de lta bu mi dge ste/ 'jigs
132a5(mdo sde): pa mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar ltas ngan gyis 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ltar ltas ngan gyis 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus nges pa bstan pa las/ dus
132a6(mdo sde): des gnod pa ma byung ste/ mi snang na/ de ni lo gcig na 'bras bu sum 'gyur du skye ske ste/ gnod pa 'byung bar ston to// zla ba du ma bur lhags sam/ mdog
132a7(mdo sde): gyur tam/ gas pa dang / zla ba'i gzugs chen por gyur tam/ 'phro ba dang / rab tu g.yo' ba dang / zla ba tshes pa'i rwa mi gsal ba 'di rnams ltar snang na/ skye
132a8(mdo sde): bo la 'jigs pa 'byung ngam/ skye bo las 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zla ba de la gza' sbyangs thams cad zin na yang / skye bo la 'byung bar bshad do//
132b1(mdo sde): tshul 'di dang 'dra bar nyi ma la gza' zhugs te/ nyi ma shi na yang zla ba 'dra bar lta zhing / bag yod par yid la bzung zhing shes par bya'o// yang zla ba'i mdog thal
132b2(mdo sde): ba 'dra bar dang / sngo rengs 'dra ba dang / zangs 'dri'i mdog dang / mdog ser po dang / skya bo dang / bye ru'i mdog du snang ba dang / zla ba'i mdog ma gsal bar snang
132b3(mdo sde): namig nad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung ba dang / mtshon gyis bgyed pa dang / nad kyis 'jigs pa 'byung ba dang / gzhan yang gnod pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro//
132b4(mdo sde): yang zla ba'i mdog dkar la snum zhing gsal bar snang na/ phyogs su bde ba dang / char che ba dang / zhi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar zla ba'i 'gro ba dang / bya ba dang /
132b5(mdo sde): gnas dang / zla ba'i mdog rgyu ba dang / tshul dang zla ba rgyu ba yang / sems can gyi bsod nams ma yin pa/ byas pa'i 'bras bu mu ge dang / mtshon dkar 'gyed pa dang / mchi
132b6(mdo sde): ba dang / tshegs 'byung ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar ston to// mtshan mo zla ba tshes pa nas gza' rnams kyis zla'i steng nas phar thal te song na/ de rnams kyis gnod pa'i dmigs
132b7(mdo sde): so sor bstan te/ spor ni rgyal po dang / mi dam pa ma rungs par 'gyur/ ha cang char pa che ba dang / bla ma rung bar spyir ston to// zla ba'i steng na par sba ba sengs kyis
132b8(mdo sde): mnan te song na/ rgyal po ngan pa ma rung bar 'gyur ro// zla ba'i thog nas mig dmar dang / spen pas non te song na/ skyes pa'i 'jigs pa dang / khon drag shul can du 'byung
133a1(mdo sde): ba dang / rab tu 'jigs pa 'gyur ro// zla ba la phog 'jug rings gis non te song na/ mu ge dang mtshon gyis 'gyed par bstan to// zla ba la
133a2(mdo sde): gza' lag gis non te song na/ lo legs pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de ltar zla ba'i steng na par gza' rnams kyi non cing phugs te song ba'i 'bras bu de ltar bstan pa yin no//
133a3(mdo sde): gza' rnams kyis phugs te/ song ba de'i 'bras bu na zla bas gzugs phugs pa las/ zla ba'i gzugs cher skyes la/ 'od lhag par skyes nas che na/ de ni rgyal ba zhes bya'o//
133a4(mdo sde): gal te pham par gyur te/ mthu bskul bris na zla ba 'dar zhing g.yon/ pham pa zhes bya'o// de la sba ba sengs kyis phugs te song na/ yul man tra dang / yul phan ny+tsa la dang /
133a5(mdo sde): yul ma gang da dang / yul d+ha mo tA dang / yul ka be ra dang / mar gyi yul dang / yul sar gar dang / yul kha shi dang / yul bu lin tra dang / yul ke ka la/ kha che yul dang
133a6(mdo sde): papar sig gi yul dang / ri khrod na gnas pa rnams dang / bud med rgyal mo byed pa'i yul dang / yul u pa tri tra dang / yul angad ga dang / yul u ru ku ra tsa dang / yul
133a7(mdo sde): su shin na ra dang / yul phu'u sha dang / yul bu'u sha ta dang / yul pu li na ha dang / ba yul dang / ba glang rdzi las rtogs pa rnams dang / yul pra stan dang / yul ta la da na dang
133a8(mdo sde): bcu la gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyis ngos la gnas pa'i mi rnams dang / zla bdun tshun chad kyis gnyen dang / bcas pa rnams ma rung bar 'gyur
133b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nam zla ba 'od gsal ba la phung bu phog ste sdong na/ yul bas ta dang / yul sin du dang / yul gan ra dang / ri khrod na gnas pa
133b2(mdo sde): mi rnams dang / bag le'i yul dang / so le yul gyis lung ba'i ljongs ri khrod pa brgya stong snyid dang / kha che yul gyis mi la zla ba bcu tshun chad kyis gnod pa the tshom med do// /
133b3(mdo sde): nam zla ba'i 'od gsal ba mig mar gyis phug na/ rgyal po yul gzhan du 'gro ba 'am/ rgyal srid bya bar brtson pa dang / rgyal srid byed pa la zhugs pa ma rung bar 'gyur ro//
133b4(mdo sde): gzhon pa'i rta rnams zad par 'gyur/ phan tshun du bya zhing gnod pa dang / dag dang mtshon mang pos mas sos ma rung bar 'gyur/ yul a yod dang / yul pu ling dang /
133b5(mdo sde): yul ka ling ka'i rgyal po rnams dang / yul pu ri dang / yul shag ti dang / ma ti'i skye bo rnams ma rung bar 'gyur/ yul tre kar ta dang / yul mal yang ba dang / yul ku
133b6(mdo sde): ra dang / yul pa tad ra tse dang / yul shi ba ya'i mi rnams dang / dmag dpon dang / mi'i tshogs dang / dpung se dang ldan pa dang / dus dang / ngang tshulas/ bsogs pa dang /
133b7(mdo sde): mi rnams dang ni/ yul lha phyogs na gnas shing rten pa'i mi rnams la/ zla ba drag gis 'jigs pa 'byung bar bston to// nam zla ba spen pas phugs te song na/ bra ze
133b8(mdo sde): gtso bo dang / rgyal po gdugs thogs pa 'thab mo'i g.yul du 'jug pa 'thab par byed/ blon po dang bcas sde'i gtso bo dpon dang mtshan rnams 'thab par 'gyur/ grong
134a1(mdo sde): brdal dang / chog lam du zhugs pa dang / yul a tsu ti'i mi dang / yul a pi sha hi'i mi dang / yul ga shud tra'i mi dang / yul ma la ba dang /
134a2(mdo sde): yul a pi ra dang / mya ngan rnams dang / yul mang ba rnams dang / ba glang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / 'di rnams rgyal mtshan du byed pa'i yul rnams ma rung ba/

134a6(mdo sde): la gza' gzhan gyis 'bugs shing bla ba'i ngos la 'bud cing reg par song na/ mtshon gyi gnod pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung ngo // gal te zla ba'i nang du gza' rnams song ste nub na/

134b1(mdo sde): snga na gnas pa rnams pham par byed pa dang / rgyal ba'i skye bo rnams la 'jigs shing yang nga bza bar 'gyur ro// zla ba me tog pad ma ku ta dang 'dra/ tshes grangs bzhin du
134b2(mdo sde): zla ba skyes shing che bar snang na/ dkyil 'khor 'od zer ldan te/ nyams pa med par 'gro ba yin/ de ltar zla ba 'od zer bsil ldan mi rnams rgyal bar 'gyur/ zla ba 'char
134b3(mdo sde): zhing 'gro ba bshad pa'o// rgyur skar dang / rgyu skar gyis khyim gyi nang du dmig dmar zhugs pa'i mtshan ma snyan pa rgyu skar ram rgyu skar gyi khyim gang yang rung ba'i nang du/ gza'
134b4(mdo sde): dmig dmar 'od kyis mdog 'jam pa dang / ldan zhing ched por gyur te/ zla ba brgyad dam zla ba bdun gyi bar du zhugs shing 'dug pa las/ 'od kyis kha dog dang bong che ba nyams na/
134b5(mdo sde): de ni dge ba yin te/ rgyu skar gang gang gis nang du gza' dmig dmar zhugs pa nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro// gza' dmig dmar tshul du lta bur zhugs pa ni/ skye bo rnams
134b6(mdo sde): la gnod par 'gyur ro// yang gza' dmig dmar yon par 'gro zhing 'jug ma pa dang / phyir yang 'khor zhing zhugs pa dang / mig dmar gyi 'od dang / mdog nyams pa dang /

134b8(mdo sde): ba dang / phan tshun 'pho zhing 'gro 'am/ lan gcig tu 'dug la 'od dmar po 'am/ yang na dud pa mi sdug pa tsher thul na/ gnod pa byed 'dod de de ni/ rgyal po 'chi bar
135a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// yang na gza' dmig ra 'od mar po 'bar na/ 'byung po thams cad la mi rung bar 'gyur ro// yang na gza' dmig dmar nam mkha'

135a3(mdo sde): la gnod par 'gyur ro// nam gza' dmig dmar rgyu skar dang / skar ma kun gyi nang du 'od kyis mdog bzang por snang na/ mi rigs bzhi thams cad la phan par 'gyur//
135a4(mdo sde): dmig dmar la phan par 'gyur ro// dmig dmar gyi mdog dang 'do nyams na/ mi dge ste ngan par lta'o// yang gza' dmig dmar yon por 'gro zhing 'jug pa
135a5(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba dang / gdong 'chi ma can zhes bya ba dang / sbrul zhes bya ba dang / gdong dmar po zhes bya ba dang / dmig dmar yon por 'gro ba drag shal can zhes bya ba dang / de//
135a6(mdo sde): bzhin du gtun bu zhes bya ba dang / dmig dmar shar ba rgyu skar bdun gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / yang na rgyu skar brgyad kyis nang du zhugs pa las phyir log na/ de ni yon por
135a7(mdo sde): tshang ba zhes bya'o// dmig dmar de ltar zhugs pa la de'i tshe/ khong gis thog gis thad ka 'am/ nags tshal gyis tor te'i zad ka nas dmig dmar rtag tu rgyal ba
135a8(mdo sde): zhes 'dug la/ nagu reng ring po zhig du gyur na/ rims nad kyang 'byung / rab tu dga' ba med par byed/ gang dag mo'i las kyis mtsho zhing gtso ba dang / bsreg pa byedapa
135b1(mdo sde): de dag kyang / me shor zhing thar pas skye bo zang par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar bcu gcig go/ yang na rgyu skar bcu 'am/ yang na bcu gnyis kyis nang du zhugs te/ 'dug na/ de ni gzhar
135b2(mdo sde): drag po yod por zhugs pa gdong 'chi ma can zhes bya ste/ de ltar gza' zhugs pa ni/ sprin 'du char pa 'bab ste/ char legs par kyang / gzhan gyis gnod pa byas phan mi 'gyur/

135b5(mdo sde): che rnams dang / sbrul po che dang / sbrul rnams kyi gnod pa byed par 'gyur/ mtshon gyi rmas pa rnams mi 'tsho/ sman dang 'bras bu rnams dang / ldum bu rnams leg par smin

135b7(mdo sde): can de gdong dmar po zhes bya ste/ rgyal po phan mtshun 'thab cing / g.yul bkye ste/ mtshon gyis smras pa/ de'i tshe khrag gis 'dam du 'gyur ro// yang gza' dmig dam
135b8(mdo sde): rgyu skar bcu bdun gyis nang du zhugs te/ phyir log na brag shul can dang / gtum po drag po zhes bya ste/ de'i tshe ni skye bo mang po la snying rje meng / snying rtse ba med bkar grims
136a1(mdo sde): dang / chos lugs med de/ de'i dus na skye bo rnams gcig ral gri dang / mdun bus 'debs shing 'phen par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gza' dmig dmar

136a6(mdo sde): sha'i mi dang / yul yi ti'i mi dang / yul ban ta ma'i mi rnams dang / yul la ba'i mi dang / yul mog du'i mi dang / de lha rjed pa'i ma dang / yul gur mo dang / yul gyi

136b1(mdo sde): gyur cig// rdzogs s+ho// @zla ba'i khyim brtsi ba dang / rgyu skar bci ba'i mchog/ mdo sde las 'byung ba/ zla ba'i khyim brtsig ston zla/

139a8(mdo sde): khrums smad dbang / bdun la nam gru/ bco brgyad la tha skar/ bcu dgu la bra nyi/ nyi shu la smin drug/ nyi shu gcigs snar ma/ nyi shu gnyis la 'go// nyi shu sum la lag/

139b2(mdo sde): po yar gyis ngo la/ tshes gcig la nag pa/ gnyis la sa ri/ gsum la sa ga/ bzhi la lha 'tshams/ lnga la snron/ drug la snabs/ bdun la chu stod/ brgyad la mchu smad/ dgu la
139b3(mdo sde): gro bzhin/ bcu la mon gru/ bcu gcig la mon gre/ bcu gnyis la mkhrums stod/ bcu gsum la khrums smad/ bcu bzhi la nam gru/ bco lnga lnga tha skar dbang / ston zla 'bring
139b4(mdo sde): bo mar gyi ngo la/ tshes bcu drug la bra nye/ bcu bdun la smin drug/ bco brgyad la snar ma/ bco dgu 'gro/ nyi shu gcig la nam so// nyi shu gnyis la rgyal/ nyi shu gsum
139b5(mdo sde): la skag nyi shu bzhi la mchu/ nyi shu lnga la gro/ nyi shu drug la dbo'/ nyi shu bdun la me bzhi/ nyi shu brgyad la nag pa/ nyi shu dgu la sag sum cu la sa ga dbang / sten zla tha
139b6(mdo sde): chung yang gyis ngo la/ tshes gcig la lha mtshams/ gnyis la snron/ gsum la snabs/ bzhi la chu stong / lnga la mchu smad/ drug la byi bzhin/ bdun la gro bzhin/ dgu
139b7(mdo sde): la mon gre/ bcu la khrums stong / bcu gcig khrums smad/ bcu gnyis la nam gru/ bcu gsum tha skar/ bcu bzhi la bra nye/ bco lnga la smin drug dbang //
139b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten ston pa'i le'u las/ sa g.yos pa la sogs pa'i lhas kyis li'u/ 'i tshe lkog shig tu phyung ba/ rgyu skar nyi shu'i gnas bstan pa/ mdo sde rte sna chen po lags sa/
140a1(mdo sde): @dgun zla ba chung gis tshes bcu drug gam/ bcu dgu 'am/ nyi ma 'char gar du ba lta bu 'am/ char pa 'bab par snang ngam/ sprin gyis nang nas glog
140a2(mdo sde): 'byung sngon na/ 'dzad shing mkhas pa rnams 'gyur bar shes par gyis shig/ gza' nyi ma dang / skar ma tha skar la/ du ba lta bu byung ste/ nam mkha' khyebs te byung na lo bcu
140a3(mdo sde): gnyis kyis bar du than pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o// dgun zla tha chung skar ma bra nye'i tshe/ nyi ma ser po snang na/ kho ra khor yug tu song bar 'gyur zhing / dbus su ltogs te
140a4(mdo sde): 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dpyid zla ra ba la/ gza' nyi ma dang / skar ma smin drug gis tshe/ sa g.yos pa la/ gal te char 'bab na/ de'i 'khor gyi mi phung bar 'gyur ro// sprid zla 'bring
140a5(mdo sde): bo skar ma rgyal gyi tshe/ chub kar nyi ma'i mdog nag por snang na de rgyal po la gnod do// sprid zla tha chung skag gis tshe/ nyi ma nyi rim da snang na/ der g.yul 'byed par gyur to//
140a6(mdo sde): rgyal po gnyis gsod par 'gyur ro// dbyar zla ra ba/ snar mi'i tshe/ nyi zla gnyis ka spang gus zin na/ blon po dag gis rgyal po rnams gsod do// dbyar zla 'bring po skar ma
140a7(mdo sde): khrum stod kyi tshe/ phye 'bred mi me'i drug dang / nyes 'khor du 'od dmar po byung na/ zla ba drug tshun chad du/ pha rol gyis dmag tshogs kyis/ yul 'khor de gsod par 'gyur te/
140a8(mdo sde): rgyal po de/ blon po dang / chung ma dag dang / bcas pa der gsod par 'gyur ro// gal te dbyar zla 'bring po nya la/ zla ba spyang gus zin na/ yul 'khor de mu ge dang / 'thab
140b1(mdo sde): mo dang nad 'byung ngo // dbyar zla tha chung la/ skar ma snabs kyis tshe nyi ma dang / zla ba mi gsal zhing der me lta bu snang na/ yul 'khor der mi bde ba dang nad 'byung ngo //
140b2(mdo sde): ston zla 'bring po zla ba phyed kyi bar du/ nyi ma dang zla ba la gnod pa byung na/ rgyal bu stong gis khrag mthung bar 'gyur ro// ston zla tha chung nye la nyi ma dang zla ba mtshan dang mi ldan
140b3(mdo sde): zhing / mi gsal te/ 'o na de me'i mdog 'dra zhing / nam mkha' yang mdog de 'dra na/ rgyal po gnyis gal/ rten pa'i yul 'khor phyir zhing / 'phung bar 'gyur te/
140b4(mdo sde): bsad nas myur du 'gyel cing / sa ni khrag mthung bar 'gyur ro// dgun zla tha chung la skar ma bra nye'i tshe/ rlung nag po langs shing nyi ma dang zla ba spyang kis zin na/ yul
140b5(mdo sde): 'khor der dmig gis tshogs kyis phud par byed par 'gyur ro// dpyid zla ra ba la rlung gis sa'i tshar 'bebs zhing / glog byung na/ der rgyal po rnams gnod cing / gzhan
140b6(mdo sde): dag rgyal por 'jug par 'gyur ro// dbyar zla 'bring po la/ nyi ma las gza' thal byung du byung na/ nyi ma las thal ba'i gza' des/ nges thams cad du gza'i gnod pa
140b7(mdo sde): byang ngo // dbyar zla 'bring po la sa'i char pa 'bab pa dang / nyi ma 'khyims na/ rgyal po stong gcig la gcig bsod do// dbyar zla 'bring po skar ma bra nye'i tshe/ rlung
140b8(mdo sde): les shing 'brug zer ma rdzing rnams ma rung bar 'gyur te/ log tog thams cad ma rung bar 'gyur ro// dbyar zla tha chung la rlung ser po ldang zhing / na mkha' nag por
141a1(mdo sde): 'dug na/ der 'khor ra khor yug na gnas pa la 'jig pa 'byung bar shes par bya'o// dbyar zla tha chung la skar ma khrums stod kyis nyin
141a2(mdo sde): bar 'brug ma zer bar ser ba 'bab na/ nad dang mu ge 'byung bar ston to// ston zla ra ba la 'brug mi zer na pha rol gyis dmag tshogs kyis yul 'khor nor bsags
141a3(mdo sde): pa 'phrog par 'gyur ro// ston zla ra ba la rdzi tshar langs te/ byang phyogs su sdong chen 'gyel na/ der yul 'khor tha dag phung bar 'gyur ro// ston zla tha chung tshes bcu
141a4(mdo sde): gsum la 'ja' zug na/ yul 'khor der skye rgu/ kho ra khor yug 'phung bar 'gyur ro// dbu ni ltogs te 'cha'o// dgun zla ra ba la tha sker gyis tshe/ skar mda' ltung ngam/
141a5(mdo sde): ser ba 'bab na/ yul 'khor mtha' dag 'phung bar 'gyur ro// yul 'khor der skye rgu kun dbugs mi bde bas 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dbyar zla ra ba la skar me lag gi
141a6(mdo sde): che nya nam mkha' la me tog lta bu snang ngam/ nam mkha' la sgra grag na/ yul 'khor der myur du 'phung bar 'gyur ro// dpyid zla 'bring po la skar ma sa ri'i tshe/ rlung
141a7(mdo sde): ma langs par char ma 'bab bam/ 'jar zug na/ grong khyer mtha' dag tshig par 'gyur ro// dbyar zla ra ba la/ skar ma bra nye'i tshe/ byang phyogs su sgra byung ngam/ na mkha'
141a8(mdo sde): kha dog ser por snang na pha rol gyis dmag tshogs dag dang 'phrad do// dbyar zla 'bring po la skar ma rgyal gyis tshe/ nam mkha' la glog byung ngam/ sgra dang char chu 'bab na/
141b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba sum cha zhes bya'o// dbyar zla tha chung la skar ma snrums kyis che/ char lan mang du 'bab bam/ 'ja' thug na/ rgyal rigs rnams la 'jigs pa 'byung ngo //
141b2(mdo sde): ston zla rab skar ma nam so'i che/ gnam grum mam/ rlung shin tu nag po langs na der nad chen po 'byung bar ston to// skar ma rgyal gyis tshe/ phyogs 'tshams su byung
141b3(mdo sde): na/ rgyal rigs myur du 'khrug cing / skye rgu phyogs gnyis su 'chad par 'gyur ro// ston zla tha chung skar ma lag gis tshe/ nam mkha' la rnga sgra lta bu byung na/ der
141b4(mdo sde): rkang bzhi pa rnamasa'o// dgur zla ra ba la skar ma mon gre'i tshe/ na mkha' la rol mo sil snyan gyis sgra lta bu grag na/ lo tog la 'byung po gnod pa byed cing / drag po
141b5(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // dgun zla 'bring po skar ma sa ri la sgra grag po byung ngam/ nam mkha' la glog rgyun du byung na/ mkhas pa rnams la 'jigs pa chen por 'byung ngo // dguH
141b6(mdo sde): zla ra ba yar gyis ngo la rgyun du g.yol na/ log sum lon nas/ yul 'khor mtha' dag phreng bar 'gyur ro// dpyid zla 'bring po la skar ma sno re'i tshe tsA dang bcas
141b7(mdo sde): ba'i rlung 'khrugs sam/ rgyun du g.yon/ tshangs par spyod pa rnams la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo // dpyid zla 'bring po la skar ma khrums stod kyis tshe/ sa g.yos
141b8(mdo sde): na 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo // dpyid zla 'bring po la skar ma mchu stod kyi mtshan mo sa gas ni/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po gsod cing / mi mang du gsod do//
142a1(mdo sde): dpyid zla tha chung mar gyis ngo las rgyun du g.yo 'am/ zla ba drug gis bar du char mi 'bab na/ der mu ge 'byung bar ston to// dbyar zla ba skar/
142a2(mdo sde): ma pra nye'i nyin par sa g.yos na/ mi dpa' bo stong mchi zhing sa ni khrag mthung ngo // dbyar zla ra ba la skar ma snabs kyis mtshon mo sa g.yos na/ mtha' khob kyis/
142a3(mdo sde): yul 'khor gsod pa 'byung zhing / yul du 'thab mo 'byung ngo // dbyar zla 'bring po la skar ma rgyal gyis tshes g.yos na/ yul der lo tog ma rungs par 'gyur ro//
142a4(mdo sde): ston gyi bya ba'i las kyang g.yos par 'gyur ro// skar ma lag gis tshe gang du rlung langs te/ mchod rten g.yo 'am/ 'bar ram 'gyel na/ yul 'khor der myur du phung bar
142a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gang du mchod rten grub 'am 'gyel na/ rgyal po de yul 'khor dang bcas de/ gzhan gyis khyer bar 'gyur ro// dbyar zla 'bring po skar ma khrims stod kyis tshes
142a6(mdo sde): g.yas na/ rgyal po rtag tu sa zhing chom kun dag gis yul 'khor de bcom par 'gyur ro// ston zla tha chung la sa g.yos na/ grong khyer gyis sgo g.yon zhig gam/ mchod
142a7(mdo sde): rten g.yo 'am zhig der ma lus pa phung bar 'gyur ro// zla ba'i rtse mo g.yon du gza' phur bu zhugs na/ rgyal po'i sa gasma na/ grong khyer gyi sgo// sa'i dbang phyugs long
142a8(mdo sde): spyod chen po ma rungs par 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i rtse mor gza' dmir zhugs na/ mtha' 'khor na gnas pa'i rgyal 'phran rnams kyis kho ra khor yug du gnod pa
142b1(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // zla ba'i rtse mor spen pa zhugs na/ 'jigs tshig ma 'grig mu ge 'byung bar ston to// zla ba spyad gus zin tan/ skar mda' lhang na zla ba drug tshun tshad du 'byung /
142b2(mdo sde): bar ston to// brla skar la babs pa'i tshe/ zla ba sprad gus zin na/ rgyal po dang yul 'khor du gnod pa mi zad pa 'byung ngo // rgyal po'i rla skar la bab pa'i tshe/ zla ba la
142b3(mdo sde): gza' 'jug rings zhugs na/ 'tha' khob kyis rgyal po dag dang 'thab cing mtshon gyi sa rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpyid zla ra ba skar ma mchu'i tshe/ zla ba gza' 'jug rings
142b4(mdo sde): zhugs na/ 'bab mchu thams cad skams par 'gyur/ rkye dgu nad kyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// phur bu 'am/ sba ba sangs ngam/ dmig dmar ram/ spen pa zla ba'i
142b5(mdo sde): rtse mor zhugs na yang / 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar shes par bya'o// skar ma rgyal la gza' 'jug rings zhugs nas 'dug na/ ring por mi thogs par der phyogs bzhi
142b6(mdo sde): nas dmag tsho gas 'ong ngo // skar ma mchu li dmig dmar zhugs sam/ gro bzhin la gza' phur pa zhugs na/ lo gsum khyang gong du 'jigs pa rtag tu 'byung ngo //
142b7(mdo sde): dbyar zla ra ba skar ma sna ra ma la pa ba sangs zhugs te/ phyir log na 'byung po thams cad dang / rgyal rigs rnams 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ngo // skarA sa ga la phur bu
142b8(mdo sde): 'am/ spen pa'am/ zla ba/ nyi ma zhugs na/ skye rgu 'khor los bsnun pa bzhin du 'phung bar 'argyur ro// yang dang gong skar dang / yang gol la sogs pa'i skar me la
143a1(mdo sde): 'dor bsdus pa/ lha dang g.yang mchod pa/ gnyin sbyar ba dang / lam du 'jug pa dang / shing gtang ba rnams kyis skar ma bzang na sbyar/
143a2(mdo sde): pa la/ lha mchod cing dpal dang ka yang bgyi ba'i skar ma bzang du gdams pa/ 'go dang / bre dang / mi bzhi dang / mon gru snams so// 'bring smad du bgyi
143a3(mdo sde): ba la/ byi bzhin/ gro bzhin/ smin drug/ snar ma/ lag rgyal/ chu stod/ mchu smad rnams so// skar ma de dag la ma gtogs pa/ gzhan ni bgyi bar mi rung ste ngano//
143a4(mdo sde): gnyen sbyor bya ba'i skar ma bzang po gdam pa la/ dbo'/ lha 'tshams/ me bzhi dang snams/ chu stod/ chu smad/ nam gru rnams te/ skar ma 'di dag la/ bag ma tshur la blang
143a5(mdo sde): kyang rung / bu sringad par la gtad kyang rung ste/ lo dang gnad 'phrog pa dang / bkra shis so// ngan rab ste mi rung ba la/ snar ma dang / nag pa la sogs pa gzhan ni ngan
143a6(mdo sde): te bye bar 'gyur ro// zhing la sa bon gdab pa la/ skar ma bzang du ba dam pa/ nams so dang / lha 'tshams dang / chu stong dang / chu smang dang / byi bzhin nams so//
143a7(mdo sde): mchog tu ngan pa la/ smin drug dang / rgyal dang bra nye rnams so// lam du 'jug cing don gnyer ba'i skar ma bzang ngan lta ba/ skar ma shar phyogs dang / byang dbang ba'i
143a8(mdo sde): skar ma la/ 'go lag nam so// rgyal mon gru/ mon gre/ khrum stong/ khrums spad/ nam thu tha skar rnams yin te/ shar phyogs dang byang phyogs su mtshon/ skar ma
143b1(mdo sde): 'di dag gis nyin ma la/ lam du 'jug ste song na ngon grub cing / mi phyag gnyi gar la nye zhi mi 'byung ngo // skar ma de dag la babs pa'i nyin par lho dang nub du mchi na/
143b2(mdo sde): mi 'phrod kyis ma 'gro zhig skar ma lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dbang ba'i skar ma la/ gre/ dpo'/ me bzhi lha 'tshams ston// snabs/ chu stod/ chu smad/ byi
143b3(mdo sde): bzhin/ rnams yin te/ lho dang nub phyogs su mchi na/ skar ma de dag gi nyi ma la/ lam du zhugs te song shig/ 'dron grog cing nyi zho med de slar 'khor ro//
143b4(mdo sde): skar ma de dag la bab pa'i nyin par shar dang byang phyogs su 'chi na/ dor mi grub cing nye zho 'byung ste/ slar yang mi 'khor bas ma 'gro shig phyogs gar mchi yang rung ste/
143b5(mdo sde): skar ma 'di rnams la bab na/ 'gror mi rung ba la/ nags pas ri bra nye/ smin drug/ skags 'di bdun la babs na/ phyogs 'tshams mdo gtsong gar yang 'gro mi rung
143b6(mdo sde): ste ma'i phrod pas zhag mga' ba zhol na legs so// skar ma 'di rnams kyis nang na mchog du gdams pa la/ shar dang byang phyogs su rgyal/ khrums stong / tha skar
143b7(mdo sde): la bzang bar/ lho dang nub phyog su 'gro na/ lha 'tshams me bzhin 'gro na bzang bar/ yang don gnyer ba'i lam skar rnams gcig la/ skar ma rgyal dang / tha skar
143b8(mdo sde): gnyis ni nyi ma 'char ba'i yul dang / mdo smad dang / byang phyogs su 'gro na don grub la/ mi byug gnyis gar gang yang rung / nor yod dang / zeng grum gang yang mi
144a1(mdo sde): @#'chi'o// nub phyogs dang lho phyogs su don chen po zhig gnyer zhing 'gro ste/ skar ma bkra shis su bdam pa na/ lha mtshams me bzhi la lam
144a2(mdo sde): du zhugs na/ mi phyag gnyis ka la nye zho dang theng gram mi 'chi'o// yang nye ring dang phyogs 'tshams gar mchi yang rung ste/ 'gror mi rung ba'i skar ma ngan pa rnams la/
144a3(mdo sde): nag pa dang / sa ga dang / bra nye dang / mchu smad dang / sprin drug dang / snar ma dag ste/ 'di rnams ni ngan cing 'gror mi rung ba'i skar ma'o// yang phyogs bzhir 'gro ba'i skar
144a4(mdo sde): rnams gcig bstan pa la/ 'phrod cing bzang ba'i skar ma la/ gre dang / dbo dang / me bzhi nang / lha mtsham dang / snron dang / snabs dang / chu stod dang / chu smad dang / byi//
144a5(mdo sde): bzhin dang / gro bzhin te/ skar ma 'di bcu ni lha phyogs dang / mdo gtsang phyogs su don gnyir zhing 'gron por 'chi na/ 'di rnams gang la babs kyang rung 'phod te bzang ngo //
144a6(mdo sde): don grub la slar myur du 'khor cing na tsha dang / rlag por dang / zeng grum la sogs nong zhing nye zho mi mchi'o// shar dang byang phyogs mchi na/ skar ma 'di rnams la babs na ngan
144a7(mdo sde): don mi grub cing slar mi khor te/ nye zho mchi'o// skar ma 'gro lag snar ma nam so// rgyal mon dre/ mon gru khrums stod/ khrums smad/ nam gru tha skar/ skar ma bcu
144a8(mdo sde): gcig po 'di ni/ shar dang byang phyogs su mchi na/ skar ma 'di rnams gang la babs kyang ste/ don grub cing na cha dang stor rlag sogs pa mi 'byung ngo // nub dang lho phyogs su mchi
144b1(mdo sde): ni skar ma 'di dag la bab na don mi 'grub cing slar mi 'khor ro// na tsha dang / rlag stor dang / god tshabs tsher mchi ste/ skar ma ding rnams la ma 'gro shig/ lam du 'jug
144b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshes grangs dang / cho ga bstan pa/ yang lam du 'jug pa'i tshes dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar du ldan na legs/ de ltar du ma ldan na tshes grangs dang / tshes grangs bzang
144b3(mdo sde): po bdams/ lam du zhugs na shis par 'gyur te/ tshes gsum dang / bdun dang / bcu gcig dang / bcu bdun dang / bcu dgu dang / nyi shu gsum dang / nyi shu bdun te/
144b4(mdo sde): 'di rnams kyis nyin par zhugs na/ nyi ring gar 'gro yang bzang ngo // de ltar ma ldan na rings par zhig yod na/ shar phyogs su 'gro na lcags che chung tshon do pa gcig phag
144b5(mdo sde): na bzung bar bya'o// lho phyogs su mchi na chu phor gang bzung bar bya'o// nub phyogs su 'gro na sol ba mtshon gsum pa zhig bzung bar bya/ byang phyogs su 'gro na sa
144b6(mdo sde): phul gang bzung ste/ rgyang grags su dor bar bya'o// nyes pa mi 'byung ngo // sgo nas chas pa'i tshe/ khyi 'thab mthong na 'gro ba mi rigs kyis/ re shig ma 'gro shig
144b7(mdo sde): lam du zhugs pa'i tshe/ mtshon tshar bag kha nas brjod cing 'byung ngo // bo rlag ces brjod du mi rung ngo // sgo'i thad ka nas phyi rol du gtam mi bya ba chas te song ba'i
144b8(mdo sde): 'og slar sgo logs su lta bar mi bya/ de ltar byas na nye zho 'byung ngo // shing byed pa'i skar ma la gza' bzang por brtsi ba ni/ 'gro dang / me bzhi dang / mon gre dang
145a1(mdo sde): khrums spang dang / nam gru dang / tha skar rnams so// 'bring du bgyi na/ byi bzhin/ gro bzhin/ snar ma/ lag rgyal mchu stod rnams
145a2(mdo sde): so/ shin tu ngan pa skar ma bdun yod de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ res gsum du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de dag gang zhe na/ bra nye smin drug nam so// dbo' sa ga/ chu smad khrums
145a3(mdo sde): stong rnams te/ de rnams kyis nyi ma la shing byed cing ro bskyod du mi rung ngo // de'i nyin par snying dga' ba zhig gam/ nor bzang po zhig thob na yang / res gsum du
145a4(mdo sde): brdung mar thob ste dga'o// zhal mchu zhig gis btab 'am/ dgra zhig zus te/ snying mi dga' bar gyur na yang / res gsum du brdung bar 'byung ngo //
145a5(mdo sde): gze' brtsi ba/ dpyid zla ra ba dang / dbyar zla 'bring po dang / ston bla 'tha chung 'dra bar smon pas chos/ dbyar zla ra ba dang / ston zla 'bring po dang / dgun zla tha chung
145a6(mdo sde): 'dra bar phur bus tshes/ ston zla ra ba dang / dgun zla 'bring po dang / dpyid zla tha chung 'dra bar dmig dmar la tshes/ dgun zla ra ba dang / dpyid zla 'bring po dang /
145a7(mdo sde): dbyar zla tha chung 'dra bar zla bas ches// // zla shol dor ba ni lo ngo mthong gsum zhig dor shol lan cig dor te/ yang l-i tshul du na/ skar ma khyim bcu gnyis lho
145a8(mdo sde): byang shar nub phyogs bzhin tshis pa la/ phyogs kyi ra shi'i dkyil dang po la shol dor te/ lo skor bcu gnyis la shol lan bzhi dor bar bci/ rgyal ba'i ltar na yang
145b1(mdo sde): 'di dang mthun te/ phyogs bzhi'i lo stong / shar drang po na yos bu/ lho drang po narta/ nub drang po na bya/ byang drang po na byi ba rnams te/ byi ba'i lo la dpyid zla 'bring po gnyis
145b2(mdo sde): te shol dor/ yos bu'i lo la dbyar zla 'bring po la shol dor/ rta'i lo la rton zla 'bring po la shol dor// phyo la kur chu tshing po la so l+la/ ga ru ra'i rgyud kar ka sang ka ha zhes bya ba las
145b3(mdo sde): gza' chen po bdun res kyis nyin zhag re la dbang byed pa'i tshe/ gza' gcig la dbang ba'i zhag gcig la yang nyin mo thun brgyad/ mtshan mo thun brgyad la/ klu'i rgyal
145b4(mdo sde): po brgyal po brgyad dbang byed pa'i go rims dang / bzang ngan rtag pa'i mdor bsdus pa/ gza' bdun po ni/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / dmig dmar dang / lag pa dang /
145b5(mdo sde): phur pa dang / spa sang dang / spen pa'o// klu'i rgyad la dang po bdun ni/ mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas dang / 'jog po dang / pad ma chen po dang / dung skyong ngo //
145b6(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po brgyad ni/ rigs ldan zhes bya'o// de la gza' chen po bdun po de dag ni res kyi go rims bzhin du nyin ga re re la dbang ngo // de dag gis nyin zhag gcig la/
145b7(mdo sde): nyon mo la yang thun brgyad/ mtshan mo la mthun brgyad du/ bcas pa la/ klu'i rgyal po lnga ma bdun gyi steng du/ klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan gyis bstan te/ brgyad
145b8(mdo sde): go rims bzhin du dbang byed pa yang yod de/ gza' nyi ma'i zhag gcig la mthun brgya drug la ni/ klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan rang gis skal ba dang / klu'i rgyal po pad
146a1(mdo sde): ma chen po dang / stobs kyi rgyu'i skal pa la yang dbang dbyed do// gza' zla ba'i nyin zhag gcig gis thun bcu drug la ni/ klu'i rgyal po rigs
146a2(mdo sde): ldan rang gi skal pa dang / klu'i rgyal po bad ma dang / pad ma dang dung skyong gi skal pa la yang dbang byed do// gza' dmig dmar gyis nyin zhag gis thun bcu drug
146a3(mdo sde): la ni/ klu'i rgyal po rigs ldan rang gis bskal dang / klu'i rgyal po pad ma dang / dung skyong gis skal ba la dbang byed do// gza' phur bu'i nyin zhag la ni/ rig
146a4(mdo sde): ldan rang gis skal pa dang / 'jog po dang / pad ma dang drang skong dang gis skal pa la yang dbang byed do// gza' sba ba bzang gis nyin zhag la ni/ rigs ldan rang gis
146a5(mdo sde): skal pa dang / dung skyong la yang dbang byed do// gza' srin po'i nyin zhag gi thun bcu drug la ni/ rigs ldan rang gis skal pa dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / dung skyong gis
146a6(mdo sde): skal ba la dbang byed do// de la gza' bdun po'i nyin mtshan gyis mthun gang la/ rigs ldan rang dang / gzhan gyis skal pa la yang byed pa'i thun de dag la/ mi de dag la
146a7(mdo sde): sogs pa 'dug pas zin pa la glos pa ni gshin rjes pa dang / 'dra ste ma'i 'tsho'o// tsher ma dang / rtsa shing la sogs pa rma mched cing / nad chen por 'gyur te ma'i tshe'o//
146a8(mdo sde): nad kyi btabs pa dang / grong khyer la thogs pa dang / mi 'tsho mi thar ro// don du 'gro ba dang / don 'grub pa yang nye zho 'byung zhing don mi 'grub po// klu'i rgyal po gzhan
146b1(mdo sde): gyis dus la ni/ ci bya bar bzang ngo // // nor bu rin po che bzang ngan brtags pa'i gzhung dang thabs/ yongs yang nor bu rin po che btsal na/ thog ma byung khangs ni/
146b2(mdo sde): 'dzam bu gser gling gis pha rol na/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ri yod pa las/ g.yu rdo dang / dngul rdo rko ba bzhin du rin po che'i rdo ba 'byung ba'i mis rkos nas/ sing ga la
146b3(mdo sde): ti ba'i rgyal po la/ gser gyis gzhong ba'i nang du blugs te/ phul nas/ rgyal po la chag shing gis de'i nang nas bton te/ blon po rnams kying lnga bcu man chad/ rgya
146b4(mdo sde): bcu yan cad sa sor bya dgar gsol zhing 'thor/ rgya gar gis mkhan po mkhan po ni na tra si nas kyang / 'di bzhin du mthong ste/ rgya yul nas dar rnyed pas/ blon
146b5(mdo sde): po de dag las nyos te/ ye zho bar ma la'am bdun zhig phul rin po che btsal na rnyed pa'i khungs ni/ mtshong pa phyug po mang po yul gru mang por rgyu rgyu ba mga' tsam la
146b6(mdo sde): bzang por bdog/ mi ngan pa la ni/ rin po che bdog kyang mi bdog kha cig la ni rin po che mchi yang / rin po che ma lags/ rin po bzang ngan rtsi ba'i rtags ni/ mu tig rtag pa/
146b7(mdo sde): zlum pa dang / mdog nyi ma'i kha dog ltar dkar zhing 'tsher ba/ lteng mchis na bzang / pad mar dang / an da rnyil ba la sogs pa brtag na/ spyir lci ba dang / gsal
146b8(mdo sde): la de'i nang na yang snying po 'dra ba'i lhang lhung po mchis na/ bu ga ma mchis pa bzang / mu tig dbug pa ni/ rag shig nges pa'i rnams bu ga dbug po ni chab du bsngal kyang /
147a1(mdo sde): gar dbug pa 'don te/ de nas phyir chab nas phyangs ste/ bug de nas yang rin po che brtag pa'i thabs gcig la/ shog shog dril ba 'dzug mo ga
147a2(mdo sde): tsam la/ yung ba brtags pa'i 'a gus shog shog dril ba la/ bskas la/ de'i steng du sros pa kham cig gis klan te/ de la nor bu rin po che gtsugs la/ rin po che'i
147a3(mdo sde): mchug ma gnyis ga ldogs su bstan de/ de'i kha dog gis shog shog yu ra ba la bskas pa la/ sngon po 'am dmar por gyur na bzang ba// / dong rtse i pan zhes
147a4(mdo sde): bya ba 'phreng gcig grangs stong / rgyal zho bcu la srang gcig tu rtsis pa/ dong rtse gcig la zho gcig dong rtse bcu la srang gcig 'byung / stag gzig yul na rgyal po'i dkor dang /
147a5(mdo sde): bya dgar sprul pa/ bod kyi mi dang 'dra bar/ dong rtse gcig la zho brgya/ zho brgyad la gser srang phyed dang bcu gsum la brgyad/ steng gi ri mo dang / yi ge ni rab rgyal
147a6(mdo sde): po re re zhing 'gyur/ dong rtse chu du ni kun kyang 'dra ste/ zho gcig gis tshad ni brgyad la ni srang gcig 'byung / dngul ni nam gnyis la bgyid/ za tig ni gser dang
147a7(mdo sde): dngul zangs gsum la bgyid/ gser gyis dong rtse zho gcig pa gcig la dngul gyis ya ga ma nam gnyis pa nyi shus 'jal/ dngul gyi ya gam/ gcig la
147a8(mdo sde): zangs gis dong rtse ni/ tshod ma dang ga gon dang / sbyin gtong 'phreng tshogs kyis gtor du bgyid/ rgya gar gyis tsheni gser dang / dngul dang / ragan dang / khar
147b1(mdo sde): ba bzhi bsres te/ ming ni ngo longs bgyi ste/ gser dang dngul ni chung ra gan dang / khar ba ni che ste/ gcig la zho gnyis mchis te/ ltar lhan gcig du bzhu yang /
147b2(mdo sde): mi 'dra ste/ so so na tshig gcig por gdab/ bal po ni pa na ses bgyi ste/ zangs ma gcig pu la yang bgyis ste/ zangs ma dang zha ne dang mkhar ba la sres pa
147b3(mdo sde): yang bgyid/ de gcig la zho gnyis kyis tshang du yul ga na ste/ dong rtse rgyal po'i bla'i dkor du brdungs te/ 'og ma gzhan bgyid du mi gnang / rgya yul na glang
147b4(mdo sde): gsad pa dang / dong rtse ldugs pa ni 'dra ste/ bcad par ni 'gun/ ti zig dang / par yul na ni/ dong rtse ldugs pa'i mgar ba rnams lag pa bla rgyas 'deb/
147b5(mdo sde): 'og ma dag gis blugs na lag pa gcod// // 'phra med yin nam men brtag pa/ mig las mngon te/ 'bras bu'i nang du/ mi'i gzugs rnyan 'byung ste/
147b6(mdo sde): gzugs de la rkang pa la lta la 'go yang lta na ni/ 'phra men ma yin/ 'gro mar lha la/ rkang pa gyid du song ba dran na/ 'dug na phra men mas mi las phyugs
147b7(mdo sde): su bsgyur ba ni/ 'phra men ma'i tshogs byi ba gnyis la/ gnya' shing dang / gshol gcugs te/ zhing rmo sa bon til btab pa dang / de ma thag tu ljang bu de ma
147b8(mdo sde): zag tu/ snye ma de ma thag du 'bras bu smin nas brngas te brdungs te/ brtsir ba'i mar gyis/ thig le re re bskyed so gcig byol song du 'gyur/ gna' phra med
148a1(mdo sde): ma gcig nas brngos phung po'i drung na/ mi rgan rgon gsum zhig 'dug pa las 'phra men ma gcig mtshan mo nas kyis phung po'i steng
148a2(mdo sde): du 'ongs nas/ mi gsum de nas dug pa ni mtsher/ mos lcag gcig gis nas kyi phung po gzhu ba ltar/ byas pa dang / nas kyis phu po dang / mi gsum dang
148a3(mdo sde): bcas te/ zhag bcwo brgyad kyis lam du phyin te/ lan ci'i ri zhig la thugs pa dang / 'phra me na ma de ni de nas kyang 'phur te/ gar song gi tol med phyin/ rgad
148a4(mdo sde): pos rgan mo la gtam du zer ba/ ru bu cag kyang phra men mas mtshar gyis byad sdems 'am cig byas te/ lan tsi'i ri la thug na/ lan tsa mang zhig nas kyis phung
148a5(mdo sde): po'i nang du sba'o// zhes mtsho nas/ kun snga ma'i sa phyin pa dang / de nas bya zer ba dang / byas non nas phra mon mas 'phrul byed mas nus nas/ 'gul yang
148a6(mdo sde): ma nus pa dang / dug pa dang / rgan rgon na re/ khyed phra men yin gyis/ rgyal po la gsol te/ gsad do zhes byas pa dang / 'phra men mas kyang yin par khas
