148a7(mdo sde): blangs/ nor gsug mang po zhig sbyin par byas nas/ rgan rgon gyis kyang btang / yang 'phra men mas kyang ma ni mtshan rje ma dang / phyags ma dang / sgong nga la
148a8(mdo sde): zhon te/ nam mkha' la 'gro// 'phro men ma ni sgong nga yang byed cing / tshong dus su mchong ste/ de la mis sgong yang dag pa yin nam/ gang zhig brtag na/ sgod
148b1(mdo sde): nga btsos te/ shun sbags bshus nas/ dris rgas par bcad pa dang / gri'i kha la sku gcig byung na ni/ 'phra men ma yin te/ mi nyo gros bcad nas sbru ma byung /
148b2(mdo sde): na ni/ mi tha mal pas btsongs pa'i sgong nga yin te/ nyo zhing btsal zhes mchi// brtag sna dang lo rgyus rdzogs s+ho//
148b3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ra na me g+ha na ma ma hA ya na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
148b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa dang / 'phags nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom/
148b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das yul ga ya na ga ya mgo'i ri la/ dge slong bdun khri nyi stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/
148b6(mdo sde): zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par 'gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po
148b7(mdo sde): chen po// byed pa byas pa/ bya ba byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems
148b8(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ sems rnyed pa dang / bskar
149a1(mdo sde): sti thams cad dang bral ba/ legs par rab tu byung ba/ legs par brnyed pa rdzogs pa/ brnag pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ mya ngan las
149a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa sha stag ste/ gang zag cig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong gi byang
149a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par phyogs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa
149a4(mdo sde): nyid la gzhon pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab pa/ chags pa med pa gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting
149a5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la shin tu gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par grol ba/ lam gyi rgyun ma chad pa/ sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba dang thams cad dang bral ba/ byams
149a6(mdo sde): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ stong pa nyid spyod
149a7(mdo sde): yul ba/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/ smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas
149a8(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes mtha' yas pa/ sems na mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ sems ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar mi skul ba/ sems pad ma ltar ma gos pa/
149b1(mdo sde): sems rin po che shin tu yongs su dag pa/ sems gser ltar shin tu yongasu byang ba rnams la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rin po che tog dang /
149b2(mdo sde): lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / rin po che brtsegs pa dang / rin po che 'byung gnas dang / rin po che'i
149b3(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / gser gyi snying po dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / dge ba'i snying po dang / dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
149b4(mdo sde): snying po dang / ye shes snying po dang / nyi mi'i snying po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po dang / pad ma'i snying po dang / rnam par grol ba'i zla ba dang / kun tu zla ba dang / sman ras
149b5(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / kun nas mig dang / pad ma'i mig dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / yangs pa'i mig dang / kun tu spor lam dang /
149b6(mdo sde): kun tu sbyong ba'i blo gros dang / ye shes kyi blo gros dang / chos kyi blo gros dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang /
149b7(mdo sde): seng ge rnam par rol pa dang / sgra chen po'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang / seng ge'i sgra sgrog dang / sgra dbyangs brjod pa zab mo sgrog dang / gos med pa dang / dri ma kun bral
149b8(mdo sde): dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / ye shes kyi dpal dang / ye shes kyi 'di dang / bzang po'i dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / pad ma'i dpal dpa' dang / rin po che
150a1(mdo sde): dpal dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / byams pa la sogs/ pa bskal pa bzang po'i
150a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum
150a3(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris kyi
150a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams dang / 'phral dga' las sogs pa 'phrul dga'i rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / ded dpon
150a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa kar po'i phyogs kyi bdun gyi bu rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas rtsang ma ris kyi bu
150a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs rings dang / stobs can dang / sgra gcan dang / de dag la sogs pa/ lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / klu'i rgyal po ma gros
150a7(mdo sde): dang / gzi can dang / rgya mtsho dang / mtha' yas dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / de dag la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po brgya stong du ma dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid la sogs/ klun
150a8(mdo sde): rgyal ba khye'u brgya stong du ma dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / de ma yin gzhan d+ha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' rdzing dang / mi 'am ci dag
150b1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po brgya stong yang thabs cig go/ yang de'i tshe ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i ri dpag tshad bzhi kho ra khor yug du skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi rdul phra rab tsam yang / gang lha dang
150b2(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod skyon dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / ci 'am ci dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis gang bar gyur pa'i sa phyogs
150b3(mdo sde): sam/ bar snang gi phyogs de med do// 'khor de lta bu 'dus shing / 'khor gyi dbus su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad cig kho ra khor yug du
150b4(mdo sde): dpag tshad phyed pa la lha'i ras bcos ma brgya stong du ma ni bting / rin po che'i dril bu ga yer ka'i dra bras ni gla rer bres/ dar gyi lda ldi brgya bstong du ma ni spangs/ me tog sil
150b5(mdo sde): mas ni gtor ba cig bshams te/ seng ge'i khri'i kho ra khor yug du sa phyogs de ngos rdo rje la yid du 'ong zhing lag 'thil ltar mnyam pa dang / chag chag legs par btag pa
150b6(mdo sde): dang / phyag dar legs par byas pa dang / dri rab tu zhim pa lha'i me tog brgya stong du mas gtor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi yongasu spyad pa'i phyir phyogs de na/ gser
150b7(mdo sde): gyi pad ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma bstod du ma yod pa chu ba ni bai DUr+ya/ snying po ni an d+ha snying la/ ze ba ni rdo rje'i snying po// dri rab tu zhim zhing yid du 'ong ba reg na
150b8(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur pa dag skyes par gyur to// seng ge'i khri de'i gru bzhir haM cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba nas rin po che'i shing / srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ spobs
151a1(mdo sde): spobs su rgyang grags phyed dang gsum gyis 'khor ba bzhi skyes so// seng ge'i khri legs par bshams pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das blo ni rab tu rnam
151a2(mdo sde): par dag chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba ni bcom/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ni ma gos la/ mi bsnyengs shing mdzes la/ seng ge ltar bag tsha ba med pa/
151a3(mdo sde): mtsho dang 'dra bar dngas te/ rnyog pa med cing shin tu rnam par dang / rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing gting dpag rka la rin po che'i 'byung gnas su rgyur pa/ ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags/
151a4(mdo sde): nyi ma ltar rab tu lham pa/ zla ba ltar rab tu sim pa/ kla chen po ltar chos kyi char ba 'beb pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'jig rten kun las mngon par 'phags pa/ slob ma shin tu
151a5(mdo sde): dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/ rgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dmas zhal du bltas shing / ma khengs ma dud par
151a6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'khor tshogs pa de na lhang nge lhan ne'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lham me lhang nge lhan ne ba'i dbu'i rtsug gi gtsug tor gyi gse ba nas 'od zer kun nas snang ba zhes
151a7(mdo sde): bya ba 'od zer gyi brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa byung ste/ de byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas te phyir 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan
151a8(mdo sde): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am/ btsums par yang mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na/
151b1(mdo sde): nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi gseb du zhugs kyang / nam mkha'i khams kyi gseb phye ba'am/ btsums par mi mngon pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na 'od zer
151b2(mdo sde): de dag zhugs kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba 'am btsums par mi mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na/ bye ma'i phung po la mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chu zhugs na mi
151b3(mdo sde): mngon po de bzhin du/ de'i tshe na 'od zer de dag zhugs kyang phye ba 'am btsums pa de dag mi mngon no// de nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams
151b4(mdo sde): gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das pa na/ pad ma can zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
151b5(mdo sde): rig pa dang / rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
151b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das pad ma'i sman zhes bya ba de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di lta ste/ theg pa gcig las brtsams nas chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
151b7(mdo sde): de na nyan thos dang rang sangs dag dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming yang med/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ rdzus te skye ba ma gtogs par
151b8(mdo sde): bud med dang mngal nas skye ba te 'byung zhing skye ba'i sgra yang mi grag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad
152a1(mdo sde): chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na bza' ba dang btung ba dang zas kyi bya ba yang mi shes so/
152a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas can dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dga' ba'i zas can no// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi 'od
152a3(mdo sde): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams de khyab cing dri ma med par gyur pa ma gtogs par 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang bza' dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od kyang mi shwe/
152a4(mdo sde): so// 'jig rten gyi khams de lag 'thil bzhin du mnyam par gyur pa las 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ cig pa dang / ri las sogs pa yang mi snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi
152a5(mdo sde): khams de 'dra ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba de'i ming thos pa tsam gyis sems can gyi sgrib pa thams cad
152a6(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur ba zhi gnas ste/ de 'od des reg ste/ bskal nas rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan de ga la ba der song ste phyin
152a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ste/ pad ma'i snying po la phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ de ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang 'od des
152a8(mdo sde): reg ste/ bskal pa dang / rang rang gi gnas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhab la mgo
152b1(mdo sde): khos phyag 'tshal te/ pad ma'i snying po la so so'i ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgribs pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las
152b2(mdo sde): langs nas bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzang ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i spyan ga la ba de
152b3(mdo sde): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i 'od bzang po dri ma ma mchis pa rnam par dag pa'i yid du
152b4(mdo sde): 'chi ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ba 'di su'i lags shes de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i sman nges byang chub
152b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' rtsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i
152b6(mdo sde): klung gi bya ma snyed cig 'das pa na/ mi 'jed 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
152b7(mdo sde): rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya
152b8(mdo sde): thub pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa cig bzhugs te/ des 'od bzang po
153a1(mdo sde): dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa yid du 'ong ba lus dang sems shin tu dga' ba 'di byung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
153a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i sman de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar
153a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan de thos pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang
153a4(mdo sde): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i sman des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
153a5(mdo sde): sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyis bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di ltar sems can gang dag gis bdag mngon
153a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par shog cig ces smon lam btab po//
153a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgribs pa thams rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog
153a8(mdo sde): pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
153b1(mdo sde): 'das ci lags/ sems can ces de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan de mi thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu thos so// gsol pa/
153b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ phyir mi ldog pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang yin la/ phyir ldog pa
153b3(mdo sde): yang ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar gang lta bur de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa yang ma lags/ phyir ldog pa yang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das des
153b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pas/ sems can de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon skyes pa mthong nas/ sems can de dag phyir mi ldog pa
153b5(mdo sde): lung bstan no// mtshan thos pa kho nas de ma thag tu de dag phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yang ma yin te/ de bas na rigs kyi bu don de nyid rab tu grub par bya ba'i khyod la bshad
153b6(mdo sde): do// dper na shing la li'i sa bon gyi rnam pa zhig yod do// sa bon de la sa bon gyi nyes pa thams cad med la/ myu gu skye ba nas rdzogs pa'i bar du rkyen rnams yod na rigs
153b7(mdo sde): kyi bu sa bon de ci skad du bya/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyes pa thams cad dang bral bas na/ de ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes pa zhes bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
153b8(mdo sde): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa dang ldan pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bon yod pa'i sems can rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
154a1(mdo sde): / ha pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i sman de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
154a2(mdo sde): chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mdzes 'jig rten gyi khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
154a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bya yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang /
154a4(mdo sde): bkur stir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i sman des byang chub sems
154a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na song cig 'di nas bcom ldan 'ad
154a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i sman de la/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
154a7(mdo sde): khams de blta ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la yang phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur
154a8(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / btsun par bgyi ba dang / ri mor bgyi ba dang / bkur stir bgyi ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
154b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mi'i spyan des/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na dengs shing
154b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams der bag yod par gnas pas gnas par gyis shig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can gang dag ni rab tu 'dod chags
154b3(mdo sde): mang ba/ zhe sdang mang ba/ gti mug mang ba/ dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa/ par mi 'dzin pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa/ chos ma yin par 'dod pa/
154b4(mdo sde): brlang ba/ gtum zhes gcod pa/ mu chor smra ba/ pheM theg can g.yengs pa/ brkam pa/ le lo can tshul khrims 'chal ba/ sdig pa'i chos can/ phra dog dang ser snas
154b5(mdo sde): yongs su bkris pa/ nyon mongs pa du mas nye bar nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams te/ sems can de 'dra ba de dag gi nang na de gshegs pa chos ston to// byang chub sems
154b6(mdo sde): dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bka' ba mdzad pa legs so// /
154b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ gang 'di 'dra ba'i sems can rnams kyi nang na chos ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshe
154b8(mdo sde): pa de bka' ba mdzad pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gang dag de lta bur kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba'i sems gcig tsam skyed par byed
155a1(mdo sde): ba de dag kyang dga' bar byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yongs su ma dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ sems can yongs su
155a2(mdo sde): dag palta ci 'tshal te/ gang dag de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na se gol gtogs pa srid du yang dad pa rnyed pa dang / se gol gtog
155a3(mdo sde): pa srid yang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / chos la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / se gol gtogs pa srid du yang tshul khrims
155a4(mdo sde): yang dag par spyod pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de bas kyang gang dag se gol rtogs pa srid du yang snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pi
155a5(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni ches ngo mtshar to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar shegs pa ngo mtshar to//
155a6(mdo sde): de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das lagaso zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
155a7(mdo sde): de las 'di lta bu'i mthun pa'i rjes su bstan pa 'di mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi gnas nas dong ngo // dong nas
155a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i phyir/ la las ni rin po che'i shing me tog dang bcas pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa chu dang zheng du ldan pa rnams mngon par
155b1(mdo sde): sprul/ la las ni bai DUr+ya'i shing rnams// la las dpag tshad kyi shing rnams// la las ni gser gyi shing rnams// la las ni me tog gi shing rnams/ la las ni 'bras bu'i shing rnams
155b2(mdo sde): la las ni gos kyi sprin rnams// la las ni rgyan gyi sprin rnams// la las ni spos kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni 'phreng ba'i sprin rnams/ la las ni phye ma'i sprin rnams// las ni gdug
155b3(mdo sde): kyi sprin rnams/ la las ni rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rnams/ la las ni sil snyan gyi sprin rnams/ mngon par sprul to// mngon par sprul nas gcig tu bsdus nas/ byang chub sems
155b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / lhan cig tu mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga la ba der dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam
155b5(mdo sde): par sel bas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras pa/ kye ma'o grogs po dag mi mjed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can sdug bsngal lo// de bas na gang
155b6(mdo sde): gis sems can de dag thams bde ba mchog gis btab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba legs par mngon par 'du bya'o// byang chub sems de kun gyis
155b7(mdo sde): legs so zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ltar mnyan no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib par rnam par sel sas/ ci lta bu'i
155b8(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i lus las 'od dang zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa yin/
156a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba/ lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kham cing snang bar/
156a2(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sems can dmyal ba pa'i lus su gnas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i lus su gnas pa dang /
156a3(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i lus su gnas pa de dag 'od des reg nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral te/ bde zhing kho ba dang / gnod sems dang yang bral te/ phan tshun du pha mi'i
156a4(mdo sde): 'du shes su gyur pa dang // gang yang stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi bar du mun nag gang du/ nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
156a5(mdo sde): che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag gis kyang lham me lhan ne lhang nger gnas par ma gyur pa de dag kyang 'od des khyab nas snang bar gyur te/ gang
156a6(mdo sde): deder skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khor yug gi ri rnams dang / khor yug
156a7(mdo sde): gi richen po rnams dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po rnams dang / de ma yin pa'i ri nag po gzhan de dag kyang / 'od des khyab ste snang bar gyur pa dang / bla mar
156a8(mdo sde): ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad 'od ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po yan chad / de'i bar du gang 'od des snang bar ma byas pa'i sa phyogs de gang yang med
156b1(mdo sde): ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bya'o// de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'dus bya ba mngon par byas nas/ zas
156b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i sems can rnams ni zas thob// btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ gos 'dod pa rnams ni gos/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams ni bzhon pa rnams nor thob/
156b3(mdo sde): long ba rnams ni mig thob/ 'on pa rnams ni sgra thos/ sgron me rnams ni gos can du gyur/ spros pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde bar 'gyur/ sgrub
156b4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni bde bar btsas pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas so// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad
156b5(mdo sde): yul ga ya dang ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba de nye ba dang / skyes bu dam pa de dag nye bar gyur ma thag du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i dra bas khyebs
156b6(mdo sde): par kun tu snang ngo // steng gi bar snang las lha'i pad ma'i char mngon par rab tu bab po// lha'i me tog gi sprin rnams/ lha'i phreng ba'i sprin rnams dang / lha'i spos kyi sprin
156b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha'i phye ma'i chos gos kyi sprin rnams/ gdugs dang / rgyal tshan dang / ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par rab tu bab po de dag mngon par rab tu bab pas
156b8(mdo sde): sems can gang la reg pa de thams cad rab tu bde bar gyur/ yul ga yang nga ga ya mgo'i ril shing tha mal pa dang / sa phyogs tha mal pa gang yod pa de dag thams cad
156b9(mdo sde): gos kyi sprin
157a1(mdo sde): kyang med par snang ngo // sa phyogs de dag na rin po che'i shing rnams dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rnams dang / me tog gi shing rnams dang / 'bras
157a2(mdo sde): bu'i shing rnams dang / tsan dan gyi shing rnams dang / a ga ru'i shing rnams kun tu snang ste de dag kun tu bzang po 'dag par gyur to// bar snang na lha'i sil snyan dang sgra
157a3(mdo sde): 'byin cing sil snyan de dag las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang byung ngo // lum pa'i tshal rab mchog du gang skyes pa// mnyam med gzhan ya nga nyo mongs
157a4(mdo sde): dbang mi 'gyur// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam de la phyag 'tshal du/ ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// byang chub mchog nas byang chub shing rab drang // bdud
157a5(mdo sde): kyi sde stobs bcom nas sangs rgyas pa// dri med gzi ldan de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// chos tshul 'di dag sgyu ma smig rgyu dang /
157a6(mdo sde): chu zla 'dra bar gang gis gtogs gyur pa// bsod nams zhing rab de la phyag 'tshal du/ ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ chos rnams sna tshogs 'ja'
157a7(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba dang / gang lta 'dra bar gang gis rab rtogs pa// mi g.yo bsod nams gter la phyag 'tshal du/ ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/ gang gis
157a8(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya phrag mang por ni// thugs rje thugs kyis mchog kun rdzogs mdzad pa/ dri med zla zhal de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags/
157b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya mang dang // lha'i tshogs kyis de bzhin gang mchod pa/ gti mug mun bral de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchogs rab 'di la bdag cag/
157b2(mdo sde): lhags/ gang gis mchog gi chos rab brter brnyes shing // thugs rje nyid kyis 'jig rten dag la btang // mnyam med phan mdzad de la phyag 'tshal du// ri bo mchog rab 'di
157b3(mdo sde): la bdag cag lhags/ gang zhing thugs zhing rtag par byams pa'i yid// bad ma chus ltar nyon mongs ma gos par// yon tan mchog rab mnga' la phyag 'tshal du/ ri bo
157b4(mdo sde): mchog rab 'di la bdag cag lhags// mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa yongasu dag pa'i sku// dpe byad bzang po'i 'brus chags 'gro ba'i 'tshe ba gang // yal ga mtha' yas/
157b5(mdo sde): rin chen shing la phyag 'tshal du// bdag cag thams cad lhan cig mchod pa thogs te lhags// tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung ma thag du// de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u
157b6(mdo sde): 'gal gyi bu chen po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal
157b7(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ba'i snga ltas gang ba 'di dag su'i lags/ de skad ces gsol
157b8(mdo sde): pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// me'u 'gal gyi bu shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas
158a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gcig 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma can zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas de bzhin
158a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i sman zhes bya ba de ltar bzhugs so// 'chor gzhes so chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs
158a3(mdo sde): pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs
158a4(mdo sde): ba dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong gang skyes bu dam pa de nyid dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir 'ongs pa de
158a5(mdo sde): dag gi snga lngas 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang chub
158a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor cing bdun du bdar te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos// bcom ldan 'das
158a7(mdo sde): ga la ba de song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod
158a8(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// grags chen shes rab chen po pa// thub chen dpa' ba chen po pa// srid
158b1(mdo sde): pa'i mya ngan rgal ba po// nyon mongs rgal la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad du yang tha le ste// kun nas rab tu lhan ner bzhugs// kun nas rnam par grol ba po// phyag
158b2(mdo sde): 'tshal mi mtshungs mtshungs med la// rab tu mi skul ri bo bzhin// gting tshong yang pa rgya mtsho 'dra// mu stegs kun nas mi bskyod pa// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
158b3(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// bzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa po// chos rnams mgon po khyed kyis bstan// la la ni lam bstan cing // la la
158b4(mdo sde): yang dag nyid la bkod// la la yang dag mya ngan bzlas/ la la byang chub lung yang bstan// bag la nyal dang bsam pa mkhyen/ khyod kyi mi mkhyen ci yang med // de phyir 'dul
158b5(mdo sde): bya'i bya ba rnams// gzigs pa khyod bkar grub po// byang chub snying por zhugs pa na// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dri ma tshogs gzhan rnams kyang ni/ khyod
158b6(mdo sde): kyi ye shes me yis bsregs// rgal nas sems can rnams grol zhing // grol nas skye dgu'i grol mdzad cing // srid pa'i mya ngan 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten tshol
158b7(mdo sde): ba khyod lags so// srid pa'i btson rar sems can dag/ yun ring mi shes gnyid log rnams/ bsad par mdzad pa 'gon po khyod// gnyen gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
158b8(mdo sde): khyod kyi sras mchog 'di dag kyang // thams cad byang chub slad du zhugs// dam pa'i chos ni nyan 'tshal na// 'dren pas de dag bstan tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
159a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/
159a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste// pad ma'i snying po la phyogs cig tu 'dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nang nas pad
159a3(mdo sde): ma'i snying po la so so ci rigs par khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa la gzar nas/
159a4(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la gtsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'das la 'di
159a5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bsten pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
159a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
159a7(mdo sde): thams cad rnams par sel ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu skabs phyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa
159a8(mdo sde): la khyod ci dong pa de dris cig dang dris pa de nyid du lus bstan pas ngas khyod sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
159b1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa
159b2(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ci ltar na tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs rnams
159b3(mdo sde): lags/ ci ltar na bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags//
159b4(mdo sde): ci ltar na smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan
159b5(mdo sde): 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa lags/ ci ltar na chu dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na me dang mtshungs par rnams lags/ ci ltar na ye
159b6(mdo sde): shes phun sum tshogs par rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' sa dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na chu dang mtshubs pa rnams lags/ ji
159b7(mdo sde): ltar na seng ge lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na dul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na cang shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na pad ma lta bu rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na/
159b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems rnam par dag pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems nem nur ma mchis pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci
160a1(mdo sde): / ltar na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ci ltar na blo zhib pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
160a2(mdo sde): rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci lngar na byang chub sems dpa'i rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams//
160a3(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs
160a4(mdo sde): pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings
160a5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chu sems dpa' stong pa nyid slod yul ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams lags//
160a6(mdo sde): ji ltar smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na mos pa'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji ltar na snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams lags/ ji lta
160a7(mdo sde): na dga' ba la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na btang snyoms la gnas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam
160a8(mdo sde): par rol pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems ma stor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshe rab dran pa rnams
160b1(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
160b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur/ ji ltar na lus rdo rje bas sra ba rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de da dpon
160b3(mdo sde): chen po rnams lags/ ji ltar na lam la 'khas pa rnamam lags/ ji ltar na lam log par ston pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun
160b4(mdo sde): mi 'chad pa sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyag dar khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos gos gsum pa rnams
160b5(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na phying pa can rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na stan gcig pa rnams lags//
160b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na zas phyis mi len pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod snyoms pa lags/ ji ltar na shing drang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar
160b7(mdo sde): na bla gab med pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dur khrod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na cog pu pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na gzhi ji bzhin pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das
160b8(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor smod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mdzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'dzul ba 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na cho ga dang
161a1(mdo sde): @spyod yul dang / spyod pa dang spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams lags/ ci ltar na ser sna dang pra dog dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na sems
161a2(mdo sde): can thams cad la snyoms pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bgyid mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na nga rgyal bcom pa rnams lags/
161a3(mdo sde): ji ltar na dad pa mang ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
161a4(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na bdag shes pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rten shes pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
161a5(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye/ ji ltar na khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'tshe ba yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ ji
161a6(mdo sde): ltar na yongs su mi skyo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin bgyid pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzum zhing khro
161a7(mdo sde): gnyer ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na mang du thos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos kyi rgyal
161a8(mdo sde): po'i sras rnams lags/ ji ltar na rgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams su skye ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba 'tshal ba rnas
161a9(mdo sde): ji ltar na mngal gyi rims ma gos kyi pa rnam
161b1(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i tshogs rnams lags/ ji ltar na nges pa rnams lags/ ji ltar ni 'grogs pa bde ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na
161b2(mdo sde): snga ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na tshul du shis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na gnas bca' rnams lags/ ji ltar na rtsi'i rgyal po'i shing chen po lta bu
161b3(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na bsod nams bgyi ba la brtson pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
161b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag gyur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems
161b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la
161b6(mdo sde): phan pa dang / skye bo med po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs shing
161b7(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i don 'di 'dri ba sems pa lags so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas pa
161b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das legs so// zhes byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
162a1(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
162a2(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phum sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lan du
162a3(mdo sde): phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ snying rje ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi bsnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams
162a4(mdo sde): yin/ sti stang gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mchod dang rim gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam
162a5(mdo sde): yin/ yongasu dag pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sun tshegs pa rnams yin na//
162a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos rnams 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/ rnyed pa dang bgur sti'i phyir ma yin/ shes
162a7(mdo sde): kyi khe 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin/ grags pa 'dod pa'i phyir mi yin te/ gzhan du de ltar sems can 'di dag gi sdug bsngal thams cad ji ltar zad par bya snyam ste/
162a8(mdo sde): chos de dag kyang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis gnyis su med par gzhan dag la yang dag par ston to// ji ltar ni rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po la yang dag par/
162b1(mdo sde): ston pa de ltar gdol pa 'am/ gdol bu la yang dag par ston na/ de ma yin pa rdol ba'i ma dang yul gyi mi gzhan dag la lta ci smos/ chos kyi sbyin pa des khongs par yang
162b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum
162b3(mdo sde): tshegs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis dbyug pa bor ba dang / mtshon cha bo ba yin te/ gzhan yang kyang bslab pa de nyid la gzhago//
162b4(mdo sde): de sems can thams cad la bar 'du shes pa dang / mar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / rtsa lag 'du shes pa yin/ nyi du 'am snag gi gnyen 'tshangs gang yang
162b5(mdo sde): rung bar 'du shes pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de de bzhin gshegs pas kyang skye ba 'pho ba dang / de dag du sems can kyi rigs su gang
162b6(mdo sde): khyed kyi pha 'am ma 'am bu 'am rtsa lag gam nye du'am/ snag gi snyen 'tshams gang yang rung ba'i gnas sum gyur sems ce na de dag med pa zhes bya bar gsungs so//
162b7(mdo sde): snyam nas de srog chags su gyur pa phra mo'i phyir yang bdag gi sha dag gis kyang phan 'dogs pa na/ srog chags chen po de dag lta smos te// de ltar na byang chub sems
162b8(mdo sde): dpa' mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chu
163a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gang dag mi dge ba'i las rab tu byed pa mthong na/ de dag zang zing gis sdud cing zang zing gis
163a2(mdo sde): sngas nas mi dge ba'i gnas de nas bslab ste/ dge ba'i gnas su 'bod do// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems/
163a3(mdo sde): dpa'i byang chub po// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos phra dog dang ser sna dang ngan sems gsum sbyangs pa yin no/ zhes gsungs te/ de bas
163a4(mdo sde): na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ de sbyin pa yang sbyin zhing / sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur te/ de lta na nas
163a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' zang zing gi sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin
163a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sprin po sbyin pa yang 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa mi sbyin/ phan 'dogs su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ don gyi phyir ma yin/ g.yog gi phyir ma yin//
163a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi tshul gyi phye ma yin/ gzhon du na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba 'di ni chos nyid yin no snyam ste/ de/
163a8(mdo sde): rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi de phan brtags pa'i lan du 'dogs pa thams cad la mi re bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed de// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan du phan 'dogs pa
163b1(mdo sde): la mi re ba'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can sdug bsngal
163b2(mdo sde): ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / bgo ba ngan pa dang / 'gon med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa dang / skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten
163b3(mdo sde): med pa lta bu bsod nams med pa lta bu dag mthong ba de dag la snying brtse ba'i sems rab tu bskyed cing de 'di snyam du sems ste/ sems can gang dag gi phyir/ bdag gis
163b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bskyed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sdug bsngal ba mgon med pa dpung gnyen med pa skyabs med pa rten med
163b5(mdo sde): pa 'di dag yin te/ kun tu 'khyam na nam zhig bdag sems can de dag gi mgon dang / dpung gnyen dang skabs dang gnas dang rten du 'gyur snyam nas/ de snying rje bas
163b6(mdo sde): rab tu mi bzod de/ bdog cing yod pa'i dngos pos sems can de dag la phan 'dogs so// phan brtags pa'i mod la skyes pa'i rtsa ba des kyang khengs par mi 'gyur te/
163b7(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin
163b8(mdo sde): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na bor ba'i sbyin pa mi sbyin brnyes shing sbyin pa mi sbyin gshe zhing sbyin pa mi sbyin/ nyon mongs shing sbyin pa mi sbyin
164a1(mdo sde): phyag bas rgyags dregs pas sbyin pa mi sbyin/ grags pa 'dod cing spyong pa mi sbyin/ mang du thos pas sbyin pa mi sbyin/ ci sbyin pa
164a2(mdo sde): de yang sti ltung byas shing smin pa smin par byed do// btsun par byas shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// ri mor byas shing sprin pa sbron byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rnyes
164a3(mdo sde): pa'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sti stang gi sbyin pa sems daphun sum tshogs pa gang yan zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon
164a4(mdo sde): dang mkhan po dang bla ma lta bu dang tshangs pa'i tshungs par spyod pa dag mthong na lus kyi gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ sems kyi ri mo dang bcas pa yin te/ de gus pa bskyed/
164a5(mdo sde): ri mo skyed nas/ gus par smra ba dang / phya 'tshal ba dang / sgrub dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / 'dud pa'i las dag byed do// de dag gi dge ba dang ldan pa'i bya ba de dang
164a6(mdo sde): de dag la'ang grogs su 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sti stang gi sprin po phun sun tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang rim
164a7(mdo sde): 'gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas la byas bdag byed ce
164a8(mdo sde): ma 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la spos sam/ me tog 'am/ bdug pa 'am/ byug pa 'am/ skyang nul
164b1(mdo sde): 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dag gis te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas la bya ba dag byed do// ji ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed ce na/ de chos nyan no//
164b2(mdo sde): klog go / 'chang ngo // yi ge 'bri'o// kha don byed do// kun chub par byed do// sems so ma logs par bsgom pa'i sbyor ba byed do// de ltar na chos la bya ba dag byed do//
164b3(mdo sde): ji ltar na dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed ce na/ de gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / tha na chu grang mo phor ba gang
164b4(mdo sde): tsam yang dag dge mdun la dbul te/ de ltar dge 'dun la bya ba dag byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa dang / rim 'gro'i sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin
164b5(mdo sde): no// / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa'i sbyin pa phun sun mtshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sprin no/ sbyin pa 'dis bdag lha
164b6(mdo sde): 'am lha la la zhig du shog shig ce'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po la la zhig du shog shig ces de ltar sems mi skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub dpo'i smin pa 'di dag ci
164b7(mdo sde): skad du bshad pa so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ de sbyin pa ci dang ci sbyin yang smin pa de dang de la so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// de de ltar so sor rtog pa la
164b8(mdo sde): gang 'di sbyin pa'i nyes pa dang / sbyin pa'i dri ma dang / sbyin pa'i bar du gcod pa de dag mo 'byung ste/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa'i spyid
165a1(mdo sde): pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi
165a2(mdo sde): bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bsdam pa rnams yin/ byang
165a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sdom pas bsdam pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su gdungs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa
165a4(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ las kyis 'jigs pa rnams yin/ kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba rnams yin/ 'jigs par lta ba rnams yin/ yang dag par blangs pa
165a5(mdo sde): la brtan pa rnams yin/ mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims pa rnams yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
165a6(mdo sde): dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde 'am/ 'dul ba'am gnas gang yang rung ba
165a7(mdo sde): la la dag du bslab pa'i gzhi 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du bsams te/ gnas de dang de dag la rim mo byed pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
165a8(mdo sde): dpa' so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i slabs pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
165b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis ni/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyis/
165b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang las byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par sprad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas 'di dag gang bcas pa de dag la bdag
165b3(mdo sde): gi bslab par bya'o zhe rnams par spyod do// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par spyad pa de dag ni gang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas de rnams kyang gang zhe na/ 'di la byang
165b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang gi phyir de la sems can rnams ma dad par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma yin par mi spod// dus ma yin par mi spyod/ yul ma yin par mi spyod/ dus ma
165b5(mdo sde): yin mi smra ba yin/ dus mi shes pa ma yin/ yul mi shes pas ma yin/ tshod mi shes pa ma yin te/ de sems can rjes su bsrung ba dang / bdag gi byang chub kyi tshogs
165b6(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bya phyir spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa 'jam par smra ba yin/ dal du smra ba dang / 'du 'dzin mi mang ba dang / rab tu dben pa dang mngon par phyogs
165b7(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan gyi mdang gsal po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
165b8(mdo sde): dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mdo sde de dang de dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi'i de dag gang bcas pa'i bslam pa/
166a1(mdo sde): bzhi de dag la 'gu bar byed pa yin/ brtson par byed pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams
166a2(mdo sde): pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su su gdung ba dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyang yongs
166a3(mdo sde): su gdung ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ gti mug gis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang yang rung ba la las/ yo byad kyis
166a4(mdo sde): phongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba gang rung ba la las yongs su gdung bar mi 'gyur te/ de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten cing / 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs
166a5(mdo sde): su spong ngo // 'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang / de 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni gang zhe na/ mi sdug pa sgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o// yul gi bzang mo ni 'dod
166a6(mdo sde): chags skye ba'i rkyen to// mi sdug pa sgom pa de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / so dang rdul dang dri ma dang skrag pa dang / sha dang
166a7(mdo sde): rus pa dang / rgyus pa dang rtsa dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / rgyu ma dang / gnyi ma dang / pho ba dang / la pho ba dang / long ka dang / lgang pa dang / gacher
166a8(mdo sde): pa dang / phyi sa dang / 'chil ma dang / rdal dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / zhag dang / chu ser dang / rkang pa dang / tshil dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang /
166b1(mdo sde): khrag dang / blang ba dang / glang rgyas dang / gcin ngag yod do// dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ yongs su rtog pa'i rang
166b2(mdo sde): bzhin can de 'di snyam du byis pa blun po mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa de yang dngos po 'di dag shes nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed na/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin
166b3(mdo sde): can/ lta smos kyang ci dgos snyams ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa bsgom pa mang ba yin no// yul gyi bzang po de dgang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub seMs
166b4(mdo sde): dpa' sa chags par 'gyur ba'i bud med kyi gzugs bzang ba yid du 'ong ba mig du sngags pa/ sems 'phrog pa mthong yang / des de lta bu dag mthong na 'di ltar
166b5(mdo sde): yongs su rtog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang yul ni rmi lam dang 'dra ba ste/ byang nas med par 'gyur ba yin na/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig rmi lam
166b6(mdo sde): lta bu'i yul dag 'dod chags skyed par byed cis gsungs so snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la sten cing / 'dod chags ske
166b7(mdo sde): bi'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo // ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la sten cing / zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongs su spong zhe na/ 'di la byang
166b8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la byams pa mang ba yin te/ de bzhin gang dang rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis khro zhing gnod sems su 'gyur ba dang / khon du 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i
167a1(mdo sde): rgyu de dag dang / rkyen de dag yongasu spong ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi gnyen po la sten cing / zhe sdang skye ba'i rkyen rnams yongasu
167a2(mdo sde): spong ba yin no// de de ltar yongs su rtogs pas zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti mug dang bral bas 'dod pa ma 'byor tam yo byad ma 'byor kyang yongasu yid 'chad
167a3(mdo sde): pa med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongasu gdung ba dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i
167a4(mdo sde): yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' kha gcig du lkog du song ste/ rab tu dben pa gnas shing 'di ltar bdag ni ma dris par gnas pa ste/
167a5(mdo sde): bdag ni rab tu dben pa na 'dug pa'o// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o// dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan dag ni kun kyang 'dres par gnas na
167a6(mdo sde): 'du 'dzi mang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'o snyam du sems mi snyed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed
167a7(mdo sde): pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyis 'jigs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bcom ldan 'as kyis kyang dge slong rnams
167a8(mdo sde): bsod nams dag gus par bya'o// tshul khrims gus par bsrung ngo // shes rab gus par bsgom mo// de ci'i phyin zhe na/ bsod nams gus par byas pa rnams
167b1(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ 'dod pa dang 'thad pa dang / dgal ba dang yid du 'ong bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs so snyam du dpyod do// de de ltar mngon par yid ches
167b2(mdo sde): pas mi dge ba'i chos thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar las kyis 'jigs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs yin zhe na/ 'di byang
167b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba phra mo tsam dag la yang 'jigs par lta zhing / srid pa chung yang khyad du mi bsod pa yin te/ de 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
167b4(mdo sde): dge slong rnams dag chu dus kyang skyes bu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sdig pa chu ngus kyang ngan stong rnams su phyin par byed do zhes gsungs so snyam du sems so//
167b5(mdo sde): de ltar yongs su rtog pas kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho bas 'jigs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
167b6(mdo sde): 'jig par lta ba rnams yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mi rnams kyi brtan du rung ba yin te// bram
167b7(mdo sde): zer dang rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal dang / yul gyi mi rnams byang chub sems dpa' de gcig pu gnyis su med pa la/ mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig
167b8(mdo sde): dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / me shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa nor gyi rnam pa de rnams yod kyang / de la byang chub sems dpa' brnab sems kyang mi bskyed do// gal
168a1(mdo sde): te byang chub sems dpa' mchod rten gyi 'am/ dge 'dun gyi dngos pa'i phyir las su bskos na yang dngos po des kyang nye bar mi 'dza ste/
168a2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di nas phyi'i bzod pa phun sum chog pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' bdag gi lus lus la sha zos
168a3(mdo sde): kyang bla'i gzhan gyi bas sam/ bsgom 'am/ yo byad rnams gang ci yang rung ba cig gi lan ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du smras pas pha rol pos thos sam/ sangs
168a4(mdo sde): rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun la mi snyan par brjod pa thos na/ ma'i khro zhing gnod par mi sems la khon du mi 'dzin te/ de bzod cing dang du len len la gnod
168a5(mdo sde): sems mi mnga' ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyi'i bzod pa phun sum chags pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chu sems dpa' chos kyi bzod pa phun sum
168a6(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di dag mdo sde bapa mo dag las de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa rgyud nad pa 'tshams sbyor ba las
168a7(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba bsgyur med pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad thog mams zhi ba'o// chos thams cad bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'o// zhes bston pa de dag thos
168a8(mdo sde): kyang mi 'jigs mi sdang klag par mi 'gyur te/ ji ltar chos de dag ma shes sam ma thos par mi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
168b1(mdo sde): 'amang rgya bar mi nus so snyam du sems ste/ de'i phyir gang chos 'di dag 'dzin pa dang sems pa dang sgom pa dang yongasu rtog pa dang / mos pa 'di ni chos kyi bzod pa zhes
168b2(mdo sde): bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis bzod pa phun gsum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i bzod pa phun
168b3(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khro ba'i bsam pa skyes sam/ gnod sems kyi bsam pa skyes na/ 'di ltar khro ba 'di dag gang nas byung gang
168b4(mdo sde): du 'gags/ gang la byung ci ltar 'byung ci'i phyir du 'byung ba zhes yongs su rtog ste/ de de ltar yongs su brtags na khro ba'i skye ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // 'gag
168b5(mdo sde): pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // gang la skye ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong // ji ltar skye ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gi rkyen gang gis skye
168b6(mdo sde): ba yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong / de de'i phyir bzod pa cing dang du len pa kun nas ldang ba mi mnga'i bo yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/
168b7(mdo sde): bzod pa phun gsum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni nyin par
168b8(mdo sde): bzod pa la mtshan mo mi bzod pa 'am/ mtshan mo bzod la nyin mo mi bzod pa 'am/ bdag gi yul na bzod la gzhan gyi yul na mi bzod pa 'am/ gzhan gyi yul na bzod
169a1(mdo sde): la bdag gi yul na mi bzod pa 'am/ bshes pa la bzod pa mi shes pa la ma bzod pa 'am/ mi bshes pa la bzod pa 'am/ mi bshes pa la bzod
169a2(mdo sde): la shes pa la mi bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus thams cad du'ang bzod la/ yul thams cad du'ang bzod/ thams cad du'ang bzod pa yin te/
169a3(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nye tse ba ma yin pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs yin
169a4(mdo sde): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' pha dang ma dang bla ma dang bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen 'tshangs la bzod la gzhan la ma bzod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
169a5(mdo sde): dpa' ni tha na gdol ba gzhon nu yan chad la'ang bzod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tha dad pa med pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
169a6(mdo sde): dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la
169a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' don gyi phyir bzod pa ma yin no// 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin no// 'jigs pa'i phyir ma yin phan thog su re ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis/
169a8(mdo sde): ma yin/ ngo tsha bas bzod pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni brtag par yang bzod pa mang ba yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dgos pa la mi lta ba'i bzod pa phun
169b1(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nam de la khro ba
169b2(mdo sde): skye ba'i rkyen gang gis zil gyi non na/ khu tshur gyis 'tshogs par 'gyur ba 'am/ thal mos 'chog par 'gyur ba 'am/ dbyig pas brdeg par 'gyur ba 'am/ mtshon gyis
169b3(mdo sde): brdebs par 'gyur ba 'am/ mi brtsigs pa'i tshig gis ngan du brjod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rkyen ma byung bar bzod pa ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gal te l-i la
169b4(mdo sde): zhig gis brdegs sam/ bsdigs sam/ spos sam brgyad na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sa 'di snyam du bdag gis las 'di dag byas te/ bdag nyid la
169b5(mdo sde): rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// mas ma byas pas ma byas/ nye du dang brnag gi gnyen 'tshams gang yang rung ba dag gis ma byas te/ las 'di dag bdag nyid kyis
169b6(mdo sde): byas pas/ de'i phyir bdag nyid la rnam par smin par 'gyur gyi/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyur/ de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
169b7(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnams par smin par mi 'gyuraro// de bzhin du nang gi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
169b8(mdo sde): dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro snyam du sems gzhag par bya'o// de de ltar ma log par rtogs par de'i rgyu de'i rkyen de'i gzhis rnam par dkrugs kyang
170a1(mdo sde): / rnam par ma thug kyang bzod de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi dkrugs pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems
170a2(mdo sde): dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'am rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba sems can
170a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi bdag por gyur la/ de la sems can de dag gis mi snyam par brjod kyang rung kyal kyang rung rtses kyang rung ste/ mi khro zhing gnod sems su mi
170a4(mdo sde): byed la/ bdag por gyur pa lta bu mi sngon gyi/ gzhan du nang 'di snyam du sems te sems can 'di dag ni bdag nyid kyis bzung ba ste/ sems can 'di dag ni bdag
170a5(mdo sde): nyid kyis yongs su bskang bar bya ba yin la/ de ltar yongasu bsrung ba dang / brlag par bya ba ni bdag gi mi bya'o zhes de de'i snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/ bzod cing
170a6(mdo sde): dang du len pa gnod sems mi mang ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems
170a7(mdo sde): dpa' dam bcas pa nyams su lon par byed pa'i bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
170a8(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho
170b1(mdo sde): 'dam du bying ba'i sems can rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrogs kyis de ltar sems can thams cad bsgral ba dang / sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang /
170b2(mdo sde): sems cad thams cad dul ba dang / zhi ba la rab tu dgod par brtson pa la/ bdag nyid khro ba mang ba dang / gnod sems mang ba dang / mi bzod pa dang / pho snya med
170b3(mdo sde): pa ni bdag gi mi bya'o snyam du mi sems so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sman pa thur ma can cig yod la/ sems can rnams kyang rab rib kyis mdongs par
170b4(mdo sde): gyur nas/ sman pa des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag rab rib kyi skyon bsal bar bya'o zhes bsams la de nas sman pa de bdag nyid kyang mdongs
170b5(mdo sde): pa 'gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ cig sman pa des sems can de dag gi rab rib kyi skon de dag bsal bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
170b6(mdo sde): 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di ltar 'jig rten mi shes pa'i rab rib
170b7(mdo sde): kyis/ mdongs pa'i gti mug gis dri ma shes rab kyis mig gis bsal bar 'dod la/ bdag nyid kyang mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis mdongs na bdag gi mi cha'o snyam
170b8(mdo sde): du sems te/ de de'i phyir bzod cing dang du len la gnod sems mi mnga' ba yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa nyam su len par byed pa'i bzod pa phu
171a1(mdo sde): / sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams
171a2(mdo sde): bam po// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
171a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin no// mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/
171a4(mdo sde): rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rgyun tu chud pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i brtson
171a5(mdo sde): 'bras can rnams yin/ thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams yin/ snyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams
171a6(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na/ rdo rje lta bu brtson 'grus can rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan
171a7(mdo sde): las ma 'das par/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / ma rgal ba ma bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba bgrol ba dang / dbugs ma byung ba dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs
171a8(mdo sde): par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ de de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa'i drung du bdud
171b1(mdo sde): sdig can 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de la rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus thong shing / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ngas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su mya ngan
171b2(mdo sde): las bzla ba dang / ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbyung ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mngon par rdzogs
171b3(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus 'di lta bu brtsoms te/ de ni brdzun dang 'gred pa'i chos can byis pa'i ske bo sla ba'o// rigs kyi bu ngas ni sems can
171b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus brtsams pa gcig las kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas par ma shes so// rigs kyi bu ngas sems
171b5(mdo sde): can du ma nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyis/ rigs kyi bu ngas sems can du mnyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
171b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de'i phyir brtson 'grus zlogs gis/ don med par nyon mongs pa la sten pa
171b7(mdo sde): bor gyur ta re zhes dang pa bral bar byed cing rkyal ka byed kyang / de lta byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te kye ma 'di na bdud sdig can bdag la rkyal ka byed par 'dod
171b8(mdo sde): do snyam ste/ des de ltar shes nas bdud sdig can de la 'di skad du/ sdig can khyo bya ba nyung ngu gyis shig/ 'jig rten gyi sgo sham gyis khyed la ci zhig bya/ sdig can bco
172a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kyang las bdag gis bya ba ni/ 'jig rten yin te las kyi bgo sgal la spyod pa'o las kyi skye gnas pa'o// las la rton
172a2(mdo sde): pa'o// zhes gsungs te/ sdig can khyed dang las bdag gir bya ba yin te/ las kyi bko bskal la sprod pa/ las kyi skye gnas pa/ las la rton pa yin gyis/ sdig can
172a3(mdo sde): khyod gang nas 'ongs pa'i lam nas song shig nga la rgyal ka byas sa khyod yul ring por don med pa dang / gnod pa dang sdug bsngal du gyur ta re zhes bsgo'o// bded sdig can
172a4(mdo sde): de yang bdag gi sems kyis tshor bar rig nas yibs te/ de nyid du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha
172a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis rgyal ka byas te/ 'dun pa bzlog kyang 'gyur ma 'dzum zhum par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje lta bu brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/
172a6(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i rnam pa ji lta bus yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang byang chub
172a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de la grangasu yang nye bar mi 'gro cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nyer bar mi 'gro na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad lta ci smos
172a8(mdo sde): te/ de'i sems 'byung ba re re la brtson 'grus kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad rabu spong ba de lta bu'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de ltar na bya
172b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bras pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
172b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ha cang brgyan pas pa'am/ ha cang zhan pa'i brtson 'grus mi rtsom ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ha cang brtan ngas pa'i brtson 'grus ni yab yob por 'gyur/ ha cang
172b3(mdo sde): zhan pa'i ni le lor gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rlabs po che brtson 'grus
172b4(mdo sde): can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de 'dra bar 'gyur/ gang de bzhin
172b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba dang / 'od 'dom gang pa dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes thos pa med cing mtha' yas
172b6(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi tsho ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu khyu mchog nyid de yang bdag la yang yod par 'gyur ro// de ltar na byang chub
172b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rlabs po che'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gser
172b8(mdo sde): ram nor bu rin po che'i dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba ni/ lham me lhan ne/ lhang nge ste de ni a la la 'bar ba'i gser ro// a la la 'bar ba'i nor bu rin po che
173a1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyang brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba yin no//
173a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon de dag gang zhe na/ le le ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// snyom las ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// zlas la tshod ma shes
173a3(mdo sde): pa ni brtson 'gras kyi skyon dong dri ma'o// bdag mi shes pa ni brtson 'gras kyi dri ma dang ston no// tshul ma yin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// 'du 'dzin/
173a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon no// de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi dri ma dang skyon zhes bya'o// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' la med pa yin te/ de'i phyir de'i brtson
173a5(mdo sde): 'grus de 'bar zhing dri ma med pa dang 'od gas la yongs su dag pa yongasu byang ba yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i brtson 'grus can yin no//
173a6(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun tu chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' spod lam thams cad du brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ ci nas kyang
173a7(mdo sde): lus skyo bar ma 'gyur ba dang / sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar rtsom pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rgyun du chud pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa
173a8(mdo sde): rgyun tu chud pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ de ltar na rgyun tu chud pa'i brtson 'grus can gang sdi/
173b1(mdo sde): pa mi dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi lam gyi bar du gcod pa gnod pa dang ldan pa de dag spangs pa yin/ gang yang 'di dag dge ba'i chos mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'thun pa byang chu
173b2(mdo sde): kyi lam gyi phyogs byang chub du brang ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur te/ de la mi dge ba'i sems skye ba phra zhing chung ba 'ga' yang mi skye na che ba lta smos
173b3(mdo sde): te/ de ni rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thun
173b4(mdo sde): mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi
173b5(mdo sde): bye ma snyed cig mnar med pa'i me'i phung po chen pos byur bur gang bar gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das pa na sems can gcig gis sdug bsngal zhing skyabs
173b6(mdo sde): med 'gon med gnas med rten med pa zhig yod 'ang sems can gcig po de'i don gyi phyir me'i phung po de rkang gi 'gogs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'das nas/
173b7(mdo sde): sems can gcig po de thar par bdag spron/ sdug bsngal phal lta ci smos snyam ste/ de na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
173b8(mdo sde): dang mu stegs ngan thams cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thun mong ma yin pa'i brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
174a1(mdo sde): dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du mir 'gyur bas ni byang chub thob pa dga' ste/ bdag
174a2(mdo sde): gis brtson 'grus 'di ni chungs shing zhan la bdag kyang le lo can te/ byang chub ni mgo 'am gos 'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du/ bskal pa mang po// bskal pa mang po/
174a3(mdo sde): bskal pa stong phrag mang po// bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang mor sgrub dgos pas/ bdag ni de lta bu'i bkur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi bskyed de/ byang chub sems
174a4(mdo sde): dpa' ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya ba de dag dang / gang mngon
174a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshul 'di 'dra ba dang / lam 'di 'dra ba dang / brtson 'grus 'di 'dra bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas//
174a6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba sha stag las mngon par rdzogs pa
174a7(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba sha stag las mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyis/ bdag kyang ci nas/
174a8(mdo sde): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par 'gyur ba sems can thams cad kyang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i
174b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyis bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar brtsal lo 'bud do// bdag sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa la ni sems can dmyal ba nas kyang bla'i//
174b2(mdo sde): bdag la phan par brtson yang mya ngan las 'das pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems bskyed par byad ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa'i brtson 'grus can
174b3(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsnyams pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom na brtson
174b4(mdo sde): 'grus de'i ro myang bar mi byed de/ brtson 'grus des gzhan la mi slong bdag la mi stod de/ de 'di snyam du shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can/ su zhig bdag gi las
174b5(mdo sde): la brtson pas gzhan la smon snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsnyems pa med dpa'i brtson 'gras can yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu
174b6(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsam
174b7(mdo sde): btan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyis brtan pa rnams yin no// skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsam
174b8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ mang du thos pa rnams yin/ ma log par gdam ngag sgom pa la brtson pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams yin/
175a1(mdo sde): sems la mkhas pa rnams yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la mkhas pa rnams yin/ de la ma zhen pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na/
175a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin zhe na/ kwa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshe rabs tha dad par de dang de dag tu
175a3(mdo sde): spad pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba yin te/ de bram ze'i rigs shing sa la chen po 'am/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu 'am/ khyim bdag
175a4(mdo sde): gi rigs shing sa la chen po gang dang gang du skyes kyang khyim de'i mi dad pa yin te/ de skyes kyang rgyu des dang rkyen de dag de bas kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par
175a5(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang / mi 'bral ba yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gam
175a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dag go/ de skyes na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba goms pas 'di ltar dpyod do// kye ma skye dgu 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'o// kye ma skye dgu 'di ni nyam thag par/
175a7(mdo sde): kye ma skye dgu 'di ni na ba'o// kye ma skye dgu 'di ni mi gnas pa'o// kye ma skye dgu 'di ni yun ring po nas nang par gyur pa'o// kye ma skye dgu 'di ni gti mug gis ljongs
175a8(mdo sde): pa'o// de'ang 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i phyir te/ de bas 'jig rten gnas pa de lta bu la bdag gi 'dod pa rnams la bsten pa ni bdag gi mi cha'o// 'dod pa zhes
175b1(mdo sde): bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongs su brtags pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam grangs du mar 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes pa/ 'dod pa rnams ni gsal shing lta bu'o//
175b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams ni mtshon mdung thung lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni ral dri'i so lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni spu gri'i so lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni sbrul gyi mgo lta bu'o//
175b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams ni dbu brdos pa lta bu'o// 'dod pa rnams ni dri nga ba'i zhes gsungs so snyam ste de de ltar skyo nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig dag dgos nas
175b4(mdo sde): dad pas khyim nas khyim med par yang dag par rab tu byung ba'o// de rab tu byung nas ma thob pa thob par byed pa dang / khong du ma chud pa khong du chud pa dang / mngon sum du
175b5(mdo sde): ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// de'i rgyu dang rkyen de dang gzhi des kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i tshul du bshad pa dang don dam pa'i tshul du bshad
175b6(mdo sde): pa dang don dam pa'i tshul du bshad pa thos pa 'dzin to// de gnyis ka la yang dag par bsgom mo// gdam ngag ma log par bsgom pa brtson pas chos kyi rjes su
175b7(mdo sde): 'thun pa la spyod de 'jug ste/ chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos de'ang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i blta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa
175b8(mdo sde): ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i col pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no//
176a1(mdo sde): des lam khong du chud pas/ dbang po rno ba dang / dbang po gsal ba dang / de shes pa'i dbang po can no// de dbang po gsal te shes
