176a2(mdo sde): pa'i dbang po can yin pas/ dben pa mang ba yin te/ de 'du ba thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // 'du 'dzin thams cad kyis thams yongs su spong ngo //
176a3(mdo sde): smra ba la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / lta ba
176a4(mdo sde): la rnam par rtog pa thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // shes kyi khye 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa thams cad kyi thams cad yongs su spong //
176a5(mdo sde): de lus dang sems rab tu dben pas sems la mkhas pa yin te/ de sems la 'di snyam du bdag gi sems 'di ci dge ba la smod dam/ de ste dge ba'am/ 'on
176a6(mdo sde): ta ma lung du ma bstan pa 'am/ chos gang la spod pa ces rnam par spyod to// gal te dge ba la spyod na de la sems dga' ba dang rangs pa dang / mgu ba bskyed do//
176a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun no// 'on te mi dag pa la spyod na de la sngo ba mang ba dang / rtog pa
176a8(mdo sde): mang ba yin te/ mi dge ba'i chos de dag spang ba la brtson pa yin no// mi dge ba'i chos de dag kyang gzhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod 'chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
176b1(mdo sde): gti mug go// de la 'dod 'chags rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'o// de la 'dod chags chen po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de thams
176b2(mdo sde): cad du khyab ste/ sems kyun nas bzung zhing gnas pa dang gang gis de la gzhol zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems mi 'thob pa ste// de la gzhol ba dang ngo tsha
176b3(mdo sde): ba dang / de nyid rjes su rnam par sems/ 'dzem pa thams cad du med par 'gyur te/ ji lta na na ngo tsha ba dang 'dzem pa thams cad kyi thams cad med pa dang / de gcig
176b4(mdo sde): tu lkog du song ste/ de nyid rjes su rnam par sems/ de nyid rjes su rnam par rtog ci de nyid la/ legs par shin tu smon pa dang / de nyid la yang yon tan du lta ba dang /
176b5(mdo sde): de lta na de la ngo ba med pa ya yin no// ji ltar na 'dzem pa med pa yin zhe na/ de rgyu de dang rkyen dang gzhi des pha ma'am/ bla ma lta bu gzhan dag dang rtsod cing phyir
176b6(mdo sde): ldog pa dang / rgol bar byed cing / des ngo de la yon tan du lta ba yin te/ de ltar na de la ngo bo med pa yin te/ de rgyu de dang rkyen dang gzhi des ngan song du skye ba yin/
176b7(mdo sde): te/ de ni 'dod chags chen po zhes bya'o// de la 'dod chags 'bring ba gang zhe na/ gang gis 'dod chags rnams la rten par 'gyur na/ bya ba grub kyi bar du sten gyi/
176b8(mdo sde): bya ba grub nas 'dod chags bral ba'i sems 'thob pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / 'thob dang / sems la mi bathob pa dang / de ni 'dod chag sa 'bring ba zhes bya'o//
177a1(mdo sde): de la 'dod chags chu ngu gang zhe na/ gang gis 'dod pa rnams bskyen pa dang / bsnams pa dang byugs pa dang / lus kyis reg pa
177a2(mdo sde): tsam 'am/ tshig du smras pa tsam 'am/ mthong ba tsam gyis tshig par 'gyur ba de ni 'dod chags chu du zhes bya'o// mdor na 'tsho ba yo byad thams cad la chags pa'i
177a3(mdo sde): pa'i sems su gyur pa ste de ni 'dod chags zhes bya'o// de la zhe sdang gang zhe na/ zhe sdang yang rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste/ chen po dang 'bring ba dang chu ngu'o//
177a4(mdo sde): de la zhe sdang chen po gang zhe na/ zhe sdang gi rnam pa gang gis zhe sdang zhing rngam 'khrug gtum pa gyur pas mtshams med pa lnga las gang yang rung ba la byed pa'am/
177a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos spong ba gang yang rung ba byas pa la/ mtshams med pa lnga pas grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro// cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe' dang / rgyur yang nye bar
177a6(mdo sde): mi 'gro ba de ltar byed pa/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi las lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu skye zhing gal te brgya la mi na yang gnag cing dmig
177a7(mdo sde): dmas la gtum zhing gnod sems mang bar 'gyur te/ de rgyu dang rkyen de dang gzhi des sems can dmyal ba dag du skye bar 'gyur ba de zhe sdang chen po zhes bya'o//
177a8(mdo sde): de la zhe sdang 'bring ba gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe sdang bar 'gyur te/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas nas myur ba myur bar skyen pa skyen par la gor la gor 'gyod cing de'i
177b1(mdo sde): gnyen po la yang ston pa ste/ de ni zhe sdang 'bring ba zhes bya'o// zhe sdang chu du gang zhe na/ gang gis zhe sdang bar gyur nas/ tshig tsam dang mi snyan pa tsam gyis mi
177b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i las bzlog pa ste/ de'ang de la brgyal bar 'cha' zhig 'byung ste/ byung nas yang skad cig de nyid dang / yud tsam de nyid dang / zang cig de la gnyen po/
177b3(mdo sde): dang / sten pa ste/ de ni zhe sdang chung ngu zhe bya'o// de la gti mug gang zhe na/ gti mug kyang rnam pa gsum du shes par bya ste/ chen po dang 'bring dang chu ngu'o//
177b4(mdo sde): de la gti mug chen po gang zhe na/ gang ji skad du smon pa'i gnas de dag la nyes pa la dga' zhing mya ngan du mi byed smre sngags 'don par mi byed 'gyod par mi byed
177b5(mdo sde): ba yin te/ de ni gti mug chen po zhes bya'o// de la gti mug 'bring pa gang zhe na/ gang gis mi dge ba'i las byas kyang la gor la gor la go 'gyod cing
177b6(mdo sde): tshungs par spang pa rnams kyi drung du 'tshags shing mi 'chab pa de la yon tan du yang mi lta ba yin te/ 'di ni gti mug 'bring pa zhes bya'o de la gIta mug chu/
177b7(mdo sde): du gang zhe na/ gang gis rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba ma yin pa bcas pa'i kha na ma thob bslabs pa kun/ spyad pa'i lam gnyis gsum las 'da' ba ste/ de ni gti mug
177b8(mdo sde): chu ngu zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems daphyir mi zlog pa mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de ltar sems la mkhas pa la gang 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa
178a1(mdo sde): rnams la lhag par chags pa de lta bu med pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sems la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// 'on te lung ma bstan pa la/
178a2(mdo sde): spod na/ de la dran pa dang ldan zhing nan tan du byed pa de brtags pa la brtson pa yin te/ de la ji ltar na lung du ma bstan pa la spyod pa yin zhe na/ gang gi tshe sems kyi phyi rol du
178a3(mdo sde): 'ong mi rgyu ning du'ang mi rgyu dge ba la spyod na/ mi dge ba la'ang mi spyod/ lhag mthong la yang mi spong / zhi gnas kyang mi 'dzin cing zhum la gnyid kyis non par gnas
178a4(mdo sde): pa ste/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu nya la nyal ba las sad pa mig gnyid kyis bsgribs pa'i sems mi gsal ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe sems de mi gsal bar rgyu ba ste/
178a5(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par bzhag pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de
178a6(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems la mkhas pa yin no// de de ltar sems la mkhas pas chos 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o// chos 'di dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o// chos
178a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ni dge ba'o// chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o// chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o// chos 'di dag ni mi 'byung ba'o zhes chos rnams la rtog ste/ de 'di snyam chos 'di
178a8(mdo sde): ngag ni sems la gnas pa sems las byung ba sems can du 'gro ba ste/ sems shin tu 'jil/ shin tu btul zhing khong du chud par byas nas chos de dag thams ca
178b1(mdo sde): kyang shin tu mchil ba dang / shin tu btul ba dang shin tu khong du chud par 'gyur te/ des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang gzhi des sems zhi bar
178b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ de sems nyid la sems rtog so// sems nyid kyis sems zhi bar byed do// sems nyid la sems rab tu gzhag go/ de ltar zhi ba la brtson
178b3(mdo sde): pas/ sems rtse gcig tu reng nas mnyam par gzhog go/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa la dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba mngon du 'gyur te/ de yid dga' bar
178b4(mdo sde): gyur nas/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las rtog pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
178b5(mdo sde): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed cing dga' ba dang bde ba'i ro de yang myang bar
178b6(mdo sde): mi byed de/ mi rtag go snyam nas bsam gtan dang po la sems bskyed do// de rtog pa dang spong ba dang bral zhing chags pa med pa'i yid du gyur pas nang yongasu dag ste/
178b7(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyu dag cig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / de bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de dag
178b8(mdo sde): bas sdug bsngal ba yin par khong du chud par byed do// sdug bsngal lo snyam du btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ btang snyoms la gnas pas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin
179a1(mdo sde): yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pas bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa/
179a2(mdo sde): ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bsam gtan gsum pa stong ngo snyam nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la sems gtong ste nges
179a3(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi thob pas bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir ldog go// bdag tu 'dzin pa phyir log par bde ba 'ang spong ba sdug bsngal ba yang spong ngo // de bde ba yang spangs te/
179a4(mdo sde): snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nus pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gtang snyoms dang
179a5(mdo sde): ldan pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bdag gi lus dang na mkha' lus su gcig du mos par byed de// de de ltar mos pas gzugs
179a6(mdo sde): kyi 'du shes las thams cad du thams cad yang dag par 'das pa yin thogs pa'i 'du shes kyang nub pa yin te/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams lnga
179a7(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas
179a8(mdo sde): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas so// de'i tshe de'i rnam par shes pa na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam par shes pa/
179b1(mdo sde): mtha' yang so snyam nas rnam par shes pa mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de'i rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas nas/ de ci
179b2(mdo sde): yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas gnas so// de'i gong na gang sems kyi mtshan ma
179b3(mdo sde): med pa rgyu ba thams cad 'gags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'adi ni 'gog pa zhes bya ste/ de ni shes par bya'o snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par
179b4(mdo sde): 'jug go/ de la mngon par dga' ba'i rten gyi gnas mi skyed do// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/
179b5(mdo sde): tshad med pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos pa/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu lha de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /
179b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang 'og dang thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di la byams pa dang ldan pa'i se
179b7(mdo sde): kho na med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so//
179b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang dga' ba dang gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa//
180a1(mdo sde): tshad med pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan
180a2(mdo sde): pa dang dga' ba dang gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa 'gran zla med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas
180a3(mdo sde): mchog phyogs tu gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de
180a4(mdo sde): bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang 'og dang thad kar rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di la gtang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa 'gran zla med pa
180a5(mdo sde): gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa mi gnyis pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas gnas so// de mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// /
180a6(mdo sde): de la yang ma zhen pa yin/ te/ gong du yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs par byed pa yongasu tshol lo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
180a7(mdo sde): dpa' bsam btan phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no//
180a8(mdo sde): bcu gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'dus byas la mkhas pa rnams yin/
180b1(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'khor ba las ldog pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ theg pa che
180b2(mdo sde): po la mkhas pa rnams yin/ bdud kyi las yongs su spangs pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ ma log pa'i shes rab can rnams yin/ mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab
180b3(mdo sde): can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yang
180b4(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes rab la rtog/ tshor ba dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtog ste/ de gzugs la rtog pa na gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs/
180b5(mdo sde): 'gog pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs/ 'gog pa mi dmigs so// de'ang don
180b6(mdo sde): dam par tha snyad kyis rang bzhin du ni ma yin te/ des don dam pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / tha snyad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin de gnyis ka yang brjod/
180b7(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin du mi dmigs so// de'i phyir brtson 'grus kyang nyams par mi byed de/ mgo 'am gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol
180b8(mdo sde): zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdag med pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las kyi rnam par smi
181a1(mdo sde): pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta spyod te/ 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gar gyi ltad mo dang 'dra ba dri za'i grong
181a2(mdo sde): khyer lta bu rang bzhin gyis stong la/ sems can 'di dag kyang sems can ma yin 'on kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas/ de dag de'i phyir lam khyor du
181a3(mdo sde): chud pa mi 'thob po// de dag ni 'di snyam du gal te bdag gis sems can nam srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gso ba po 'am/ skye bu 'am/ gang zag gam shes las
181a4(mdo sde): skyes sam/ shed bu med na dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med par 'gyur ro// snyam du sems mod kyi sems can med du zin kyang las kyi rnams
181a5(mdo sde): par smin pa yang mngon no snyam mo// de la byang chub sems de ci ltar sems can de'ang med la/ ji ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang
181a6(mdo sde): mngon pa de/ yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa la/ yin no// ci ltar na byang chub
181a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas kyi chos
181a8(mdo sde): rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtog par byed cing de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dus byas kyi chos 'di dag ni mi gnas mi g.yo ba dril pa'i thigs pa lta bu 'bab chu
181b1(mdo sde): chu lta bu yin te/ de la mkhas pa su zhig 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la zhes pa dang chags par byed pa 'am/ de dag med par gyur pas mya ngan du byed snyam nas rgyu de dang rkyen de
181b2(mdo sde): dang gzhi des skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba yang 'gog pa la rtong ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas la mkhas pa yin no// ci lta na/
181b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar spyod do// kyi ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni ma rig
181b4(mdo sde): pa mdongs pa 'khor ba la phyogs pa srid pa'i zhags pas bcings pa nye bar len pa'i rgyus dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed do// de dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
181b5(mdo sde): las mngon par 'du byed pa dang ldan pas srid pa'i snying 'tshams sbyor bar 'gyur te/ de'i rgyu yang skye bar 'gyur ro// skye yod pas dga' bar 'gyur ro// dga' ba'i chos can
181b6(mdo sde): chen po 'ba' zhig po de zo chun khyud mo'i 'khor lo/ ltar/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lor ltar/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lor rgyun tu 'gyur ro staM ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpas yang
181b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgyun la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
181b8(mdo sde): dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar spyod do// mi rig pa med par gyur pas 'du byed la zhen pa med par 'gyur// 'du
182a1(mdo sde): byed la zhen pa med par gyur pas rnam par mi 'gyur bas rnam par shes par mi 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa med par 'gyur bas mi
182a2(mdo sde): dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang / srid pa med par 'gyur ro// sred pa med par 'gyur bas len pa mi 'byung / len pa med pas srid bI
182a3(mdo sde): nyin 'tshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur te/ srid pa'i nyin 'tshams sbyor ba med par gyur pas/ skye bar mi 'gyur skye ba med par gyur pas/ rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags
182a4(mdo sde): 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis
182a5(mdo sde): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba ldog pa la mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan
182a6(mdo sde): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar spyod de/ chos 'dis ni rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dis
182a7(mdo sde): ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur/ 'dis ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur/ 'dis ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srid pa kun tu sbyor ba chad pa nyid 'tshams sbyor ba med pa
182a8(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro// chos 'dis ni rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu gcig pu spyod par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de thams cad kyang
182b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu rtogs par byed de/ chos de dag mngon du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ sems
182b2(mdo sde): can gyi khams bdag gis bzung ba bdag gis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags te/ sems can 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa thams cad bsgral lo zhes dam
182b3(mdo sde): bcas pas bdag gcig po 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas byeng ba ni bdag gi mi bya'o snyam ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs
182b4(mdo sde): rgyas dang theg pa la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bslab
182b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad la yang slob la/ slob pa yang mi dmigs/ bslab pa'i lam yang mi dmigs/ gang slob pa de yin mi dmigs/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi
182b6(mdo sde): des chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las
182b7(mdo sde): spang ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad du thams cad yongasu spong ste/ mi che ba'i yul la gnas pa dang
182b8(mdo sde): 'jig rten rkyang phan pa'i gsang tshig la sten cing bsgom pa dang / rnye pa dang bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang rim gro la ched cher 'dzin pa thams cad du yongasu spong ngo //
183a1(mdo sde): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gzhan gang byang chub kyi lam gyi bar chad du 'gyur ba de dag kyang thams cad du yongasu spong zhing de dag gi gnyen
183a2(mdo sde): po la yang sten te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gdud kyi las yongs su spong ba la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam log pa'i shes
183a3(mdo sde): rab can yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos dang / gsang tshig dang las dang bzo gnas thams cad la shes rab gtong ste/
183a4(mdo sde): de yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir te/ shes kyi khyed 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'dod pa'i phyir ma yin gyi
183a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan pa'i che ba nyid brjod pa'i phyir te/ de la yon tan du lta ba'i phyir ma yin no// gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/ gsungs rab 'di ni
183a6(mdo sde): dam pa ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'o snyam nas de de lta na tan tu lta bas mu stegs can gzhan gyi lta ba can du mi 'gyur te/ de lta na byang chub
183a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma log pa'i shes rab can yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
183a8(mdo sde): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang skye rgu dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa lha dang mi dang lham/
183b1(mdo sde): yin du bcas pa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par gang de dang shes rab mnyam pa de lta bu'i sems can
183b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang bcas pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu dang dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas dang
183b3(mdo sde): lha dang bcas pa dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na shes rab kyi bye brag gis zil gyis mnon pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems pa mnyam pa med pa'i shes rab can
183b4(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub ses
183b5(mdo sde): dpa' thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can rnams par gzhig pa'i thams mkhas
183b6(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ yul las zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa yin la gtsigs pa sel ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ sems can la dpung gnyen
183b7(mdo sde): byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ len pa'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin/ gnas nas gnas su
183b8(mdo sde): slong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng ba stong pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs la mkhas
184a1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
184a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang dag me tog gi rnam pa dag 'am/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa/ yongs su gzung ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum
184a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de dbu'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sde'o// de dgang 'di dang gdu
184a4(mdo sde): pa'i shing ngam/ spos byi shing ngam/ rin po che'i shing ngam/ dpag bsam gyi shing ngam/ me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing nga yir bya ba med pa/ yongs su gzung ba med/
184a5(mdo sde): pa/ de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbul lo// dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
184a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu yongasu sngo'o// de mede sde rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba gang 'di dag nyan cing de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gis sangs
184a7(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su sde'o// gang phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang de ma yin pa'i sems can dag dge ba'i las rnams
184a8(mdo sde): byed cing / byang chub kyi tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de dag snying thag pa nas rjes su yid rang ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
184b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sde'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs me tog gam 'dug pa 'am/ spos gsol na sems
184b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri nga ba gsal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri thob par yongasu sde'o// de phyag dang zhal byed na sems
184b3(mdo sde): cen thams cad kyi spyod lam mi sdug pa med par 'gyur ba dang spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongasu sde'o// de me rtog gi gdugs gsol na/ sems can
184b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med par bya ba'i phyir yongasu sngo'o// de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro na yang 'di ltar sems
184b5(mdo sde): can thams cad mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// de'i phyir 'byung na 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rtson nas gdon/
184b6(mdo sde): tosnyam du sems bskyed do// de gnas khang gi sgo 'bying na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo dbye'o snyam du sems bskyed
184b7(mdo sde): de sgro gcod na 'di ltar ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo rnams gcad do snyam du sems bskyed do// de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub snying po la dgo sopa
184b8(mdo sde): du sems bskyed pa// de sa palas pas gas na 'di ltar sem pa thams cangs sa rgyas kyi mya ngan ris 'das pas/ sangs su mya ngan las tha snyam du sems bskyed
185a1(mdo sde): de de nas ldang na 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba rnams las bslong ngo snyam du sems bskyed do//
185a2(mdo sde): de lus kyi tshed la 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do// de der 'dug na 'di ltar sems can
185a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi zug rngu dbyung ngo // snyam du sems bskyed do// dkru bshal byed na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon
185a4(mdo sde): mongs pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkra'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de lag pa skal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba rnams gselo snyam
185a5(mdo sde): du sems bskyed do// de rkang pa bkru na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rnam pa sna tshogs bsalo snyam du sems bskyed do// de so shes za na
185a6(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do// de lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad phan pa dang /
185a7(mdo sde): bde bar yong su sngo'o// de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar sheg
185a8(mdo sde): shig snyam du sems skyed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mu
185b1(mdo sde): stegs can rnams zlog pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste mu stegs can spong ba dang / kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa la sogs
185b2(mdo sde): pa'i mu stegs can gyi gnas de dang de dag du 'phrul pa dag mngon par sprul te/ de sems can yongs su smin par bya bo'i phyir/ thabs byed cing de 'di snyam du sems
185b3(mdo sde): te/ kye me'o sems can 'di rnams nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas/ bdag gi sngar slo dpon gyi tshul gyis gdul bar ni mi nus kyi/ slob mar khas blang ngo snyam ste/
185b4(mdo sde): de dag gis khrod du rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu byung nas ci ltar spyod pa dang sprod yul dang mang du thos pa dang / spong ba dman tshegs kyis kyang mu stegs can gzhan de
185b5(mdo sde): dag zil gyis gnon pa de de lta bur zil gyis gnon no// 'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de de dag gi nang na slob dpon dang bla ma lta bur bkur bar 'gyur/ tshig gzung
185b6(mdo sde): zhing ngag mi gtsigs par 'gyur te/ de kyi sems can de dag nye bar gyur pa'o snyam du sems na/ grogs po dag 'di ni sko ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'grog
185b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba lam ma yin no zhes mu stegs can de dag gi sngags pa ma yin pa brjod par 'gyur te/ des mu stegs can gzhan de dag gnas de rnams la bslang nas/
185b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dgod do// de phyir rol gyi mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dag gi gan du tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing / chos de dag thob par bya/
186a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir spyod/ rtsol lo// 'bang ngo // de rtsol zhing 'bad pas bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
186a2(mdo sde): sgrub ste/ ci nas kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gzhan de dag las chen mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / chos 'bar bar 'gyur ba dang / slob dpon gyi mchog tu
186a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / mkhas pas bkur bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsgrub po// nges sems can de rnams yongs su smin par dus dang tshed shes pa dang / grogs po dag
186a4(mdo sde): lam 'di ni skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'grog par 'gyur ba'i lam ma yin no zhes bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi
186a5(mdo sde): bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa ma yin pa/ des sems can de dag gnas de las bslang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'god de/ de lta/
186a6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mu stegs can rnam par zlog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs
186a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams mthong na/ des de dag 'dul ba'i thabs gzhan med do snyam nas de dag gi drung du bud med sprul pa
186a8(mdo sde): bzang mo lta na sdug pa bud med thams cad kyi mchog dag sprul te/ sems can de rnams de dag la rab tu chags par rig nas/ sprul pa'i bud med de lam de nyid du/
186b1(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus byed do// de yang skad cig de nyid dang yud tsam de nyid dang / thang cig de nyid la rul cing dri nga ba dang 'jigs par te/ de dag gis kyang de mthong nas spangs
186b2(mdo sde): skrag skyo bar red de/ bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i dri nga ba'i nang nas gang thar byed pa su zhig yod ces nyams thag par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems can
186b3(mdo sde): de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste/ byang chub rnam pa gsum las gang yang rung ba'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba'i de ltar sems can de dag la chos ston te/ de ltar na byang
186b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par zlog pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pa yid la bcags pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas
186b5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tshams med pa'i las byed pa'am mi dge ba'i las byed pa mthong na/ de'i gan du song te
186b6(mdo sde): ske skyes bu ci'i phyir yid mi dga' bar gnas zhes de skad zer ro// des kyang smras pa rigs kyi bu bdag gis mtshams med pa'i las byas pas de'i phyir bdag
186b7(mdo sde): lo yun ring por gnod pa med pa dang phan pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal bar mi gyur grang zhes yid mi bde zhing mi dga' bar gnas so// de'i phyir de la byang chub
186b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sdom pa 'dzin du 'jug go/ de la chos bsten pa zab mo yang byed do// de ste 'gyod pa mi stong na de'i phyir de la byang chub sems dpa' thog mar 'di lta
187a1(mdo sde): ste/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ sems can kun rdzogs pas/ yang dag par ches bskyes do// de nas sems can de yang dag par yid ches bskyes nas
187a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de la dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa brnyed par 'gyur ro// de dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa rnyed pas/ de chos bstan du rung bar 'gyur/ byang
187a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dang 'thun par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems des de'i mdun du 'di lta ste/ pha mar sprul mngon par sprul te 'di skad zer ro// kye
187a4(mdo sde): skyes bu khyod ltos la 'gyod pa ma byed cig nga yang khyod kyi grogs te las 'di lta bus su yang shin tu sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am/ don thams cad las nyam
187a5(mdo sde): por 'gyur ba med do// las de lta bu'i ye shes kyis bsal du mi nus pa yang ma yin no// zhes de skad smras na pha ma srog dang bral nas kyang rdzun 'phrul de ston to//
187a6(mdo sde): de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas kyang pha ma srog dang bral na bdag dang 'dra ba lta ci zhig smos snyam mo// byang chub sems dpa'
187a7(mdo sde): de yang de'i sems can de la ci nas kyang de la ci nas kyang de sbrang ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba gyur de lta bur chos ston par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod
187a8(mdo sde): pa yod la gtsigs pa sel ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dpung gnyen byed pa'i thams la mkhas pa yin zhe na/
187b1(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang chos bstan pa'i snod du rung zhing nus pa dag mthong la de dag kyang shin tu mi dge ba'i las byed par gyur na/ de dag
187b2(mdo sde): gdul ba'i thabs byang chub sems dpa' sbal pa dag mngon par sprul te/ de la sems can gang rnams rgyal pos 'dul bar 'gyur de dag la rgyal por smra
187b3(mdo sde): pa mngon par sprul par byed do// sems can gang rnams bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang grong rdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la bram ze
187b4(mdo sde): dang rgyal rigs dang grong brdal gyi mi dang yul gyi mir sprul pa dang / sems can rnams las 'dul ba de dag la lhar sprul pa dang / gang lag na rdo rjes 'dul ba
187b5(mdo sde): de dag la lag na rdo rjer sprul pa mngon par byed do// sems can gang rnams 'jigs pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag la 'jigs pa ston/ sems can gang rnams
187b6(mdo sde): brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa gsang ba dang / bcings pas 'dul ba de dag la de 'dra bar ston/ sems can gang rnams nges pas 'dul ba de dag la des 'das/
187b7(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams mtshams med 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag la brgyab par 'dod pa de dag thams cad tshogs kyis zlog cing zil gyis mnon
187b8(mdo sde): par byed/ phyogs gzhan du yang bskor bar byed do// mtshams med par 'gyur ba'i dngos po sbas te/ de 'dra ba de'i mdun du sprul pa sprul pa ston to// yang na sems
188a1(mdo sde): can dmyal ba ston to// mngon par shes pa ma skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan ma shes pa ni byed 'dod pa dang / bsod pa'i
188a2(mdo sde): sems can de dag mthong nas snying rje chen po'i sems skye ste/ de yang 'di snyam du kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni phung bar byed 'dod pa'o// kye ma sems can 'di rnam
188a3(mdo sde): brlag par 'dod pa'o snyam du sems cing / de dag des lag 'thil du skya re'i 'bru bzhag pa ltar mthong nas mi dga' ba'i sems chen po skyes nas de yang 'di snyam du
188a4(mdo sde): sems so// bdag sems can gcig gi phyir yang sems can de phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su rab tu gzhan gyi bar du mnar med pa'i
188a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bkur bzod na/ sems can 'di rnams kyang mi dge ba'i las byas te/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'dod pa/ thabs gzhan
188a6(mdo sde): gyis ni bzlog par mi nus te/ sems can de rnams che yang med pa dag gcig lu yul gzhan du bskar ba 'am/ zil gyis gnan par bya ba de lta bu'i dbang ni bdag
188a7(mdo sde): la sems can 'di rnams mi dge ba'i las 'dis lus zhig nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar mi 'gyur drang zhes de'i phyir snying rje'i sems nye
188a8(mdo sde): bar bzhag nas las bdag gir bya ba 'thun par byas nas/ sems can de rnams la byams pa dang / khyab par byas nas thabs gzhan gyis mi nus nas chang pa
188b1(mdo sde): rab kyis chod nas/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dpung gnyen byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tshe ba'i thabs
188b2(mdo sde): nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpas sems can gang rnams 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shes par mi lcogs mi nus te/ zas dang
188b3(mdo sde): gos lhur 'dzin cing ngo kho nas cho ga par rtse ba mthong na/ de rnams la byang chub sems dpa' yi ge dang lhan bcos dang / lag rtsis dang grangs dang shod thabs la sog
188b4(mdo sde): ba'i las dge ba dang ldan pa ston te/ mi dge ba dang ldan pa mi ston to// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can 'tsho ba'i thabs nye bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yino//
188b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rab rtsam thob na yang len te/ dngos po ngan
188b6(mdo sde): pa zhig thob na yang len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems can 'di dag ni ser sna can brkam pa chags pa zil
188b7(mdo sde): gyis gnon par 'jugs pa yin te/ rgyu dang rkyen de dag gzhi des nu'i phung po chen pos non pa gzhin du/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung nub byed pa de/ dag la na
188b8(mdo sde): yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de blangs nas bdag gir mi byed chags pa'i sems mi skyed do// gzhan du ra sems can thams cad
189a1(mdo sde): dang thun mong du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi bya ba byed do// sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la phan pa byed do// sbyin pa'i bdag
189a2(mdo sde): po de yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' byar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' len pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang
189a3(mdo sde): nub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
189a4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes shing nub pa zhig la/ de yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thob par rtsol zhing 'dab pa des brtson 'grus rtsom pa
189a5(mdo sde): mthong na/ de gnas de nas bslangs te/ za na 'khor dbye ba yang byas nas 'jog pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su
189a6(mdo sde): slong ba'i thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang yang dag par gzeng stong pa dang / yang dag
189a7(mdo sde): par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems
189a8(mdo sde): bskyed du 'jug/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sems can le lo can brtson 'grus chung ba tshul khrims tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dag ni brtsan 'grus la 'jog/
189b1(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams bslab pa kun spyod pa/ phra mo la dga' ba dag rgyu dang rkyen de dang gzhi des sems can kun kheb shing 'khod pa yin/ dga' 'gur rangs pa ya
189b2(mdo sde): mi rnyed pa de dag la ci nas kyang gnas de las ldang ba de da lta de lta bur chos ston par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / ya
189b3(mdo sde): dag par gzeng stod pa dang / yang dag par shin tu dga' bar byed pa'i thabs la mkhas par byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
189b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bar gyur nas rnyed pa chung yang chos
189b5(mdo sde): rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa yin/ de cig pu lkog du song ste/ rab tu dben par gnas nas de 'di ltar sems te/ ma la bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /
189b6(mdo sde): rim gro bya bar bsam mo snyam nas de de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya bar rnam pa sna tshogs sems ste/ de ltar na sems pa de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom
189b7(mdo sde): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ci ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/ de la gang mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba mngon par byed
189b8(mdo sde): pa 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro ba gang sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems skye ba 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa'o//
190a1(mdo sde): mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sems mngon par mos shing shin tu dga' ba 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa
190a2(mdo sde): dang rim gro bya ba de dag la gang sems mi skyod pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dge nyid la gang nye bar rtog pa 'di ni bsam
190a3(mdo sde): btan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de dag nyid la gang sna tshogs pa 'di ni de'i shes rab pha rol du phyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub
190a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa
190a5(mdo sde): thabs mkhas pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam phun sum tshogs pa yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
190a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ mi dman pa'i smon lam rnams yin/ ma zhum pa'i smon lam rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam rnams yin/ sangs
190a7(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam rnams yin/ gzhan gyi dring la mi
190a8(mdo sde): 'jog pa'i smon lam rnams yin/ mtha' yang ba'i smon lam pa rnams yin/ yongs su smon lam pa rnams yin/ legs par yongasu rdzogs pa'i smon lam
190b1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dman pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i bde ba
190b2(mdo sde): 'dod cing smon lam mi 'debs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas lham pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam
190b3(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum las skyod pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog par smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub
190b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma zhum pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
190b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di ltar sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa ma lus par thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas/ bdag phyis sangs rgyas kyi yongs su
190b6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smon lam 'debs ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don la brtson pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji
190b7(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar byang
190b8(mdo sde): chub kyi sems ma skye ba'i sems can gyi khams ci snyed pa thams cad byang chub du sems bskyed du bcug ste/ mthar gyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod du btsud nas bya ba
191a1(mdo sde): chub kyi snying por 'dug pa rnams la mchod pa dang bkun sti bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba gdab bo// yongs su
191a2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir bzhugasu gsol lo zhes smon lam 'debs ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thas
191a3(mdo sde): cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di
191a4(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ci nas kyi sgra 'am/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams
191a5(mdo sde): 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bya'o zhes smon lam 'debs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad shin tu tshar gcod pa'i smon lam
191a6(mdo sde): pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par/ bla na
191a7(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyis shes rab kyis spyad de/ sems can gyi khams kyi
191a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal la stas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub slom 'debs te/ de ltan byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i smon
191b1(mdo sde): lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi tshogs rnams
191b2(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' zhig gzung nas snying po'i smon lam mi 'debs kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
191b3(mdo sde): gcugs gnas/ byang chub kyi tshogs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang /
191b4(mdo sde): gang dag dka' spyod pa la gnas pa dang / gang dag byang chub kyi tshogs nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
191b5(mdo sde): dag phyogs bcu na gnas pa dang / gang dag bka' ba spyod pa la/ gnas pa dang / gang dag byang chub kyi snying po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas gang dag mngon
191b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dag rnams la snying thag pa nas brtsams te/ de dag gis chos bstan pa ci snyed pa de dag la
191b7(mdo sde): mos par byed do// mos par gyur nas rjes su yid rang ngo // rjes su yid rang nas tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su sngo ste/ de ltar na
191b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
192a1(mdo sde): las dang po pa yin zhe na/ chos zab mo rnams thos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba zab mo thos pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams
192a2(mdo sde): par rol zab mo thos pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul zab mo zos kyang mi skrag mi dngas dngas par mi 'gyur ro// de 'di snyam du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mtha
192a3(mdo sde): yas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sems can yongasu smin par mdzad pa yang mtha' yas te/ de ni bdag 'dra bas shes par mi nus te/ sangs
192a4(mdo sde): rgyas dag nyid kyis mkhyen gyi bdag gis mi shes so snyam du sems te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag pa'i smon lam pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems
192a5(mdo sde): dpa' yongasu mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu rgod sems can 'dul rga ba dang de rnams kyis yi chad nas 'di lta bu'i dmu
192a6(mdo sde): rgod 'di lta bur gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis chog go zhes rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongasu dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar yang
192a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi khams yongs su dag par smon lam 'debs so// sems can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
192a8(mdo sde): ni yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yang mi 'gyur te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can
192b1(mdo sde): gang rnams brtson 'grus chung ba blun po glen pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can sems kyi khams ma lus pa 'di las
192b2(mdo sde): bsnyigs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spangs par gyur pa yod pa de dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/
192b3(mdo sde): bdag gis de dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug du bcug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du seMs
192b4(mdo sde): bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems pa'i sems skyed pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i
192b5(mdo sde): bsngags pa gsung bar 'gyur ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs/
192b6(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba'i smon lam pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' legs par yongasasu rdzogs pa'i
192b7(mdo sde): smon lam pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bdud kyi dpung gzhom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192b8(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 'tshang rgya ba dang / yang de las par smon lam mi 'debs pa 'di ni legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i smon lam pa zhes bya'o// 'di
193a1(mdo sde): lta ste dper na mar ram 'bru mar gyi snod khang cad du gang ste/ lhag par rdul phra rab tsam gyi thigs pa yang ma shong na/ de'i phyir e ma'o
193a2(mdo sde): snod gang ba e ma ho snod shin tu gang ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa smon lam legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir smon la
193a3(mdo sde): ma rdzogs brdul phra rab tsam yang med do// de bas na legs par yongasu rdzogs pa'i smon lam zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
193a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' smon lam phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// / rigs kyi bu chos dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs
193a5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams
193a6(mdo sde): yin/ bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab stobs phun sum chog pa rnams yin/ 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin//
193a7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ dbang gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ gzungs kyi stobs phum sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rnam par mi
193a8(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bka' mi gtsigs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems
193b1(mdo sde): dpa' zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' pha rol rgol ba kun gyis zil gyi mi non pa yin te/ de ltar na
193b2(mdo sde): zil mi non pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
193b3(mdo sde): de'i stobs la gang stobs kyi thub pa'i sems can de ni sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi tshugs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa yino// /
193b4(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sa ma bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs 'jig rten
193b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa de gang yang med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi stobs phun sum tshogs rnams yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dang /
193b6(mdo sde): shes rab kyi stob phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang yang
193b7(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes rab kyis ma mthong ba dang / mngon byas pa dang / khong du ma chud pa de dag med de/ de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi stobs phun sum
193b8(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor tshul khrims nyams pa ma yin
194a1(mdo sde): lta ba nyams pa ma yin/ cho ga nyams pa ma yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni byang chub sems
194a2(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams nyid yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi
194a3(mdo sde): stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi
194a4(mdo sde): yul thams cad zil gyis gnon te/ de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pa mchog gis zil gyis gnan to// 'dod na 'dzam bu gling skra nyag ma cig gi rtse mo la 'jo
194a5(mdo sde): gode bzhin du gling bzhi pa dang / stong gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang stong gonyi dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so// 'dod na gang ga'i klung gi bye
194a6(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi khams rdul phra rab cig la 'jog go/ de bzhin du gling bye ma snyed gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang bcu dang nyi shu dang sum bcu dang lnga bcu nas brjod du med pa'i yang
194a7(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gyi khams rdul phra rab de la gang ba dang bri bar yang mi mngon te/ 'jig rten khams de rnams kyang phan tshun du 'dres par
194a8(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/ sems can de rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzun 'phrul gyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub
194b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che/
194b2(mdo sde): sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob po// de 'dod na brjod du med pa yang brjod du byang chub sems dpa' 'dod na stong gsuM gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
194b3(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byin gyis rlob po// de 'dod na brjod du med pa yang brjod du med par 'jig rten khams kyi bar du/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
194b4(mdo sde): gyis yongs su gang ba byin gyis rlob ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang gi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na gzungs kyi stobs phun sum
194b5(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig/
194b6(mdo sde): tha dad pa dang / brjod pa tha dad pa dang tshul tha dad pa'i chos bshad pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' skad cig yud tsam thang cig gcig la thams cad 'dzin par byed/
194b7(mdo sde): khong du chud par byed/ sgom par byed/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi/
194b8(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa'i byin gyis bslabs kyi stobs phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
195a1(mdo sde): 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpas byin gyis rlabs byin gyis brlabs pa la/ gang
195a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'khrugs par byed pa'i sems can de lta bu'i sems can gyi ris na med de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i byin gyis rlabs pi
195a3(mdo sde): sems can de lta bu'i sems can gyi ris na ma mtho stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcig bri
195a4(mdo sde): stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// thabs mkhas sa ma rtogs par byang chub sems dpa'i bka' gcog pa'i sems can de lta bu'i sems can gyi
195a5(mdo sde): ris na ma ma mthong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' mi gcog pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
195a6(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stobs phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chu sems dpa' ye shes phun/
195a7(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos la bdag med pa'i
195a8(mdo sde): ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ nye tshe ba'i ma yin pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum/
195b1(mdo sde): tsho gas pa rnams yin/ byin gyis rlabs med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sun tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems
195b2(mdo sde): can thams can gyi ye shes rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ lhan gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi
195b3(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems
195b4(mdo sde): dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnams skye ba yang yang dag par mtho/
195b5(mdo sde): de 'jig pa dang 'gog pa yang yang dag par mthong ngo // des phung po skye ba rnams snying po med pa dang / byed pa med pa dang / gsog tu yang dag par mthong / phung po
195b6(mdo sde): 'gag pa rnams 'jig par yang dag par mthong ste/ de 'di snyam du phung po 'di dag ni bdag med pa sems can med pa srog med pa gsob med pa/ gang zag med
195b7(mdo sde): pa yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang byis pa so so'i skye bo bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di dag 'di ltar bdag cag gi phung po rnams bdago/ bdag cag gi phung po
195b8(mdo sde): rnams la bdag yod do// bdag cag gi phung po rnams ni bdag po can no snyam ste/ de dag bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas/ de kho na nyid khong du mi chud //
196a1(mdo sde): de kho na nyid khong du ma chud pas/ mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'khor ba na 'khyam mo snyam du sems shing de thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yang
196a2(mdo sde): dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gang zag la bdag med pa'i ye she phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
196a3(mdo sde): chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos su sgro 'dogs pa dang / chos la skur pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
196a4(mdo sde): du rab tu shes te/ de 'di snyam du glo bur du byung ba'i chos la kun brtags pa'i ming bdags te/ chos de yang de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin/ yi ni de dag kyang de dag de'i ngo bo nyi/
196a5(mdo sde): ma yin/ 'di ni ming tsam dang tha snyad tsam du bya'o// 'di la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// glo bur byung ba'i chos de yang thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa ma yin /
196a6(mdo sde): gzhan gyi rkyen dang gzhan gyi rten la sdod pa dang / gzhan gyi rkyen rnams kyis 'byung zhing rkyen dang bral na 'gag pa'i chos 'di ni thams cad byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa
196a7(mdo sde): ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub dpa' nye tshe ba ma
196a8(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi che ba'i ye shes skad cig gcig la 'jug cing skad cig gnyis pa la mi yin gyi byang chub sems
196b1(mdo sde): dpa'i ye shes mthong ba ni skad cig thams cad la thogs pa med par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyi tshe ba ma ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar
196b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu/
196b3(mdo sde): shes rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rab tu shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang
196b4(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ des ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la nyan thos spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul
196b5(mdo sde): gang la rang sangs rgyas spyod pa de yang rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spod yul gang la byang chub sems dpa'i spod pa de yang rab tu shes/
196b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gang dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gang la de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa de yang rab tu shes te/ de bzhin gshegs po'i ting nge 'dzin de yang / rab
196b7(mdo sde): tu shes kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis ni ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rnam par smin pas grub pa'i rang gi ye shes kyis rab tu shes te/ de lta/
196b8(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlabs kyi ye shes phun sum chog
197a1(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi byin gyis brlabs kyang ci lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlab
197a2(mdo sde): kyang rab tu shes/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyang ci lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes na/ sems can de ma yin pa gzhan dag gi lta ci smos te/ de ltar na byang
197a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gyis brlabs kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang
197a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i ye shes ni mu stegs can thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin te/ de ltar na
197a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi 'phrogs pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyod las la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa
197a6(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yongs su dag pa dag pa dang zhing rnyog pa med pas sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ste/ des de na sems can la la
197a7(mdo sde): byang chu sems tu sos bskyed pa dang dang / la la byang chub kyi sems bsgrub pa dag dang / la la byang chub tu sems mi bsgrub pa dang / la la sa dang po la gnas pa dag dang /
197a8(mdo sde): sa// la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dag dang / la la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba dag la la bya ba kun byas te/ la la mya nga
197b1(mdo sde): las 'da' ba dag dang / la la nyan thos kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag dang / la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das
197b2(mdo sde): pa dag dang / la la bde 'gror skye ba dag dang / la la ngan 'gror skye ba dang / de ltar sems can thams cad kyi spod pa la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa
197b3(mdo sde): sems can thathos kyi spyod pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhan gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs
197b4(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni spyod lam/ 'greng ba 'am/ 'dug pa'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba na lhan gyis grub pa'i ye shes 'byung ste/ 'di lta
197b5(mdo sde): ste dper na mi gnyis kyis log pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa lhan gyis grub cing 'byung ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yang de bzhin du blta'o// ye she
197b6(mdo sde): de yang thams cad du mi chags par 'jug ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dang
197b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi ye shes kye shes kyi mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mtshan nyid mtshungs
197b8(mdo sde): par yang rab tu shes/ mtshan nyid gcig pa yang rab tu shes/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du yang
198a1(mdo sde): tu shes/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad nyid kyi ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems
198a2(mdo sde): dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ye shes 'jig rten thams cad
198a3(mdo sde): las 'das pa dang ldan pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
198a4(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang
198a5(mdo sde): mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ yangs shing tshad med pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnam yin/ gnod pa dang lan
198a6(mdo sde): du phan du 'dogs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos kyi
198a7(mdo sde): sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa rnams yin rin po che'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/ rtse chen po'i snod du gyur pa rnams yin/ mi sprul ba rnams yin/ mi sdang ba rnams yin//
198a8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs shing tshad med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po zhi thams cad du yangs shing tshad med do// /
198b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kun tu yangs shing tshad med pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yangs
198b2(mdo sde): shing tshad med pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po ni 'di ltar
198b3(mdo sde): yo byad rnams de dang de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi mtsho bar gyur pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang smin pa dang / tshul khris dang / bzod
198b4(mdo sde): pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang la sogs pa byang chub kyi tshogs rnams phan par 'gyur ba'i yo byad rnam pa du ma de dang de dag gis
198b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa
198b6(mdo sde): gnod pa la lan du phan 'dogs pa dang ma bral ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste rigs kyi bu dper na/ sa chen pos ni gnod pas kyang zhe 'gres par mi 'gyur/ phan pa dag
198b7(mdo sde): gis kyang rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te/ de ni sems can de dag la rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba yang mi skye ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnod pa dang /
198b8(mdo sde): lan du phan 'dogs pa dang ma bral ba yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun tu zed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sa chen po
199a1(mdo sde): ni sprin chen po las bab pa'i chu'i klung chen po kun zed de/ bzod pa kun 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
199a2(mdo sde): chos kyi sprin chen po las chos kyi 'od chen po rab tu phan pa kun zad cing bzod pa 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sprin chen po kun zed pa yin no//
199a3(mdo sde): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni sems can thams cad 'gro ba
199a4(mdo sde): dang 'ongs pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin no// de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' yang bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas su gyur pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
199a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyis gnas su gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi
199a6(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa bon thams cad ni sa chen po gzhir gyur pa las skye ba'o// de bzhin du sems can thams cad dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon thams cad kyang byang chub seMs
199a7(mdo sde): dpa' gzhin gyur pa las skyes te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos kyi sa bon gyi gzhir gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i
199a8(mdo sde): snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kun snang ba ste/ sa chen po la rin po che sna tshogs kun snang ngo //
199b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon tan rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' la yon tan rin po che sna tshogs/
199b2(mdo sde): kun snang ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin po che'i snod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin zhe na/
199b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi chen po gang dag nad rnam sna tshogs zhi bar gyur pa dag kyang sa chen po la gnas te 'jig rten na snang ngo // de bzhin du gang dag gis
199b4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i nang rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rtsi chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gnas shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/
199b5(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rtsi chen po'i snod du gyur pa yin no// ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' mi skul ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen
199b6(mdo sde): po 'di ltar sha sbrang dang sbrang bu dang / rlung dang nyi ma dang sbrul gyis reg pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi skal ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
199b7(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad las byung ba'i phyi nang gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi sgul ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skal ba yin/
199b8(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi ldang ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po ni glang po che'i rgyal po dang / ri dgos kyi rgyal
200a1(mdo sde): po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra zos kyang mi skrag mi dngas dngas par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bdud dang mu
200a2(mdo sde): stegs can thams cad kyi sgra thos na/ mi skrag mi dngas dngas par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi dngas pa yin no// /
200a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub seMs
200a4(mdo sde): dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i ches la gzhol ba rnams yin/ kar po chos thams cad skyed pa rnams yin/ dgapa
200a5(mdo sde): ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul pa rnams yin/ dang zhing rnyog pa med de gsal ba rnams
200a6(mdo sde): yin/ nyon mongs pa'i yongs su gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la zlog pa rnams yin/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ mthon
200a7(mdo sde): dman 'gengs pa rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad zhi bar byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci lta byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol
200a8(mdo sde): ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni gzhol bar 'gro ba dang / gzhol bar rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dge ba'i chos la
200b1(mdo sde): gzhol zhing dge ba'i chos kyi phyir rgyu ba yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos la gzhol ba yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpar dkar po'i chos
200b2(mdo sde): thams cad skye ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na chu ni rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad skyed de/ skyes pas rnams kyang phyir zhing rgyas
200b3(mdo sde): par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi chus byang chub kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed do// skyes pa rnams kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
200b4(mdo sde): kyi shin tu gyur pa'i bar du phyir yang rgyas par byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing du gyur pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu'i rnam pa sna tshogs
200b5(mdo sde): dag gis sems can rnams tsho bar gyur pa/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dkar po'i chos thams cad skyed pa yin no// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba
200b6(mdo sde): dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gshir ba can yin zhe na/ chu ni ngo bo nyid kyis gsher ba can yin te/ gzhan yang gsher bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
200b7(mdo sde): dpa' yang ngo bo nyid kyis dpa' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin te/ sems can gzhan yang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba
200b8(mdo sde): can du byed do// de la dga' ba dang ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba'o// dad pa ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la rten pa'o// rangs pa ni gang sems
201a1(mdo sde): dag ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa'i gsher ba can yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
201a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/ ji ltar na rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni shing rnam pa dang / rtsa'i rnams pa'i rtsa dag gi rgyun rnams srul lo// /
201a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sgom pa la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i rgyun thams cad srul te/ ji ltar na nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba'i
201a4(mdo sde): rgyun 'di dag ming yang mi shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba'i bag chags kyang men par 'gyur ba de lta bur bskul te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs
201a5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyun thams cad srel pa'i yin no// ji ltar na dang zhing rnyog pa med pa gsal ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu ni rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa
201a6(mdo sde): med pas gsal lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis dang zhing rnyog pa med pa gsal ba yin no// de la bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba dang
201a7(mdo sde): bral bas na dang ba'o// 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang bral bas rnyog pa med pa'o// dbang po rab tu dang bas na gsal ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub dpa'
201a8(mdo sde): dang zhing snyog pa med de gsal ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed ce na/ chu ni sa chen po dpyid kyi tsha bas gdungs
201b1(mdo sde): kha dang / de las gzhan yang sems can rnams dpyid kyi tsha bas bdungs pa rnams rab tu zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pas gdungs
201b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad chos kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mos pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// ji ltar na byang
201b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa bzlog pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni skem pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi skom pa rnam par zlog go/
201b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yul la srid pas nyen pa'i sems can nye ba dag la gang gis sems can de dag gi yul la srid pa ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
201b5(mdo sde): chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa la sred pa zlog par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzang cing gting dpag
201b6(mdo sde): bka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu mdzings ni zab cing gting dpag dka' yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par
201b7(mdo sde): sgrub pa yang 'di lta ste/ bdud thams cad dang mu stegs thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' zhing zab pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i zab cing ting dpag
201b8(mdo sde): dka' ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ chu'i klung ni sa phyogs mthon dman 'gengaso/
202a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu klung gyis sems can de rnams la snying rtse ba'i phyir te/ ji ltar na chus 'gengs pa ltar sems
202a2(mdo sde): can la gnod pa byed pa de lta bu byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa sems can de rnams la snying rtse ba'i phyir chos kyi chu klung 'bebs shing de dag la gnod par mi byed de/
202a3(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mthon dman 'gengs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe
202a4(mdo sde): ne/ rigs kyi bu 'di sta ste dper na/ chus ni sa phyogs skams zhing rdul 'thul ba thams cad snum par byed cing rdal de dag zhi bar byed do// de bzhin du byang
202a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang sems can sems rtsub pa rnams 'di lta ste/ shes rab la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi chus sems snum pa byed cing / sems can de
202a6(mdo sde): dag gi nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no//
202a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chu dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// // rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dang
202a8(mdo sde): me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams cad kyang sreg par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
202b1(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad kyang skam par byed/ me'i phung po dang 'dra ba rnams yin/ snang bar gyur pa rnams yin/ skrag par
202b2(mdo sde): byed pa rnams yin/ dbugs 'byin pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa rnams yin/ mchod par bgyid pa rnams yin/ mi brnyas pa
202b3(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i khung thams cad sreg ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me ni phyag
202b4(mdo sde): dar dang khung dang rtsa dang shing dang gel ba dang sdong po thams cad sreg go/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes kyi bag la nyel ba dang / kun nas ldang /
202b5(mdo sde): ba dang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi nyon mong ba'i phyag dar khung thams cad sreg ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i phyag dar khung thams
202b6(mdo sde): cad sreg pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni lo tog dang rtsi dang sdong
202b7(mdo sde): po'i rnam pa thams cad sreg par smin par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis nang gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongasu smin par byed na/ ji ltar
202b8(mdo sde): 'jig par ma 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su smin par byed do// de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs
203a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'das thams cad skam par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni chu bran gyi 'dam thams cad skam par byed do// de bzhin du
203a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis zag pa nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad skam par byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i 'dam thams cad
203a3(mdo sde): skam par byed do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can drang ba'i nad kyis nyin pa'i grang ba med pa'i
203a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir me'i phung po byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i grang ba'i nad gyis btab pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i drang ba'i nad med
203a5(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rab tu dro bar byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po dang 'dra ba yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snang bar gyur pa
203a6(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dper na/ gangs kyi rtse mo 'am/ ri 'bigs byed kyi rtse mo na/ me'i phung po chen po 'bar ba des dpag tshad cig kho ra khor yug du snang bar byed/
203a7(mdo sde): dpag tshad gnyis kho ra khor yug dang / dpag tshad gsum kho ra khor yug du yang snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes snang bas dpag tshad brgyar
203a8(mdo sde): yang khyab par byed/ dpag tshad stong khyab par byed/ dpag tshad brgya phrag brgyar yang khyab par byed pa nas 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa'i bar du yang khyab
203b1(mdo sde): par byas nas/ sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang bar byed de/ ye shes kyi snang ba des mi shes pa'i yun nag thams cad rnam par sel te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
203b2(mdo sde): dpa' snang bar gyur pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i skrag par byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ri dgas khro bo 'am ri dgas kyi rgyal po khro bo'i
203b3(mdo sde): me'i phung po mthong na/ skrag cing dngas dngas par gyur cing 'di lta ste/ me'i 'jigs pas skrag nas de las ring bas kyang shin tu ring bar snang ngo // de bzhin du bdud rnams
203b4(mdo sde): sam bdud kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas/ skrag cing dngang la dngang par gyur cing / 'di lta ste gzi brjid chung ba'i phyir/ gang du byang chub sems dpa' rnams
203b5(mdo sde): kyi ming yang mi thos na/ mthong ba lta mos kyang smos pas/ rang ba bas kyang shin tu ring bar sa'i phyogs der spong ngo // de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skrag par byed do// ji
203b6(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mi la la zhig 'brog dgon par 'khyams pa las me'i yung po chen po mthong ste/ de de
203b7(mdo sde): logasu song ba dang / des den grong ngam/ rdzing bu bran mthong nas de shugs phyin te/ rab tu dbugs phyin nas 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
203b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa ru/ 'khyams pa'i sems can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' mthong na shugs phyin par 'gyur rab tu dbugs phyin par 'gyur/
204a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub
204a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems can thams can kyi thun mong du 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du 'gyur ba ste/ ji ltar
204a3(mdo sde): rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gangol bu lu yang de bzhin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems cad thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa yin te/ ji ltar
204a4(mdo sde): rgyal po la phan par nye bar gnas pa ltar gdol bu la yang de bzhin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi 'thun mong du gyur pa yin no//
204a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me lha ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi rnams kyis
204a6(mdo sde): mchod do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste dper na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston par 'du shes pas
204a7(mdo sde): mchod te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya ba yin no// ji ltar na mi brnyas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me stag chung ngu yang tshig pa'i
204a8(mdo sde): bdag nyid yin pas na mi bsnyas pa yin no// de bzhin du mos pa la spyod pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthu stobs rnyed pa theg chen po la gnas pa yang lha dang
