204b1(mdo sde): mi dang lha yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brnyed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'
204b2(mdo sde): 'di ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar khong du chud de/ de ltar na
204b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mi brnyas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' me dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// /
204b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar dang tshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas med par spong ba dang / spyod yul
204b5(mdo sde): kun tu mu med pa dang / sems can nga rgyal gyis bsnyems pa'i rtse mo 'thong zhing 'jig la rab tu snyil bar byed pa dang / chos char sprin chen po kun nas skyes pa dang /
204b6(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la chos dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs dbyung ba dang dang
204b7(mdo sde): rngub po'i srog nye bar sbyor ba dang / chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin pa dang / chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba
204b8(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par 'byed cing / yongs su dgod pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par nges pa
205a1(mdo sde): me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tutu mngon par 'bebs pa dang / skal pa grangs med par kar po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su brtsegs pa ting nge/
205a2(mdo sde): 'dzin dang rnam pa thams cad dang gzugs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang ri rab dang 'od dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang / nags dang khang pa dang / dge pa'i 'khor yug ri las
205a3(mdo sde): sogs pa yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla med pa lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur ba'i
205a4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper
205a5(mdo sde): na rlung mar ni thams cad du thogs pa med cing gnas med rten med cing / gzugs med kyang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang ri rab dang /
205a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la sogs pa thams cad la rang gi dgos pa byed par snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos thams cad la kun tu mi gnas pa yin te/
205a7(mdo sde): phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes dang / mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khas
205a8(mdo sde): dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sde khams dang dri'i khams dang /
205b1(mdo sde): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / re'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang /
205b2(mdo sde): lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / mig gi skye mched dang / gzugs
205b3(mdo sde): kyi skye mched dang / rna ba'i skye mched dang / sgra'i skye mched dang / sna'i skye mched dang / dri'i skye mched dang / lce'i skye mched dang / ro'i skye mched dang / lus kyi skye
205b4(mdo sde): kyi skye mched dang / reg bya'i skye mched dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / gzugs kyi skye mched la mi gnas pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang / 'jig rten las
205b5(mdo sde): 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / lha dang mi'i lus phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'khor los sbyar ba dang / rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag tu
205b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dag dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag du 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa rnams dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid dag
205b7(mdo sde): la yang gnas par mi byed de/ de thams cad mi gnas pas/ dngos po dang dpo med pa dang / gcig pa dang / tha dad pa dang / de bzhin nyid las sogs pa yang med
205b8(mdo sde): la/ rlom sems kyi rnam pa du mdu mas ma gyur cing / dmigs pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul dang / ldan pas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
206a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa yid med la phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa mu med par 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sems can thams cad
206a2(mdo sde): kyi don thams cad kyi don thams cad kyi dron thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par thams cad du yang rgyal chos kyi lus kyis mi
206a3(mdo sde): snang ba yang yin zhing mi rtog rnam par rtog ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med par spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
206a4(mdo sde): yul kun tu mu med pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med par red par byed cing g.yo zhing rgyu'o// /
206a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang chos mu med pa dag kun rdzob dang / don dam par kun nas mthong zhing rgyas par byed/ reg par byed/ rnam
206a6(mdo sde): par 'god cing ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas
206a7(mdo sde): dag tu yid kyis mgyogs pa dang ldan zhing phyogs thams cad kyi mthar thug pa'i spyod par g.yo bar gyur nas rgyu zhing 'gro ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpe
206a8(mdo sde): spyod yul mu med pa dang ldan pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis bsnyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig rten la rab tu
206b1(mdo sde): rnyil bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni ri dang / khyim dang / nags tshal gyi rtse mo dag 'dud par byed rab tu rnyil par byed/
206b2(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig par byed mthong bar byed/ mi snang bar byed de/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rlung mar yang sems can nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang dregs pa dang /
206b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten la lta ba la rtse mos snyems pa rnams gzugs dang / dar la bab pa dang / longs spyod dang / dbang dang / stobs dang / tshe dang nad med pa dang /
206b4(mdo sde): 'tsho ba dang / bzod pa dang / thos pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / g.yog dang / smra mkhas pa dang dpal che ba'i dregs par myos pa dag dang / yang dag pa'i
206b5(mdo sde): nan tan gyis bdag spyod pa rnams la de dang / khyad zhags pa'i phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa dang / chos bstan pas/ nga rgyal choms par byed pa dge ba'i dri
206b6(mdo sde): ma med pa la sbyor ba byed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis bsnyems pa'i rtse mo 'thor zhing 'jig la rab tu rnyil bar byed pa yin no//
206b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin chen po kun nas skyed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni phyogs bzhi nas
206b8(mdo sde): sprin gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog sna tshogs can dang / zab cing gsal ba gnyen cing 'jam pa'i 'brug sgra rgya mtsho'i dbyangs can bruM nga'i ro sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin
207a1(mdo sde): cing yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs rjes su grags pa dang / glog gi 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba
207a2(mdo sde): khrag khrig stong phrag brgyad dag kun nas yongs su khyebs par byed de/ 'gro ba thams cad dag par/ lo tog dang sdong po yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir/ char gyi
207a3(mdo sde): rgyun rin po che rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bebs pa'i sprin chen po kun nas slong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang lus sna tshogs
207a4(mdo sde): kyi sprin sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang ba byed pa 'od zer kha dog mtha' yas pa'i grob
207a5(mdo sde): gi 'phreng bas rgyan 'byung ba yid dag pa de kho na nyid kyi/ chos kyi 'brug sgra yan lag stong phrag drug bcu pas sgrog pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlung mar gyis yang dag pa
207a6(mdo sde): mtho ba chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi namI'i khyab par byed dag dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas khyebs par byas shing / ngan
207a7(mdo sde): song dang / mi khom pa las la sogs pa nas/ sems can rnams rnam par bslang ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mtshan dang dpe byed bzang po dang / 'od kyi dkyil
207a8(mdo sde): 'khor gyi snang ba/ rnam par dag pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te bkod pa thams cad kyi brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang byi gyis brlabs nas/ lha dang
207b1(mdo sde): mi'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa mchog tu gyur pa/ dga' ba dang / bde ba'i mchog thob pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
207b2(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i chos dkar po'i lo tog dang / sdong po thams cad rnam par bskyed pa dang / thams cad du skyid par chos kyi dbang skur ba'i phyir/ sems can
207b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / rgud pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi char chen po mngon par 'bebs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang
207b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos kyi char sprin 'bebs pa kun nas skyed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba thams cad nyon mongs pa'i gdung
207b5(mdo sde): ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlang mar dri zhim po'i char gyi snying po can ldan na/ sems can rnams kyi gdung ba yongs su zhi bar
207b6(mdo sde): byas shing lus shin tu sim pa dang sim par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug
207b7(mdo sde): dang / ngan 'gro dang / ngan par lta ba dang / nyes byas dang / the tshoms dang phongs pa mi bzang ba dang / yul la sred pa dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bral
207b8(mdo sde): zhing brang ba dang / nad rnams bcil nas dam pa yin pa'i chos la sred pa la sogs pa'i gdung ba dag dam pa'i chos kyi tsher dang 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i
208a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang / smon lam dang / mthong ba dang / reg pa dang 'grogs pa dang / bstan pa don yod pa la sogs
208a2(mdo sde): pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos
208a3(mdo sde): dkar po las 'thun par 'byung ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog nye bar spor ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub
208a4(mdo sde): kha'i rlung gi mthus sems can thams cad 'tsho ba'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mngon par bsgrubs pa dang byang chub sems dpas bstabs pa'i chos dkar
208a5(mdo sde): ba'i rlung mar nye bar sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyod pas kyang / sems thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/
208a6(mdo sde): rlung mar ni 'jig rten khams thams cad du 'di lta ste// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams dang / khor yug gi ri dag dang / khor yug chen po rnams dang / gling chen po
208a7(mdo sde): bzhin yongs su 'dzin pa'i gser gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dang / rgya mtsho rin po che 'byung ba dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang ri rab chen po dang / de ma yin pa'i rin po
208a8(mdo sde): che'i ri dang / gangs dang ri spos kyi ngang dang ldan pa dang / grong rdal dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang dang / mdzam bu'i gling dag dang / gling chen po bzhi dag dang /
208b1(mdo sde): stong dag dang / stong gnyis dag dang / stong gsum gyi stongs chen po dkod pa rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub po// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
208b2(mdo sde): rlung mar yang phyogs bcu kun tu sems can thams cad gyi bsod nams kyi phun sum tshogs pa nye bar sgrub po// skyed do yongs su gzhag go/ de la ci ltar gangs
208b3(mdo sde): kyi ri phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams phun sum tshogs lci'o// ji ltar gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri rab phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni/
208b4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// ji ltar na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar ni rang sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnaMs
208b5(mdo sde): blta'o// ji ltar na stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin no// ji ltar stong
208b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sum tshogs pa de ltar ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
208b7(mdo sde): cad kyi nam mi khyams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i shin tu rnam par grangs pa mchod pa la dmyigs pa thams cad la yang dag par gnas pa rnams kyi thams mngon du byas nas/
208b8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams brgya'i mtshan dang ldan pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ phun sum tshogs pa rnams blta'o// de la rgya mtsho ltar ni ting nge 'dzin
209a1(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po rnams blta'o// gling dang bar gyi gling dang / ri gzhan dang gling chen po bzhi pa logs pa ltar na sbyar ba dang gzungs dang sems can/
209a2(mdo sde): yongasu smin par bya ba dang / slob ma'i dge 'dun la sogs pa blta'o// grong rdal dang nags tshal dang gzhal med khang ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i
209a3(mdo sde): yon rten bkod pa rnams blta'o// dpag bsam gyi shing gi nags tshal rnams ltar ni sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs dang mngon par
209a4(mdo sde): shes pa dang / rig pa dang ye shes dang snang ba dang / dbang dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang //
209a5(mdo sde): ma 'dres pa dang / thugs rje chen po la sogs pa dbang sgyur ba dam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i tshogs rnams blta'o// rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
209a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ phyogs bcu'i phyog re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang
209a7(mdo sde): ga'i klung grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad stongs gsum phrag bcu'i 'khor los rgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po
209a8(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur la/ de lta bu'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam pa de bsdoms pa dang / 'khor
209b1(mdo sde): los sgyur ba chen po gcig gcig ldan par 'gyur te/ rna grangs de shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtog/
209b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can de snyed cig 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de dang 'dra ba nyid dang so sor ldan par gyur la/ snga ma bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams cud
209b3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dbyings mthas gtugs pa dag ni/ sems can yod do cho ga ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu sha stag dang so sor
209b4(mdo sde): ldan par gyur te/ de bzhin du bgrab de nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de snyid du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan pa'i brgya byin sha
209b5(mdo sde): stag du gyur pa/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i glang grangs med pa'i bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i brgya byin rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung /
209b6(mdo sde): po ci tsam pa de dang / brgya byin cig gcig ldan par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtogs pa thams
209b7(mdo sde): cad ni/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de thams brgya byin de dang 'dra ba sha stag du gyur pa/ bgrang ba de nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi
209b8(mdo sde): khams gang gi'i klung grangs med pa bye ma snyed du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen por gyur pa/ bsod nams de thams cad gcig du
210a1(mdo sde): bsdoms pa dang / tshangs pachen po cig gcig ldan par gyur la/ tshangs pa chen po ji lta bar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ snga
210a2(mdo sde): ma bzhin du bgrang ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dag dang rang sangs rgyas dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po thob pa/ 'od zer gyi sprin chen po'i dbang bsgyur ba dbang
210a3(mdo sde): bcu thob pa sha stag du gyur te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems can thams cad phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang na mkha'i khams dang su gtog
210a4(mdo sde): ba dus sum pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam pa de/ dus gsum gyi na mkha'i khamasu gtogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 'jig
210a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad rdul phra rab brgyar bsgyur bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu cig mngon par 'grub bo// ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs
210a6(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya stong grangs med pa bcur bsgyur bas dpe byed bzang po re re mngon par bsgrub po// dpe byad bzang por gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
210a7(mdo sde): po de thams cad brjod du med pa brgyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa dgu las mtshan re re mngon par 'grub po// de yang brjod du med pa bcur brgyur bas//
210a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i smin 'tshams kyi mdzem spu zla ba nya ste dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor stong par lhag par mdzes pa'i 'od dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub po// de sa
210b1(mdo sde): brjod med par byed pa stong phrag bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing bltar mi snang ba gtsug tor/
210b2(mdo sde): gyis yongasu brgyan pa mngon par 'grub po// de yang brjod du med pa'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcur bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung
210b3(mdo sde): yan lag phrag drag bcu pa'i dmigs pa thams cad las gsung gi sgra mtha' yas pa 'byung ba lhun gyi grub pas/ sems can thams bsam pa yongs su
210b4(mdo sde): tshim par 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa mngon par 'grub ste/ rigs kyi bu de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bsod nams
210b5(mdo sde): brgya'i mtshan ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang ldan zhing kun tu rgyas par byed pa bkod pa dang
210b6(mdo sde): ldan pas/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'gro ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzungs nas/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi
210b7(mdo sde): kyis klas pa'i/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad tu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams bcu pa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
210b8(mdo sde): pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyan 'tshang ba/ dbang bcu la dbang sgyur ba sha stag du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu gtogs pa'i bas
211a1(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po la 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser las byas pa'i snod rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po nges gang
211a2(mdo sde): ba 'amabri bar mi mngon te/ rigs gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams bsod nams brgya'i mtshan ni bsam gyis mi khyab po// de la sa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/
211a3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems paskye ba'i sa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'phro ba can dang / shin tu smad dka' ba dang / mngon
211a4(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyis kun tu 'ong te/ sa bcu gnyis po ni de dge/
211a5(mdo sde): de la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i sa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' legs pa'i spyod pa dang / log pa'i nan tan thams cad las yang dag par 'das
211a6(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang khyad du zhugs shing / 'gro ba thams
211a7(mdo sde): cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ rnam pa thams cad du dbang dang ldan pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med
211a8(mdo sde): pa snang bar byed pa 'od kyi dkyil khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i stobs shugs 'chang ba 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par skad cig re re la 'gro zhing / 'od
211b1(mdo sde): na dri zhim po dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba'i tshogs chen po bzhi pa 'jig rten gyi khas tu byung ba pad mas rkang pa yongasu brten pa stong gi 'jig rten gyi mtha' dang mnyam pa'i
211b2(mdo sde): bstan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad shin tu rnam par non pa'i lhag mthong rnam par bsgom pa'i ba thogs med cing // yid du 'ong ba'i dmig pa mtshan ma
211b3(mdo sde): chen po bcu la sogs pa'i lhas bzang po mthong ba phyir mi ldog pa/ phyogs kyi nags tshal thibs po mtha' yas pa thams cad du 'od kyi dra ba bsam gyis ma'i
211b4(mdo sde): khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pas zhing dpag tu med pa'i brgyan byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa ji snyed kyi bdag gi/
211b5(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan gyis dbang bskur ba yang dag par mnon pa'i dbang dang byin gyis brlabs la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rin
211b6(mdo sde): po che'i char gyi snang ba'i sgo dpag tu med pa thams cad gtam med par kun tu rgyas 'gengs pa'i mchod sprin chen po sprin gtong ba lhur byed pa/ lta na bzang zhing yid du
211b7(mdo sde): 'od la mdzes shing dge la 'gro ba thams cad dang mi thun pa med cing don yod par bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
211b8(mdo sde): pa rab tu g.yo bar byed cing 'gro bar byed pa/ ngan 'gro la sogs sems can mtha' pa yongasu skyob pa/ mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas mchod pa dang / chos kyi sgo dzin
212a1(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa
212a2(mdo sde): nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa grangs med pas/ rnam par grol/
212a3(mdo sde): ba chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med par phyi ma'i bskal bar thug par rnam par mi tog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi snang
212a4(mdo sde): ba'i thos pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stongs ther 'bum mi dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs par bsgom pa sna tshogs yongasu rdzogs par gzhan
212a5(mdo sde): gyi don gyi nan tan char phyin pa'i bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba bstong phun sum tshogs pa'i yang mos pa
212a6(mdo sde): chen pos spyod pa'i chos nyid kyis sa dang po de ma thob par gnas pa 'dra ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'o sa'o// rigs gyi bu 'di lta ste/
212a7(mdo sde): dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni mi'i kha dog las ni 'das pa/ lha'i kho dog ni mthob pa yin te/ de bzhin du byang
212a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las ni 'das yin// don dam pa'i byang
212b1(mdo sde): chub sems ni ma thob pa yin no// sangs rgyas kyi sa kun tu 'od ni mtha' dang / dbus med pa ma lus pa dri ma med pa'i chos
212b2(mdo sde): thams cad la dbang sgyur ba ste/ kun tu shin tu lta ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid //
212b3(mdo sde): de la ting nge 'dzin rnams gang zhe na/ bcu po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ rin po che kun tu 'phags dang / shin tu gnas pa dang / mi skal
212b4(mdo sde): ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / nyo ma'i 'od kyi bzi brjid dang / don thams cad grub pa dang /
212b5(mdo sde): ye shes sgron ma dang / de ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag la sogs pa
212b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni mtha' yang so// gzungs ni bcu gnyis te/ bcus gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
212b7(mdo sde): dbang bskur ldan dang / ye shes ldan dang / sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang / mi zad pa'i za ma tog dang / 'khyil ba mtha' yas pa dang /
213a1(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya dang / pad mo'i bkod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa dang /
213a2(mdo sde): so so yang dag pa'i rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog rdzogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs te/
213a3(mdo sde): de dag la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa ni drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i mig dang /
213a4(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang / zag pa zad
213a5(mdo sde): par shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go// dbang ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
213a6(mdo sde): tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med par byin gyis rlob pas tshe la dbang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin brjod du med pa
213a7(mdo sde): yang brjod du med pas nges par rtog cig/ 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sems la dbang ba dang / thams cad du bkod pa'i rgyan du mas brgyan
213b1(mdo sde): par byin gyis rlob pa'i tshul gyi yo byad la dbang ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa
213b2(mdo sde): ston pas las la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba ston pas skye ba la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams
213b3(mdo sde): cang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang ba ston pas mos pa dbang ba dang / dus dang zhing gang du 'dod par rdzogs par
213b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ston// pas smon lam la dbang ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul
213b5(mdo sde): gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa ston pas rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / chos kyi sgo snang ba
213b6(mdo sde): mtha' dang dbus med par yongs su ston pas chos la dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
214a1(mdo sde): pa la stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i
214a2(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa dang / dus thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi grangs la sogs pa skad cig gcig la yongs su shes pa rnams pa thams cad kyi
214a3(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes/ rdzogs par byang chub pas ye shes la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang rnams so//
214a4(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa'i stobs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / sbyor ba'i stobs dang / shes rab kyi
214a5(mdo sde): stobs dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / theg pa'i stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi stobs dang / chos kyi 'khor
214a6(mdo sde): lo rab tu skor ba'i stobs dang / bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzung
214a7(mdo sde): kyis thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / bdag med pa khong du chud pas/ gzhan gyis gcan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod lam smad pa'i la
214a8(mdo sde): gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang / chos gzung ba yun ring du mi brjed pa dang / thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin
214b1(mdo sde): pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang / dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mnyam pa dang / theg
214b2(mdo sde): pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can gyi don rnams pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi
214b3(mdo sde): po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
214b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams yin/ ma bstan pa'i bzod pa can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i brtson
214b5(mdo sde): can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams dang / ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams dang / bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad bsdud pa
214b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba ston pa rnams dang / theg
214b7(mdo sde): pa chen po las mnyams pa rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams dang / zung dang snrel gzhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams dang / ye shes
214b8(mdo sde): sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing / kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rab thams cad du mngon du zhugs pa rnams dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyis las kyi mtha'
215a1(mdo sde): dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs
215a2(mdo sde): su mi gtor ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / byis pa dang nyan thos mi bzad pa'i ci snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che ni shing dpag
215a3(mdo sde): bsam ltar brtan pa'i/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su mnyams pa rnams dang / chos thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs
215a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos bstan pa las mi ldog pa rnams te/ bco brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
215a5(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las kyi rgyu'i rnam par smin pa len mkhyen
215a6(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshog mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
215a7(mdo sde): dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / stos par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mong
215a8(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i
215b1(mdo sde): stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs bzhi
215b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa mi 'jigs pa dang / zag pa thams cad zad par shes pa la mi 'jigs pa dang bar du gcod pa'i
215b3(mdo sde): rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bas nges pa'i lus bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi
215b4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa rnams so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
215b5(mdo sde): pa la khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / bsnyel pa med pa dang / sems mnyam pa ma bzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang / 'di lta ste/ so sor
215b6(mdo sde): ma brtags pa btang snyoms med pa dang / mos pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams
215b7(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jugs pa dang /
215b8(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mchags mthogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / dkar gyi dus le mchags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang / lus
216a1(mdo sde): kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes rjes su 'brang ba dang / ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing che
216a2(mdo sde): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/ bco brgyad po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
216a3(mdo sde): 'dres pa rnams so// de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po ni rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
216a4(mdo sde): dang ldan par/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag du bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin du 'byung ste/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di
216a5(mdo sde): lta ste/ chos thams ni bdag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni bdag med par ma mos pas/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
216a6(mdo sde): rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni sems can med pa yin te/ sems can rnams ni sems can du smra'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
216a7(mdo sde): rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni gang zag la gnas pa'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
216a8(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni med pa yin te/ sems can ni yod par blta'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po
216a9(mdo sde): ches thams cad ni srog med pa yin na// sems can rnams ni srog du smra ba'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o//
216b1(mdo sde): skye'o/ tshas thams cad ni gnas med pa yinan/ sems can rnams ni gnas la rten no zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
216b2(mdo sde): chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bzhi med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni bzhi la dga' ba zhes/ sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pan
216b3(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni nga'i bya ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni nga yir bya ba la rten pa'o// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
216b4(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni yongs su gzung ba la brtson no// zhes sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po skye'o//
216b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni dngos po la rten no zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams/
216b6(mdo sde): can ni ma skyes pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni skye ba la rten to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni shi 'pho med cing
216b7(mdo sde): ma skyes pa med na/ sems can rnams ni shi 'ab dang sgru ba la rten no// zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rjechen pa sbyar// chos thams cad ni kun nas
216b8(mdo sde): na mongs pa med pa yin na/ sems pa rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs so zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad/
217a1(mdo sde): ni zhe sdang dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni zhe sdang bar 'gyur ro// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po skye'o//
217a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba yin te/ sems can thams cad ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje
217a3(mdo sde): chen po skye'o// chos thams cad gti mug dang bral ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni gti mug par gyur to zhes/ de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
217a4(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'ong ba yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'ong ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pi
217a5(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni 'gro ba la gnas pa'o zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs
217a6(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa yin na/ sems can thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod do zhes/ de'i phyir
217a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni spros pa la dga'o zhes de'i
217a8(mdo sde): phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams ni stong pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni lta ba la zhen to zhes/ de'i phyir sem
217b1(mdo sde): can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni mtshan ma'i spyod yul can no zhes de'i
217b2(mdo sde): phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni smon lam pa med pa yin na/ sems can rnams ni smon lam la spyod do//
217b3(mdo sde): zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod
217b4(mdo sde): sems kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang la gzigs pa yin te/ de dag la gnod sems kyi tha ba dang / zhe sdang spangs pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o// zhes sems can
217b5(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan cing la nyam nga ba la zhugs pa/ lam gol pa la
217b6(mdo sde): gnas pa yin te/ de dag yang dag pa'i lam gzud do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni
217b7(mdo sde): brkam zhing 'dod pa'i zil gyis non pa ste/ chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa yin te/ de dag 'phags pa'i nor dad pa dang tshul khrims dang / thos pa
217b8(mdo sde): dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i nor la dgod do zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po
218a1(mdo sde): skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni bu smad dang / khyim dang / nor dang / 'bru dang sred pas 'khol ba ste/ snying po med pa la snying
218a2(mdo sde): por 'du shes pa yin gyis de dag la shin tu mi rtag pa bstan to// zhes de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sem
218a3(mdo sde): can 'di dag ni ma rig pas 'tsho ba ste/ gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa yin gyis de dag la 'tsho ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can
218a4(mdo sde): rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa la spyod
218a5(mdo sde): kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin cing / de dag la gang 'di sdug bsngal shin tu zhi zhing bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pas/ shin tu chog par bya'o/
218a6(mdo sde): zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa/
218a7(mdo sde): la rtag tu dga' ba yin gyis de dag las byung zhing khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin
218a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ste/ bsgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na/ de la sems can rnams ni 'pha
218b1(mdo sde): pa'i rnam par grol ba la le lo byed kyis de dag la rnam par grol ba lhur blang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes/ sems can rnam/
218b2(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yongs su mya ngan 'das pa
218b3(mdo sde): 'di btang shing / gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya
218b4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// rigs kyi bu rnam pa sum cu gnyis po de dag dang
218b5(mdo sde): ldan na sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o// de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye gnas pa zhes bye ba ste/ rig
218b6(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig sems can dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
218b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de ni bsod nams kyi gzi brjid chen pos rgyas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sems can gyi don la brtson par rig par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i chos kyi sgo'i
218b8(mdo sde): le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ srog chags sum cu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// srog chags brgyad stong ni mi skye
219a1(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa// lha'i bu stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dri ma bral ba
219a2(mdo sde): rnam par dag go// rigs kyi bu de ltar de dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang sgyur gyi/ chos rnam par
219a3(mdo sde): dgod pa ni dpag tu med pa grangs med do// de dag phyi ma'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas bstan kyang mtha' med na/ sems can rnams
219a4(mdo sde): kyi dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed pa'i phyir phyogs tsam zhig bstan te/ de ltar sems can byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la
219a5(mdo sde): chos dkar las 'thun par byang ba'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa'i srog gnyer bar sbyor ba la mkhas pa yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
219a6(mdo sde): char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin par nus pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung dmar ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor mu med cing rgya che la brtan zhing sra ba/
219a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa dang / 'chags pa char sprin dang bcas pa rgya mtsho dang gling chen po bzhi par bcas pa ri rab ri brtang zung dang bcas pa gangs dang khor yug
219a8(mdo sde): gi ri dang / 'khor yug gi ri chen po dang / ri spos kyi nged ldan pa dang / grong rdal dang 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam par bcas pa yong /
219b1(mdo sde): su 'dzin to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang gzungs kyi rlung mar gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/
219b2(mdo sde): sprin gyis phab pa'i gtan pa med pa'i chos kyi char gyen chen po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chags pa'i tshe skad cig tu brjod
219b3(mdo sde): pa'i ri rab dang / rgya mtsho dang gling chen po bzhi pa dang / ri btang bzung dang / ri btang bzung chen po dang / gangs dang 'khor yug gi ri dang / 'khor yug gi ri
219b4(mdo sde): chen po dang / ri spos ngad ldan dang / grong rdal dang / 'bab chu dang / nags tshal dang / gzhal med khang gi rnam pa lta bu bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan dang /
219b5(mdo sde): sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa dang / dbang stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
219b6(mdo sde): pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / snying rje chen po la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa kun 'dzin pa yin no// 'jig rten dang 'jig
219b7(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i chos kyi phung po brgya stong mu med pa phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang / rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yongs su 'dzin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
219b8(mdo sde): dpa' chos kyi char sprin dpag tu med pa kun 'dzin nus pa yin no// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa rnam par
220a1(mdo sde): dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing yongs su dgod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar gzhal med khang dgod pa'i/
220a2(mdo sde): rnam par dbye ba'i sna tshogs thams cad du kun tu gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed de/ nags tshal dang shing dang / yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / ldum
220a3(mdo sde): bu dang / myu gu dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / sdong po la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang nyin lag rnam par dbye ba sna
220a4(mdo sde): tshogs su rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yongs su gzhog cing rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar so sor yang dag par
220a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes ma thogs ma nyams pa dang / mtha' yas pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams
220a6(mdo sde): cad sgo sna tshogs pa nas yongs su gzhog par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ snang bar byed/ yongs su ston par byed/ thob par byed par rnam pa 'di dag
220a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ chos 'di dag ni ngan song sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bde 'gro bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni bdag por sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni sems dmyal ba bsgrub
220a8(mdo sde): pa'o// 'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas bsgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni mir sgrub pa'o// 'di dag lhar sgrub pa'o//
220b1(mdo sde): 'di dag 'khor los sgyur bar bsgrub pa'o// de bzhin mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba sgrub pa'o// 'di/
220b2(mdo sde): dag ni gzugs dang / g.yon dang / yid gzhungs dang / dpal chen sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ni rig pa'o// 'di dag ni rgyu rtsal lo// 'di dag ni gzo'i
220b3(mdo sde): gnas so// 'di dag ni bstan chos sna tshogs la rnam pa thams cad du mkhas pa'o// 'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ste/ nyan thos su 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni
220b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyasi theg pa ste/ rang sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni theg pa chen po ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bdag gzhan dang don yang
220b5(mdo sde): dag par thob par byed pa/ kun tu bzang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mdor bsdus te/ 'di dag ni sa rnams dang / pha rol tu
220b6(mdo sde): phyin pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / rig pa rnams dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / stobs
220b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam dang / ma 'dres pa rnams dang / zhes rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni de
220b8(mdo sde): dag la sogs pa/ rnam pa tshad med pas gzungs pad ma bkod pa la sogs pa la mkhas pas chos bkod pa rnam par bkod pa dge byed de/ de ltar byang
221a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang chen po'i bkod pa rnam par dbye ba thams cad rnam par 'byed cing
221a2(mdo sde): yongs su bgod pa yino// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang dag par
221a3(mdo sde): rnam par nges pa me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung mar ni dpag bsam gyi shing
221a4(mdo sde): gi nags tshal dag las gang gis lha dang mi rnams shin tu dag pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas mya ngan med par rnam rtse zhing / dga' la dga' mgur
221a5(mdo sde): spyod pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par kha dog dang stobs dang mthun dang bde ba la yongs su mi nyams pa de lta bu'i spos dang me tog dang / rgyan dang gos
221a6(mdo sde): dang rnga dang / sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs pa/ yongs su skyong cing / 'byin par byed do//
221a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
221a8(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor nas sems can dge la gang nas sems can de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos dga' la mos shing 'dun pa dang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las
221b1(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / gzi dang ldan pa dang / yongs su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyams su myong bar byed pa
221b2(mdo sde): dang mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi snang bar gyur pas rtag tu khyad par gyi rnam par mdor bar 'gyur ba'i mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis
221b3(mdo sde): bsnyed pa'i sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / de ltar byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rab kyi sde dang / shin
221b4(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i sde dang / gtan la phab pa'i sde dag dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos rin po che'i 'phreng ba la sogs pa'i char mngon par 'bebs so//
221b5(mdo sde): rjes su 'thun pa dang / rjes su mi 'thun pa dang / snrel gzhi dang / spri'u tshugs kyi rgyud la sogs pa'i gtam rnam par nges par nye bar bsgrub po// tha snyad kyi dmigs
221b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad la bdag med par zhi zhing / rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brjod cing ston pa la rnam par byang bar byed do// chos thams cad sgo kun tu gzhol ba yongs
221b7(mdo sde): su ston to// sgyu ma'i rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa nye bar sbyor ro// ye shes sgyu ma rnam par rgyas par byed do// chos thams cad la dga' ba'i rnam
221b8(mdo sde): par 'phrul pa rnams kyi sems can rnams yongs su rgyas par byed do// 'dri ba thams cad lung bstan pas tshim par byed do// mthu dang dpung med pa'i 'phrul pa/
222a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa skyed de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil dpag bsam gyis shing las shin tu byung ba'i chos kyi gtam yang
222a2(mdo sde): dag pa'i rnam pa gdon mi za ba'i me tog yid du 'ong ba'i char rtag tu mngon par 'bebs pa yin no// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs med pa kar po'i
222a3(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor yongasu bsags pa ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang 'od dang zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi tshul dang /
222a4(mdo sde): nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug gi ri la sogs pas/ yongs su bskor ba'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'dul ba yongs su smin par
222a5(mdo sde): mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med pa ma lus pa'i gnas 'gyur ba'i 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu gtong ba yin na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
222a6(mdo sde): dper na/ rlung mar ni bskal pa'i mthar thug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus na/ gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye
222a7(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong ri rab dang / 'khor yug ri dang rgya mtsho la sogs par kun nas 'jig pa/ rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa/ nam mkha'i rang bzhin du
222a8(mdo sde): byed pa de lta bus stobs kyi shugs thogs med par ldang ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar yang bskal pa mang po tshogs pa sogs pa'i sems
222b1(mdo sde): can bsod dang ye shes rnam par bkod pa'i ri mthon po dang ldan pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi shugs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa/
222b2(mdo sde): dang / yongs su brtan pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thog pa med par sgra skad kyis dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pas/ chos kyi phung po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang gis dul
222b3(mdo sde): ba chos snang ba'i lhag mthong dam pa dang ldan pa bzod par mi nus pa'i 'du byed kyi stobs thams cad mnyam par gzhog pa tshul bzhin yid la byas nas/ yang
222b4(mdo sde): dag par sems nang du gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa brten nas/ srid pa dang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi 'du byed kyi lus med par
222b5(mdo sde): byas nas yang dag ma yin pa kun btags pa rnam par bshig ste/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa bsam gyis mi khyab cing / gzugs med pa'i
222b6(mdo sde): bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa rnam par bshig pas gnas 'gyur ba rnam par dag pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas
222b7(mdo sde): pa/ rnam pa thams cad du mtha' dang bral ba rnams thob par byed pa de lta bu kun nas rab tu gtong ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa grangs
222b8(mdo sde): med par dkar po 'di dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsags pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba thar pa dang / gzungs kyi rgya mtsho dang / ri rab dang /
223a1(mdo sde): 'od dang zla ba dang nyi ma chos kyi tshul dang nags tshal dang / khang pa dang / dge ba'i 'khor yug ri la sogs pas/ yongs su skor
223a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang dul ba yongs su smin pa mang po yang dag par gnas pa bla na med cing lus med pa'i gnas 'gyur bar 'jig pa'i ye shes kyi
223a3(mdo sde): rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab tu mthong ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// de nas byang
223a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// a la la de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang
223a5(mdo sde): ldan zhing / sems can rlabs po che rnams yongs su tshim par 'gyur ba'i chos bcu po 'di bstan bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo
223a6(mdo sde): mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi la la chos 'di dag la mos shing tan bgyid na/ de dag thams cad ci snyed du gsungs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba dang /
223a7(mdo sde): bcas yid bde ba dang bcas pa thob par 'gyur te/ brgya byin dang mtshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa zhig bgyid na yang gzhan gyi don la gzhol zhing / tshe
223a8(mdo sde): 'di dang tshe rabs gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' rtsal ba rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te
223b1(mdo sde): sems can gang de lta bu'i chos rnams la tan du byed pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa dang / kun tu rnam par bsdus pa dang / mi dge/
223b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang / dge 'di chos thams cad dang ldan pa dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro// gang dag 'di lta bu spong ba'i skyes
223b3(mdo sde): bu klen pa de dag ni mun pa nas mun par gzhol ba ste/ sdug bsngal thams cad la sten pa'o// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ngan du bya'o//
223b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu tshes bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams dang yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dri ma med pa rnams yin no// ma
223b5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ zhi ba rnams yin/ she rab mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ ye shes mtha' yas pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams
223b6(mdo sde): yin/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bor mos pa rnams yin/ so sor mi rten pa rnams yin/ mtshan ma'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin/ rtog
223b7(mdo sde): ge'i spyod yul las 'das pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs
223b8(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang chos bcu dang ldan byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba'i
224a1(mdo sde): gzugs la chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / yid du mi 'ong sgra rnams dang /
224a2(mdo sde): dri rnams dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / yid du 'ongs pa rnams dang / yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la chags par 'gyur khong khro bar yang mi
224a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / grags dang ma grags pa dang bstod pa dang smad pas chags par yang mi 'gyur/ khrod
224a4(mdo sde): khro bar yangs mi 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
224a5(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim pa rnams byed pa dang /
224a6(mdo sde): mthong na dga' ba rnams dang / chos kar po rnams skye bar byed pa dang / chos rnams dbri ba dang / 'phrul chen zhing pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag
224a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ gzhon pa dang mchog la zhon pa rnams yin// rtag tu rgyan pa rnams yin/ chos kyi kun nas dga' la mos shing 'dun pa rnams yin/ mthu che/
224a8(mdo sde): zhing 'phrul che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pas na/ ji ltar na
224b1(mdo sde): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba rnams yin zhe na/ zla ba shar na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil ba dang / yid du 'ong bas rab tu bsil bar byed do//
224b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar ba yang 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad bral ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa dang / yid du 'ong
224b3(mdo sde): pa sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar ba 'di ltar/ zhi ba dang ba dang / sems shin tu
224b4(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pas sems can thams cad mthong na dga' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar na yang 'di lta ste// dbang po rnam par
224b5(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / sems kyi rgyud dang ba dang / spyod lam dang / yon tan phun sum tshogs pas sems can mthong na dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin no// rig
224b6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la zla ba nya ste/ rnam pa thams cad du rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nyi ma re re zhing 'phel lo// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro//
224b7(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang thog mar sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du nyi ma re re zhing chos dkar po rnams
224b8(mdo sde): 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de na/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta/
225a1(mdo sde): ste dper na zla ba mar gyi ngo la bab pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor kha dog dang / snang ba dang / chu zheng yang yongs su 'bri ste/
225a2(mdo sde): bco lnga la ci ltar rnam pa thams cad thams cad du mi mngon pa de ltar 'bri'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
225a3(mdo sde): ye shes thob par gyur pa de ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rab tu 'bri ste/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa na/ thams
225a4(mdo sde): cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ba de ltar rab tu 'bri'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba shar ba na/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong pa
225a5(mdo sde): dang / yul gyi mir skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu med rnams kyi rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba shar
225a6(mdo sde): ba na/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rab tu bsngags par bya ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba'i lus 'di
225a7(mdo sde): ltar rang gi bsod nams kyi lam rnam par smin pas grub pas yongs su dag ste/ rnyog pa med cing dang ba bsags pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i
225a8(mdo sde): lus kyang 'di lta ste/ chos nyid kyis mngon par grub pa rdzus te skyes pa pha ma'i brtsog dang / mer mer po las byung ma yin te/ yongs su dag la rnyog pa med cing dang
225b1(mdo sde): ba dang bsal ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni gzhon pa mchog la gzhon te/ gling bzhir snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems
225b2(mdo sde): dpa' zla ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa mchog la zhon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
225b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu brgyan cing / rgyan ma rnyings pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang yon tan gyi rgyan rnams kyis brtag tu brgyan pa yin no//
225b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ lha'i bu zla ba ni rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha'i 'dod pa la dga' ba la mos pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang
225b5(mdo sde): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi kun dga' la mos shing 'dun pa yin gyi/ 'dod pas dga' ba la dga' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// lha'i
225b6(mdo sde): bu zla ba ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba yang 'di lta ste/ bsod nams chen po dang / ye shes chen pos 'phrul che
225b7(mdo sde): zhing che ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi lus rab tu sim par byed pa nas/ 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i bar
225b8(mdo sde): du'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang 'dra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
226a1(mdo sde): dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba rnams yin/ 'dul ba'i sems can
226a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin/ byog bcu thams cad du nem nur mi byed pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams yin/ de dag gi zag pa nub par
226a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba rnams yin/ snang bar byed pa rnams yin/ mu tigs can ngan pa'i lugs rnams zil gyis mnan te 'dug pa rnams yin/ mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa
226a4(mdo sde): kun ston pa rnams yin/ chos dkar po'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung bar byed pa rnams yin/ skye bo dge ba rnams dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi
226a5(mdo sde): bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i ma rigs pa'i mun pa sel ba bas ci ltar skye ba dga' ba ba'i du yin/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na mun
226a6(mdo sde): nag thams cad rnam par sel to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
226a7(mdo sde): ste/ nyi ma shar na pad ma rnam par 'byed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar ba yang gdul ba'i sems can gyi pad ma rnam par 'byed par
226a8(mdo sde): byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na phyogs bcu thams cad du lhan ner byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma shar na yang phyogs
226b1(mdo sde): bcu thams cad du shes rab kyi gzi brjid dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer dag nan snang ba'i chen shar ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i ye she/
226b2(mdo sde): kyi 'od zer snang ba'i tshe na/ dag pa'i chos rnams shar ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma'i snang ba nam med par gyur pa den
226b3(mdo sde): chen nub ces bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du/ nam med par gyur pa de'i tshe na zag pa
226b4(mdo sde): zad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la snang bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
226b5(mdo sde): nyi ma shar na yang sems can thams cad la ye shes shar bas snang bar byed cing gti mug gi mun pa'i rab rib kyi khyabs pa rnams sel to// rigs
226b6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na 'od thams cad kyi 'od med par byed kyang / nyi ma ni ngas 'od thams cad kyi 'od ma snang bar bya'o// snyams du
226b7(mdo sde): mi sems mod kyi 'od kyang chos nyid thob par 'dod pa'i de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar na yang / mu steg can ngan pa'i lugs thams cad du 'ong
226b8(mdo sde): med par 'gyur mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i nyi ma ni ngas 'di dog 'di med par bya'o// snyam du sems te 'on kyang chos nyid thob pas 'od med par 'gyur/
227a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar ba/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa legs par ston to//
227a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma shar yang sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba bas mnyam pa 'am/ mi mnyam pa lags pa ston to// rigs kyi
227a3(mdo sde): bu mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig bla dag so// rigs kyi bu mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lam ngan pa'i tshig bla dag so// rigs kyi bu
227a4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma shar rma brko'i las kyi mtha' thams cad 'byung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub dpa' nyi ma shar na yang dge ba'i chos kyi las kyi mtha' tham
227a5(mdo sde): cad 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma shar na skye'o dge' ba ni dge la lam ngon par zhugs pa dang / mi srun pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang /
227a6(mdo sde): byis pa'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can rnams dang / mya ngan las 'das pa las phyir phyogs pa rnams ni mi dga' bar
227a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba skye bo dge ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
227a8(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang
227b1(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag tsha ba med pa rnams yin/ mi brtabs pa rnams yin/ mi zlog pa rnams yin/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams yin/ nags tshal/
227b2(mdo sde): 'dab ma na rgyu ba rnams yin/ ri'i phug na gnas pa rnams yin/ len pa med pa yin/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang stobs dang / mthu thob pas bdud kyi sde
227b3(mdo sde): rab tu 'joms pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos lto tog srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i ga che ba med pa nas dge ba'i
227b4(mdo sde): chos kyi lo tog stong pa'i bar yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni gar 'gro yang bdag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas/ bag mi tsha zhing sgrags
227b5(mdo sde): pas 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge yang ma dag dang 'dra ba med par mthong bas gar 'gro yang sems can la skrag par 'gro'o// rigs kyi
227b6(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni wa thams cad kyi sgras mi rtabs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang phas kyi brgol ba thams cad kyis
227b7(mdo sde): brtsod pas brgal kyang / mi brtabs shing rgod pa dang zhum par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta dper na/ seng ge ni bsgrubs na phyir mi ldog pa yin no//
227b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang phas kyis brgol ba thams cad kyis bsnyug na mi zlogs shing mi nub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
228a1(mdo sde): dper na/ seng ge'i sgra gang gis ri dgas phra mo thams cad dang 'o ba thams cad phyogs bcur 'byed par 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrogs/
228a2(mdo sde): go// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra gang gis bdag tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i gzhan mu stegs can gyi 'ob
228a3(mdo sde): thams cad phyogs bcur 'bye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrog pa/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge bdag tu 'dzin pa las bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can gzhan
228a4(mdo sde): dag 'dul bi la dbang du bya ba ma rtogs pa de dag la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir bdag med pa seng ge'i sgra mi sgrogs go/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni kun
228a5(mdo sde): tu lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang sprod pa yongs su dag pa'i nan tan la lta yang mi 'jigs pa yin no// rigs
228a6(mdo sde): kye bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni rang bzhin gyis nags tshal na gyi 'dab na rgyu ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang rang bzhin gyis
228a7(mdo sde): dben pa la mngon tu phyogs shing nags tshal gyi 'dab ma spyod do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni ri phug na gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du byung
228a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' seng gi yang ye shes kyi brag gi ri'i phug na gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni mi len par 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin
228b1(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang nyon mongs pa'i khur thams cad bor zhing len pa med par 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ seng ge ni gcig
228b2(mdo sde): bu gnyis su med par bdag gi brtson 'grus dang stobs mthu thob pas pha rol gyi ste 'jom mo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yang gcig pu gnyis
228b3(mdo sde): su med par byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug na/ bdag gi brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu thob pas/ bdud kyi ste 'jom mo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper
228b4(mdo sde): na/ grong gi 'dab gang na seng ge rgyu ba de dang der ri dgas phra mo dag gis lo rtog rnams chud mi bson to// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seng ge yul dang yul
228b5(mdo sde): gyi phyogs nang na 'dug pa der mu stegs can gyi ri dgas phra mo dag gis dge ba'i chos kyi lo tog chud mi gson to// rigs kyi bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa'
228b6(mdo sde): bgo mi tshabs nas// chos kyi lo tog srung du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan byang chub sems dpa' seng ge lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
228b7(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dang 'dul ba rnams yim// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi sems byi do/
228b8(mdo sde): shin tu byas pa rnam gi yin/ dbang po bsdams pa rnams son/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin no// khung che po khyer byeng pa rnams yos/ sems can ma/
229a1(mdo sde): la yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin/ yang dag pas 'tshe ba rnams yin/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag gi rnyed pa thams cad
229a2(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba rnams yin/ drang ba'i rang bzhin can pas drang ba rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na
229a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
229a4(mdo sde): lta ste/ stong pa nyid la sgom pa mang ba rnams yin/ sgrib pa med cing kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas lam gyi rgyan ma chad pa rnams yin/ de
229a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rtogs pas/ chos thams cad kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa
229a6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ dma' ba dma' ba'i yid kyi gdol ba ltar 'jig rten na spyod pa rnams yin/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsod nams blang bar 'du shes nye
229a7(mdo sde): bar bzhags pas/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / bral ba rnams yin/ 'di ltar de mngon sum du shes pa'i phyir// sangs
229a8(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la nem nur pa rnams yin/ chos rang bzhin gyis rig pa'i phyir/ the tshom med pa rnams yin/ rang gis lam mthong bas gzhan gyis mi
229b1(mdo sde): bkri zhing pha rol gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po
229b2(mdo sde): de dag dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' cang shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' pad ma lta bu rnams
229b3(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma gos rnams yin/ sdig pa chu du dang yang lhan cig mi gnas pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims kyi dri zhim pa rnam
229b4(mdo sde): yin/ gtsang ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa rnams yin/ mi brtsub pa rnams yin/ mthong na bkra shis pa rnams yin/ blo rnams par dbye ba
229b5(mdo sde): rnams yin/ blo yongs su smin pa rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su bzung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa
229b6(mdo sde): yin pa nas/ ji ltar na yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma'i chu'i nang nas byung zhing chus mi bar chags
229b7(mdo sde): par skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni 'khor ba na kyang 'khor ba'i
229b8(mdo sde): pa dag gis mi gos te/ de'i thabs ni shes rab kyis yang dag par zin pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad ma la chu'i thigs pa chung ngu
230a1(mdo sde): yang mi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa chung ngu yang mi chags so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
230a2(mdo sde): sa'i phyogs gang du pad ma skyes par gyur pa'i sa'i phyogs de dris khyab po// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa de thams cad tshul khrims kyi dris khyab pa
230a3(mdo sde): 'jug go/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad ma ni sa phyogs gar skyes pa'i sa phyogs de gtsang zhing bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi
230a4(mdo sde): rnams kyang 'du ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gar skyes kyang / rung 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims dang / gtsang sbra kun spyod pas gtsang ba yin te/
230a5(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / dalto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams
230a6(mdo sde): 'du ba yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu sngags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
230a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni kha byen 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams kyi yongs du 'ong bas 'dzum pa lta bur snang // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
230a8(mdo sde): khro gnyer med cing dbang po shin tu dang bas bzhin rtag tu 'dzum pa yino// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing rtsub pa yin no//
230b1(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis 'jam zhing dal gyis smra ba yi/ mi brlang zhing mur cor mi smra ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/
230b2(mdo sde): pad ma ni rmi lam dang ltas dang yud tsam dag la mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ don grub pa'i phyir bkra shis shing / rab tu bsngags pa yin no// de bzhin du byang
230b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mthong na yang 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pa la dus thams cad du yang bkra shis shing rab tu bsngags pa yin no//
230b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ pad ma na ni ma rgyas pa de na rnams par bye ba zhes bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam shes rab dang / byang
230b5(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rgyas pa de na/ blo rnam par dbye ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ pad ma nam yongs su smin par gyur pa de ni/
230b6(mdo sde): bltas na mig gi dbang po tshim par byed// mnyan na rna ba'i dbang po tshim par byed/ bsnams na sna'i dbang po tshim par byed/ mya ngan lce'i dbang po tshim par bya/
230b7(mdo sde): ba/ rigs na lus kyi dbang po tshimasar byed/ sems rab tu dga' bas yid kyi dbang po tshims par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nam
230b8(mdo sde): shes rab kyi snang ba yongs su smin par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bltas na mig gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ mnyam na rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par byed/
230b9(mdo sde): yid kyi dbang po tshim par byed/
231a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / yon tan gyi dri bsnams nana'i dbang po na rnam par dag par byed/ reg pa dang brnyan bkur byas na/ lum/
231a2(mdo sde): kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed/ yon tan brjod par rnam par bsams pas/ yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na
231a3(mdo sde): pad ma ni skye ba'i tshe 'di lta ste/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis shin tu yongs su bzung ste// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i tshe sangs rgyas dang / byang
231a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de ma yin pa gzhan brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dgos shin tu yongs su bzung bar byed do// rigs
231a5(mdo sde): kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ma gos pa nas shin tu yongs su bzung ba'i bar du yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa
231a6(mdo sde): pad ma lta bu rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// pha
231a7(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa thams cad yang dag par bsgrub po zhes sems rgya chen por bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes sems rgya cher
231a8(mdo sde): 'byud // sems can thams cad ga dus mnas sems ra brnyed pa// byang chu kyi stong pa'i 'dug sa blan med pa yang dag para'i rdzogs pa'i bya
231b1(mdo sde): sems mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya ba'o// zhes sems rgya ner cher bskyed do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam bran
231b2(mdo sde): ze dang / lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang chos dang 'thun par sngon ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do// 'jig
231b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par song ste/ sems can gyi don bya ba'i dngos po de dag gis sems can rnams kyi don bya'o// zhes sems rgya cher bskyed//
231b4(mdo sde): mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi gru sbyar te/ sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las pha rol tu bsgral lo zhes sems rgya cher bskyed do// mgon
231b5(mdo sde): med pa dang skyabs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyid med pa dang / rtsa lags med pa'i sems can rnams kyi rtsa lag bya'o//
231b6(mdo sde): zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// lha dang mi dang bcas bdud dang bcas tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / lha dang mi dang
231b7(mdo sde): bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi mchog nyid bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par rol pas brtse'o// glang
231b8(mdo sde): po che'i lta stangs kyis blta bar bya'o zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi che bas sems can rnams bya ba'i spyod pa ngan pas ma yin/ dka' ba'i
232a1(mdo sde): spyod pas na ma yin/ zhan pa'i spyod pas ma yin zhum pa'i spyod pas ma yin no// zhes sems rgya cher skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos/
232a2(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang / ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems rgya che ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam
232a3(mdo sde): par dag pa rnams yin/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsams pa mi g.yo bas bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// 'di lta ste/ bsam pa sgyu med
232a4(mdo sde): pas/ bsam pa shin tu gnas pa rnams yin 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi byang chub yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yid la byed
232a5(mdo sde): pa mi skyed pa dang / brtson 'grus chung ba'i yid la byed pa mi skyes pa dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ nyon
232a6(mdo sde): mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas dri ma thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu'i spyod pa ma dang bral bas lus kyi tshul chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/
232a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i don kun ston pas ngag gi tshul chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi 'du 'dzi med pa dang ngag gi 'dod pa chung ba dang /
232a8(mdo sde): sems kyi smon pa med pa'i phyir sems tshul chos pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ cung zad byas pa yang chud mi gson na mang po lta ci smos te/ byas pa bzo ba rnams yin/
232b1(mdo sde): byas pa tshor ba rnams yin/ dgos pa byas pa la mi smod mi ltung yon tan ma yin pas mi lta ste/ gzhan du na cung zad byas pa la yang tshor zhing de la ston par byed/
232b2(mdo sde): gzeng stong par byed/ yang dag par dga' bar byed/ rab tu bsngags par byed/ cing de la yon tan du lta ba yin no// ci ltar smra ba de ltar byed pa rnams yin te/
232b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gis snyan par ston cing / sems kyis mi 'thun par sems pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngag gi ston cing /
232b4(mdo sde): sems kyis ngan du bya ba'i sbyor ba mi byed/ byang chub sems dpa' ngag gis 'jam par smra zhing sems kyis zhi l-i gnod de shar gnyer ba ma yin/ byang chub sos
232b5(mdo sde): dpa' rnams lus kyis nges pa ston cing sems kyis khon gyi 'dud par 'dzin pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lus kyis ri mor bya ba ston cing sems
232b6(mdo sde): kyis bsnyas par byed pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul mi chos pa khags go ma byed/ ser sna dang 'phra dog gis kun tu glegs tshol ba ma yin/
232b7(mdo sde): sgyu dang g.yos mi spyod/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'thab sbyin mi byed/ phan tshun du dper ba 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus
232b8(mdo sde): kyis kyang ri mo byed pa yin/ ngag gis kyang yang dag pa'i don spro ba las su sgrub bo// byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
233a1(mdo sde): skur ba'i phyir ma yin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// ji ltar de bzhin/
233a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
233a3(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ kha bu bregs gis ngur smrig dag gyon nas yang dag par dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo // de rab tu
233a4(mdo sde): byung nas rgyal pos mnar ba med par rab tu byang rkun pos rtse ba med pa dang / bu lon gyis rtse ba med pa dang / 'jig pas brtse ba med pa dang / 'tsho bas
233a5(mdo sde): med pa'i 'jigs pas skrag pa med par rab tu 'byung ngo // de dad te rab tu byang nas dge ba ci yin pa zhes tshol ba yin te/ dge ba ci yin zhes tshol
233a6(mdo sde): bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen par byed/ sten par byed bkur bar byed/ de dag la chos kyang nyan to// thos nas kyang nan tan du byed
233a7(mdo sde): cing nga rgyal gyis zil gyis ma non pa yin te de nga rgyal dang bral bas ma log par 'dzin pa yin/ ma log par 'dzin pas lam shin tu rtogs pa 'thob po//
233a8(mdo sde): de la las shin tu rtogs pas chos nyid thob bo// chos nyid thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ de ltar bzhin
233b1(mdo sde): shegs pa'i bstan pa la skur pa ma btab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa
233b2(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nem nur med pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gabye
233b3(mdo sde): pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba dang / byang
233b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang dag par sgrub pa dang / byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / theg pa cig gis tshul bstan pa dang / tshul sna tshogs
233b5(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegase pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do//
233b6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba la mngon par dad pa nas ci ltar na sems can gyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba
233b7(mdo sde): la mngon par dad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi
233b8(mdo sde): sku dang / zhi ba'i sku dang mi mnyam pa'i sku dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i sku dang / tshad med pa'i sku dang / phal la med pa'i gsang ba la
234a1(mdo sde): mngon par dad do// 'di ni kho'o// 'di ni mi sla ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nim nur the tsom med do// de ltar na
234a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon
