234a3(mdo sde): por dad ce na/ de 'di snyams du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du lung ston pa dang / gsangs te/
234a4(mdo sde): lung ston pa dang / ldem po ngag gis kyang sems rnams la lung ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am ca co med de/ de'i phyir de la brdzun du smra ba nyes pa mi 'byung
234a5(mdo sde): // de bzhin gshegs pa ni skyon thams cad spangs pa/ dri ma thams cad spangs pa/ yongs su gdung ba thams cad dang / bral ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa
234a6(mdo sde): dbang po zhi ba dang / yongs su dag pa/ rnyog pa med pa/ rnam par gsal ba dang / gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'khrul pa 'am/ ca co 'byung ba de ni/ gnas ma
234a7(mdo sde): yin zhing skabs med par zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni ma slu ba'o// snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med the tshom med/ de ltar
234a8(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba la mngon par dad pa'o// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs srid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dang ce na/
234a9(mdo sde): rdul thams cad spangs pa/
234b1(mdo sde): de 'di snyams du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs pa'i don gang sems dang 'grogs pa dang /
234b2(mdo sde): sems la gnas pa/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi rgyu ma gtogs par/ nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub
234b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi shes par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting
234b4(mdo sde): dpag dka' ba brtag par dag bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las shin tu 'das po dpag tu med pa/ rgya che ba/ yangs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang
234b5(mdo sde): mtshungs shing rtog ge ba thams cad kyi yul las 'das par thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di mi mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la
234b6(mdo sde): nem nur med the tshom med pa yin te/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi gsang ba la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sos
234b7(mdo sde): dpa'i yang dag pa la mngon par dad ce na/ gang 'di byang chub kyi rgyu byang chub kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can gyi don la mngon du phyogs pa dang /
234b8(mdo sde): sems can gyi bya ba byed pa dang / yongs su skyo ba dang / mi skrag pa dang khur chen po bor ba dang mthu brtan pa dang / brtul ba stan pa dang / pha rol tu
235a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa'i blo da
235a2(mdo sde): phyin pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mthar gyis yang dag par sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i blo dang /
235a3(mdo sde): mi mnyes pa'i blo dang / phal la med pa'i blo dang / brtson 'grus brtan pa dang / go cha bstan pa dang / dam bcas pa brtan pa dang / dam bcas pa phal
235a4(mdo sde): la med pa de dag thams cad rims kyi 'phel zhing rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o//
235a5(mdo sde): 'di ni mi smra ba'o// snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tshom med de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par dad do// ji
235a6(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba la mngon par dad ce na/ de 'di snyams du sems so// gang 'di byang chub sos
235a7(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas lha'i mig chags pa med pa thogs pa med pa sgrib pa 'thob bo// lha'i rna ba dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang sngon gyi gnas
235a8(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par shes pa dang brag pa zad pa dang / dus gsum pa skad cig cig dang ldan pa shes pas chags pa med pa
235a9(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa sgrib pa med pa 'grib bo// de'i phyir sems can gyi khams la yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du lta ste/ sems can 'di rnams ni lus kyi ngan du sgyu
235b1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa/ logs par lta ba rnams te/ logs par lta ba'i las dang / chos
235b2(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang gzhi des lus zhig nas shi bo'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log pa ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu ltung ngo // sems can 'di
235b3(mdo sde): rnams lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la bskur ba
235b4(mdo sde): mi 'debs pa/ yang dag po'i lta ba'i las dang / chos yang dag pa'i blangs pa'i phyir/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang bzhi des lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi nang
235b5(mdo sde): du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar snyam mo// de ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams ltas nas/ sems can gyi khams de nyid kyi dge ba dang mi dge
235b6(mdo sde): ba'i ltas rnams la rnam par lta'o// de yang 'di snyams du sems te sngon bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gang 'di ltar bdag nyid rnams par sangs
235b7(mdo sde): rgyas nas/ gzhan yang rnam par sangs rgyas par bya'o// zhes dam bcas pa'i bdag gi smon lam de yongs su rdzogs so bdag gi brnag pa yongs su rdzogs
235b8(mdo sde): so// snyam mo zhes thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ 'di gnas 'di la de nem nur med/ the tsom med do/
236a1(mdo sde): gang la byang chub sems dpa' de rnam sar sangs rgyas de ni byang chub ces bya'o// bdag nyid rnam par sangs rgyas pas/ des na rdzogs
236a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub dang de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba la mngon par dad do// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa
236a3(mdo sde): cig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad ces na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang 'di theg pa ni gcig kho na ste/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o zhes
236a4(mdo sde): thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// 'di ni de bzhin pa'o// ma nor ba'o// gzhan ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa
236a5(mdo sde): gzhan rnams kyang 'di las dbyung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu gling na gang gling yod pa rnams ming gis tha dad par shes te 'on kyang 'dzam bu
236a6(mdo sde): gling du 'du'o// 'dzam bu'i gling de la brten no// 'dzam bu gling gi grangs su 'gro'o// de'i nA gling cig kho na ste/ 'di ni 'dzam bu'i gling ngo // de bzhin du theg pa
236a7(mdo sde): thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg par 'du'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa las byung ba'o//
236a8(mdo sde): de'i phyir theg pa ni cig kho na ste/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la nem nur med be tsom med de/ de ltar na byang chub sos
236b1(mdo sde): dpa' theg pa gcig gi tshul bstan pa la mngon par dad do// ji ltar na tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad ci na/ de 'di snyam du sems so// gang
236b2(mdo sde): 'di mdo sde dang / de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul sna chog bshad pa thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o//
236b3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems rnams la chos ston to// snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem
236b4(mdo sde): nur med the tsom med te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul sna tshogs bstan pa la mngon par dad do// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i
236b5(mdo sde): dbyangs zab mo thos pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni de kho na'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba cung ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyi dpyang
236b6(mdo sde): kyang zab cing snyan pa yin na/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lta ci smos snyam ste/ gnas 'di la
236b7(mdo sde): ni de nem nur med the tsom med de/ de ltar de byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung sgra'i dbyangs zab mo la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu
236b8(mdo sde): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi lta ba 'dul ba la mngon par dad ce na/ 'di snyam du sems so// gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa
237a1(mdo sde): na'/ dang / bag la nyal ba mkhyen te/ sems can mos pa tha dad dang / 'dul ba tha dad pa rnams la gsung sgra'i dbyangs
237a2(mdo sde): gcig brjod pas/ the tsom gcod ci yongs su smin pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul lo// sems can rnams kyang so so nas de bzhin gshegs
237a3(mdo sde): pa bdag la sten to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag la chos ston to// snyam du byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go zhes thos
237a4(mdo sde): pa 'di ni yang dag pa'o// 'di ni mi slu ba'o snyam ste/ gnas 'di la de nem nur med the tsom med de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
237a5(mdo sde): can gyi bsam pa ji lta bzhin du 'dul ba la mngon par dad do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nam nur med pa rnams yin no// /
237a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa
237a7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ zab cing bting dpag bka' ba rnams yin/ rgya che zhing tshad med pa rnams yin/ bags kyis gzhol ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs pa'i
237a8(mdo sde): ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug pa rnams yin/ ro cig pa rnams yin/ chu bo kun zad pa rnams yin/ dus las mi g.yo ba rnams yin/ 'byung po mang
237b1(mdo sde): po'i gnas su gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin pa nas ci ltar na mi
237b2(mdo sde): zad pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi thams
237b3(mdo sde): cad kyis rin po che blangs pas mi zad do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang yon ton gyi rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin te/ sems
237b4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis yon tan rin po che blangs pas mi zad do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// /
237b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes yang dag par grub pa yang zab cing sems can thams cad kyis gting dpag bka' yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di
237b6(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po 'di lta ste/ chu tshad med pas na/ yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'di lta ste/
237b7(mdo sde): blo tshad med pas na yangs shing rgya che ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni bags gis gzhol ba bags kyis 'bab/ bgra
237b8(mdo sde): kyis 'ba'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab/ thams cad mkhyen
238a1(mdo sde): pa nyid la bab bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi 'dug go// de ci'i/
238a2(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ de na rgya mtsho chen po'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i ro dang mi dge ba'i grogs po rnams lhan cig
238a3(mdo sde): mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'o ji snyed 'ab
238a4(mdo sde): ba de thams cad ro cig po yin te/ 'di lta ste lan tsa'i ro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos dka' bo ci snyed sdud pa de dag thams cad/
238a5(mdo sde): ro gcig pa yin te/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la
238a6(mdo sde): bri ba 'am/ gang bar mi mngon no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos kyi chu bo tshad med pa kun zed kyang de la bri ba'am/ gang ba mi mngon
238a7(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol lo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang 'dul bar bya ba'i sos
238a8(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus las mi yol lo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po 'byung ba mang po'i gnas so// de bzhin du
238b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang chos dkar po thams cad kyi gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can thams cad
238b2(mdo sde): kyi chu bcus kyang mi zad pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la chos bstan pa mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na
238b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa nas/ mi zad pa'i bar du'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
238b4(mdo sde): blo rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'byung
238b5(mdo sde): ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad brtag pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin//
238b6(mdo sde): chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad yongs su shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ rten cing brel par 'byung ba
238b7(mdo sde): zab cing gting dpag dka' ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smras pa'i don shes pa la mkhas
238b8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ don yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rtogs pa rnams yin/ de kho na la mkhas rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
239a1(mdo sde): dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa rnams yin pa ni/ ci ltar de kho na'i bar la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
239a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de/ kye ma'i 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang gi du ba 'khrigs pa'i du ba/ 'tshubs pas rnam par rmongs po'o//
239a3(mdo sde): kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug gi mun pas mun nag du gyur to snyam mo// de ni 'di ltar sems can 'di dag ci ltar 'byung bar 'gyur
239a4(mdo sde): snyam ste/ de dag gi 'byung ba yongs su tshol zhing chos thams cad la yongs su rtog go/ chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par 'gyu ro// chos tham
239a5(mdo sde): cad yang mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan
239a6(mdo sde): nyid du yang dag pa shes pas chos thams cad yang dag pa ci lta bzhin tu rab tu shes so// chos thams cad yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du shes pas rten cing
239a7(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo la rnam par sems pas/ las bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par rtog te/ de 'di snyam du dngos po med pa rnams le/
239a8(mdo sde): las sna tshogs snang ba ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems so// don yang dag pa ci ltar bas/ sangs rgyas sam byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsungs pa la
239b1(mdo sde): don shes so// des don shes pas don yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du shes so// don yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rtogs pas de kho na mthong ngo // de kho na mthong
239b2(mdo sde): bas sems can rnams 'khor ba'i btson ra nas thar par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba tshol ba la mkhas pa ste/ de kho na la mkha
239b3(mdo sde): pa'i bar du'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' blo zhib pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sos
239b4(mdo sde): dpa'i rig pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad bdag med par 'jog go/ chos thams cad sems can
239b5(mdo sde): med pa dang srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / mthong ba po med dang / gsog gsob
239b6(mdo sde): ste/ dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtags pa dang rkyen las byung bar 'jog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la chos thams cad bdag
239b7(mdo sde): med pa zhes pa 'di ni rigs pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// chos thams cad sems can med pa srog med pa'o// zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa'o//
239b8(mdo sde): 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa
240a1(mdo sde): dang / shes pa po med pa dang / mthong ba po med pa dang / gsog gsob ste/ dbang phyug med pa dang / stong pa dang /
240a2(mdo sde): yang dag pa kun brtags pa med pa dang / rkyen las byung ba'o zhes pa 'di ni rig pa'o// 'di ni chos nyid dang 'thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang chos nyid dang 'thun pa
240a3(mdo sde): de ni rig pa'o// gang chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ni rig pa'o// gang chos nyid las mi 'khrul pa de ni rigs pa'o// gang chos nyid la 'bab pa de ni rigs pa'o//
240a4(mdo sde): gang chos nyid sten pa de ni rigs pa'o// de yang de dag la spobs pas na de'i phyir rigs pas spobs pa rnams shes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan
240a5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' rigs pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' grol ba'i spobs pa can rnams yin//
240a6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi zad pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rgyun chags pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi
240a7(mdo sde): brtag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa ma zhum pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mi skrag pa rnams yin/ spobs pa bal la med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa zil gyis ma
240a8(mdo sde): non pa rnams yin/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa can rnams
240a9(mdo sde): mo sa yang dag pa ris pa'i sems pa can rnams yin/ rjenas kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldanan byang chub sems dpa' tshul ba'i skabs 'jig can rnams yin/
240b1(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dar 'dar po med pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi 'khrul pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin/ mi zhan pa'i spobs pa/
240b2(mdo sde): can rnams yin/ yeng yeng po med pa'i spobs pa can yin/ de dag gi spobs pa don dang bral ba yin/ tshigs 'bru dang bral ba ma yin/ stong pa dang bral
240b3(mdo sde): ba ma yin/ dus dang bral ba ma yin/ mi bsal ba'i spobs pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'dar 'dar po ma yin no//
240b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor gyi 'jigs ba'i bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni 'khrul pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
240b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ blo bstan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi zhan pa rnams yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa med
240b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'khor gyi nang du phyin na mi skrag mi 'jigs ste/ seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing / mi skrag mi sdang ba
240b7(mdo sde): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni yeng yeng po med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu nyon
240b8(mdo sde): mongs pa dang bcas pa'i spobs pa ni yeng yeng po med pa te/ nyon mongs pa med pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang
241a1(mdo sde): bral ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi don dang bral bar/
241a2(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi/ chos nyid thob pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshigs 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
241a3(mdo sde): bstan chos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu bstan chos kyi phyogs 'ga' shes pa rnams kyi tshigs 'gru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi// bstan
241a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ sbyor ba dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe
241a5(mdo sde): na/ sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu sbyor ba la mi mkhas pa rnams kyi ni sbyor ba dang bral bar 'gyur gyi/ sbyor ba mtha'/
241a6(mdo sde): yas pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni gang / phyis smra bar bya ba de ni sngar smra bar bya'am// gong smra bar bya
241a7(mdo sde): ba de phyis smra ba lta bu dus dang bral ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dus shes pa yin/ tshod shes pa yin/ dus men shrI
241a8(mdo sde): pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams gi spobs pa no// rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba mi snyan par ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngag gi gnas ngan len dang /
241b1(mdo sde): bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gnas ngan len dang bcas pa rnams kyi spobs pa ni cha rtsub pa yin gyi// gnas ngan len dang bral ba rnams kyi ni ma yin no//
241b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni mi bsal ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rno ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dbang po rtul po rnams kyi spong
241b3(mdo sde): po ni mi bsal ba yin gyi/ dbang po rnon po rnams kyi ni ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i spobs pa
241b4(mdo sde): can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no//
241b5(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ don dang smra ba rnams yin/ chos su smra ba rnams yin/ mtshung/
241b6(mdo sde): par smra ba rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ brnyas pa dang / bral ba rnams yin/ nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa rnams yin/ 'khrugs pa med pa smon yin//
241b7(mdo sde): spobs pa sna tshogs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jam par smra ba yin zhe na/ 'jam par smra bas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do//
241b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni bzhin 'dzum lding khro gnyer med pa yin te/ mdangs bzang pos sems can mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' mtshungs par
242a1(mdo sde): smra ba ni sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sgrub ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'
242a2(mdo sde): rnams ni mi ngoms pa ni/ nga rgyal dang grags pa dang / rgyags dang bral zhing spyod pa mtshungs pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems
242a3(mdo sde): dpa' brnyas pa dang bral ba ni/ ri mor byas shing chos ston pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs par 'gyur ba med pa ni
242a4(mdo sde): ngang tshul nges pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med pa ni bzod pas sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rig
242a5(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs can ni/ dga' ba'i tshig gi sems can rnams mgu bar byed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang
242a6(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad mgu bar byed pa'i spobs pa can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub
242a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshigs gzung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos
242a8(mdo sde): mi ston te/ zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin glan ka tshol ba rnams la ma yin/ mu stegs can rnams la ma yin/ me dad pa mang ba rnams la ma yin/
242b1(mdo sde): g.yo dang sgyus klags pa rnams ma yin/ 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can rnams la ma yin/ bi rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang phrag dog dang / ser snas glags//
242b2(mdo sde): lta ba rnams la ma yin/ sems can glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can rnams la chos mi ston to// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na//
242b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna yang med/ chos la slob dpon 'chab par med/ seMs can rnam pa la ri mor byed pa yang med/ seMs
242b4(mdo sde): can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang med mod kyi/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la snod du ma gyur pa'o btang snyoms su gnas
242b5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das 'o na sos can ci 'dra ba rnams la/ sangs
242b6(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' rtsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can dad pa rnams la sangs rgyas dang
242b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa rnams dang / snod du gyur pa rnams dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnam
242b8(mdo sde): dang / g.yo ba med pa rnams dang / sgyu med pa rnams dang / spyod lam mi chos pa rnams dang / brnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa dang bral rnams dang / bsam
243a1(mdo sde): ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa rnams dang / tshul bzang po dang ldan pa rnams
243a2(mdo sde): dang / legs par ston pa rnams dang / dbang po rno ba gang bshad pa'i don rig par 'gyur ba de thob par 'gyur ba de thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ de
243a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ci skad gsungs pa bzhin byed par 'gyur sems can dag la/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos ston to// /
243a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshig gzung ba rnams yin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa
243a5(mdo sde): rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos ston pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa
243a6(mdo sde): med pa yang mi dmig so// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ chos ston kyang yang dag pa bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// byang chub yang dag par
243a7(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i phyir chos ston kyang byang chub dang yang dag par bsgrub pa yang mi dmigs so// nyon mongs pa spongs yang chos ston kyang nyon mongs pa dang / spang ba yang mi/
243a8(mdo sde): dmigs so// skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa'i phyir chos ston kyang / skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang / bral ba dang 'gog pa yang mi dmigs so//
243b1(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir ston kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa yang mi dmigs/ lan cig phyir
243b2(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba yang mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
243b3(mdo sde): yang mi dmigs so// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston kyang rang sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yang mi dmigs so// bdag
243b4(mdo sde): tu 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen par spang ba'i phyir/ chos ston kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa yang mi dmigs so// las kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'jog mod kyi/ las dpal gyi
243b5(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa ya mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos gang ming gang gis brjod pa de/ ming des yod pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir
243b6(mdo sde): zhe na/ chos nyid ni yi ge'i rang bzhin ma yin/ yi ge rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin ma yin mod kyi/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa la rten/ tha snyad la rten/ btags pa
243b7(mdo sde): la brten nas/ ming med pa'i chos rnams ming tu 'jog ste/ ming de yang gsob po gsog go/ gang gso ba dang gsog de la don dam med do// gang la don dam pa
243b8(mdo sde): med pa de/ brdzun te spu ba'i chos de ni byis pa skye bo slu ba'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos brjod pa rnams yin no//
244a1(mdo sde): bzugs las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'jung la/
244a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin no// glang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi/
244a3(mdo sde): bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi yang rjes su spang 'brang la/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las kyang mi 'byung / chos
244a4(mdo sde): kyi rjes su 'brang la/ 'dod pa'i khams las kyang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su yang 'brang la gzugs kyi khams las kyang mi 'byang / chos kyi rjes su 'breng la chos
244a5(mdo sde): kyang mi 'byung // chos kyi rjes su 'brang la chos las 'da' bar yang mi 'byung / chos kyi rjes su 'bral sems can gyi phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang
244a6(mdo sde): la chad par lta ba'i phyir yang mi 'brang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang yang lam les kyang mi 'byung ste/ de ni thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos
244a7(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas
244a8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab can rnams yin/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su gzung ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus
244a9(mdo sde): brtsams pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ shin tu yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/
244b1(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la sgoms pa rnams yin dmigs par lta ba dang bral ba rnams yin/ lam du zhugs pa rnams yin/ de kho na mthong ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi
244b2(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen tshol te/ des dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong nas dga' ba dang rangs pa de la ston par 'du
244b3(mdo sde): shes skyed cing rten te gnas so// de dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pas na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su
244b4(mdo sde): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni sgribs thams cad rtsub par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa med cing lam gyi
244b5(mdo sde): rgyun ma chad pas shin tu yongs su dag cing / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de shin tu yongs su dag pas gdams ngag la ri
244b6(mdo sde): mo dang bcas pa yin no// de gdams ngag la ri mo dang bcas pas stong pa nyid la bsgom pa mang ba yin no// stong pa nyid bsgoms pa mang bas dmigs pa'i
244b7(mdo sde): lta bar mi 'gyur ro// de dmigs pa'i lta ba bral bas lam du 'jug go// de lam du zhugs pas de kho na mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
244b8(mdo sde): sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na zhes bgyi ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ de kho na zhes bya ba 'di ni
245a1(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i don gyi tshig bla dag so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa zhes bya ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
245a2(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang mi smra ba de ni yang dag pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mi slu ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
245a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos 'di ni so so rang gi rig pa'i yin te/ de bzhin nyid ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ci lags//
245a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smra ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ tshig spyod yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ ngag gi las thams
245a5(mdo sde): cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ smos pa thams cad dang bral ba bral ba dang dor ba thams cad dang bral ba/ 'phye ba dang 'tshubs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rtog
245a6(mdo sde): ge thams cad dang bral ba brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa mtshan ma med pa/ mtshan
245a7(mdo sde): ma dang bral ba mtshan ma'i spyod yul las yang dag pa 'das pa/ byis pa'i spyod yul las drag par 'das pa bdud thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'das nyon
245a8(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad kyi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas ma yin pa mi gnas pazhi ga
245b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul te/ de dag nyid kyis so so rang gis rig pa/ dri ma med pa ma gos pa/ dang ba rnam par dag par/ gya nom pa mchog dam pa brtag/
245b2(mdo sde): pa brtan pa zer zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung chos kyi dbyings ni 'dug pa kho na'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar byang chub sems
245b3(mdo sde): dpa' dag chos nyid 'di thob nas/ sems can dag kyang chos 'di kho na la rab tu dgod do snyam nas/ don gang gi phyir 'bad cing rtsol ba dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
245b4(mdo sde): dka' ba brgya dag byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// rnam pa thams cad
245b5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ces bya'o// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad pa sel ba/
245b6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ci ltar mngon du bgyi/ ci ltar khong du chud par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten las
245b7(mdo sde): 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mngon du bya'o// rang gis rig pa khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
245b8(mdo sde): 'das gang shes rab kyis mngon du bgyis pa de rang gis rig pa khong du chud pa nyid ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no//
246a1(mdo sde): @shes rab kyis ni chos rnams yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du mthong ngo // lus kyis ni mngon du byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
246a2(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsams pa las byung ba'i shes pas chos khong du chud par gyur
246a3(mdo sde): pa de rang gis rig pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyis ni rang gis rig pa'i chos
246a4(mdo sde): khong du chud par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu de lta bas nas dpe nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ 'brog chen por sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la mi la la zhig/ shar phyogs
246a5(mdo sde): nas nub phyogs su 'gro la/ de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'gros te/ de yang sos ka'i tsha ba yongs su gdungs par gyur nas skom gyis nyen pa de/
246a6(mdo sde): shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de la 'di skad ces smras te/ kye skyes bu kho bo sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs pa/ skom gyis nyen pa/ gang na 'tsho 'am/ steng ka 'am/
246a7(mdo sde): rdzing gang chu ba sol ba dang / rnyog pa med pa dang / gsol bas gang la yod kyang / gang du bag tsha ba dang / skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i lam bdag la ston cig ces
246a8(mdo sde): bar la/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang / lam shes pa lam mkhas pa/ lam mthong ba/ lam gyi mtshan ma mthong bzhig yin te/ des den nu'i nyes padas
246b1(mdo sde): bral ba'i chu sngan chad mthong la/ sngon myangs shing / sngon zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du/ kye grogs po dag 'di nas lam kha brag mi thong gi bar du song /
246b2(mdo sde): la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi lam 'or te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags sngon po dang / nags tshal de'i dbus na/ da mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ rdzing bu bsil
246b3(mdo sde): cig rnyog pa med pa gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la/ der skyes bu khyed kyis skom pa dang / tsha ba med par byos shig ces zer na/ rigs kyi bu de 'di snyam du
246b4(mdo sde): sems/ sa sos ka'i tsha bas gdungs pa'i skom gyis nyes pa'i mi des/ chu thong ma thag tu bsams pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang yang bral bar
246b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ram/ chu de'i bsil bu yang rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mi de na ma der phyin nas/ des chu
246b6(mdo sde): der zhugs te/ 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ mi de'i tsha ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro// skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// des bsil ba yang rang gis rig par 'gyuraro//
246b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa dang / bsams pa tsam gyis rang gi rig pa'i khong du chud par mi nus so// de la rigs kyi bu 'brog
246b8(mdo sde): ces bya ba 'di ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dag so// ma so ka'i tshabs yongs su gdungs shing / skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i gdungs pas yongs
247a1(mdo sde): su gdungs pa'i yul gyi sred pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshigs drag so// lam shes pa'i mi zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems
247a2(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa'i chos myong la/ chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dag so// chu bsal zhing dngas la rnyog pa med pa med pa gsal/
247a3(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid tshig bla dag so// yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig rigs kyi bu de ji snyams du sems/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa che'i tshad bskal
247a4(mdo sde): par zhugs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu bdud rtsi dri zhim pa dang / gtsang ba dang gya nom pa dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / reg na bde ba las
247a5(mdo sde): brtsams te/ bsngags pa brjod pa dang / rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi de bsngags pa rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol
247a6(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ khyod kyis rnams grangs 'dis ci ltar thos pa tsam 'am/
247a7(mdo sde): bsams pa tsam gyis rang gis/ rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu yang dpe' nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig
247a8(mdo sde): gis shing rtog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myangs bzhig myangs par gyur la/ des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing rtog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta ste/
247b1(mdo sde): dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa dang / dri zhim pa las brtsams te/ brjod na rigs kyi bu de ji snyams du sems/ ji ltar shing rtog gi ro de
247b2(mdo sde): rang gis rig par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na chos kyi sa rnams grangs
247b3(mdo sde): 'di ci ltar thos pa tsam 'am/ bsams pa tsam gyi so so rang gi rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par gi rig par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
247b4(mdo sde): cad rnam par sel ba gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par gsungs pa/ bde bar gshegs pa shin tu legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi tshul ni
247b5(mdo sde): 'di su dag gi rnar thos par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di khong du chud par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di
247b6(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de dag gis chos 'di
247b7(mdo sde): thos par bya ba la 'di nyid ma log pa'i rgyur gyur ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa rnams yin no//
247b8(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes mi 'jig
248a1(mdo sde): pa'i stong pa nyid kyang ra'adu shes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes/ tshul khrims kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang/
248a2(mdo sde): rab tu shes/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po'i stong nyid kyang rab tu shes/ shes rab kyi phung po'i stong pa nyid kyang rab tu shes te/ rgyu de dang rkyen de dang / gzhi des stong pa nyid du
248a3(mdo sde): dmig pa dang / stong pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid lta gnas pa dang / rgyu de dang rkyen des med par yang mi ltung ngo // rigs kyi bu chos
248a4(mdo sde): bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid spyod yul ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la
248a5(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ phyi rol gyi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ nang gi mtshan ma dang bral ba rnams yin/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba rnam
248a6(mdo sde): yin/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ g.yo ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ rgyu ba ba/
248a7(mdo sde): cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ dmigs par bya ba thams cad dang bral rnams yin/ rnam par shes pa'i mi dmigs pa rnams/ rnam par shes par bya ba'i dngos po mi
248a8(mdo sde): dmigs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa rnams yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das
248b1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan ma ma mchis pa la gan/
248b2(mdo sde): ba de yang de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ci 'dra ba blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab po//
248b3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam pa'i yul dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rjes su bsams na/ sems can thams cad myos par 'gyur gyi//
248b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi pha rol tam/ tshu rol mthong bar mi 'gyur mi dmigs te/ tha mar na dub pa'i bskal pa can du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
248b5(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni zab cing gting dpag dka' la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa rgya che ba/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ rtog ge thams cad kyi yul
248b6(mdo sde): las 'das dmigs pa thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa ste/ de ni brtag pa 'am bsam pa 'am gzhal ba 'am tshad gzung bar mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib
248b7(mdo sde): pa thams cad rnams par sel bas gsol pa/ gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung stan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das de
248b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshe
249a1(mdo sde): pas skabs bye yis khyod dris shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bdag stod pa ni bcom
249a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis skyes bu dam pa ma lags pa'i chos su gsungs na/ de ci ltar chos kyi rje/ bcom ldan 'das nyid bdag stod pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
249a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu legs so leg so/ khyod kyis dri ba tshul bzhin dri so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shing dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan
249a4(mdo sde): 'das legs so zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal to// rigs
249a5(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can 'di dag la ci nas kyang phan pa dang / bde ba dang / chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag bstod pa ma gtogs par nga rgyal gyi zil gyi
249a6(mdo sde): non pa dang / bkur sti'i zil non pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / shes kyi khye 'dod pa dang / tshul 'chos pa 'am/ kha gsog byed cing yang dag pa ma yin par bstod
249a7(mdo sde): ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang rangs pa nye bar gzhag pas chos bstan pa'i skal ba yod
249a8(mdo sde): ba'i 'gyur/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyi stod 'gyur te/ de yang dag la yun ring por don dang phan pa dang bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
249b1(mdo sde): sel bas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci lags sems can 'di dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 'tshal tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
249b2(mdo sde): kyi bu mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i sems can rnams ni/ rgya chung la mos pa dman pa phran tshegs la mos pa shes rab chung ba/
249b3(mdo sde): dad pa chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus bstan pa dag ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba mi shes pas/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa bdag
249b4(mdo sde): nyid bdag gi yon tan gyi sngags pa brjod pa mdzad de/ de'ang nan gyi bsgrub bo// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sman pa mkhas pa zhig yod la sems can rnam
249b5(mdo sde): kyang nad kyis nyen par gyur cing / sa'i phyogs de na yang sman pa gcig pur zad de/ gnyis su med la/ de'i yon tan gyi che ba sus kyang / mi shes pa dang / de nas
249b6(mdo sde): sman pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba nad kyis nyen pa sman la mkhas pa/ gnod pa la sten pa yin gyis bdag gis
249b7(mdo sde): de dag gso bar bya'o snyam nas/ sman pa des sems can de dag gi mdun du skye sems can dag bdag ni sman pa ste/ nad la mkhas pa'o// nad kyi gzhi la mkha
249b8(mdo sde): pa'o// sman la mkhas pa'o// zhes bdag gi yon tan gyi sngags pa bdag nyid brjod pa dang / sems can de dag 'di ni sman pa'o zhes bya bar shes shing / yid
250a1(mdo sde): ches par gyur nas sman pa de la rten to// de nas sman pa te/ sems can de dag gso zhing / nad de zhi bar byed de/ rigs kyi/
250a2(mdo sde): bu de skam du sems/ sman pa de bdag la stong pa 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
250a3(mdo sde): kyi bu de bzhin du de gshegs pa yang sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi gzhi la mkhas pas/ nyon mongs pa'i nad gso ba la mkhas
250a4(mdo sde): pa/ chos kyi sman chen po stobs pa yin yang / nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi mi shes te/ nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur
250a5(mdo sde): pa'i seMs can rnams gzigs nas/ de dag gi mdun du bdag gi yon tan gyi dang sngags pa bdag nyid brjod te// de nas nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis nad par gyur
250a6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi sngags pa thos nas yid ches par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rten to// de na
250a7(mdo sde): de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas sman pa'i rgyal po chen po chos kyi sman de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad do// chos kyi sman chen po de dag
250a8(mdo sde): kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa dang bdang / byams pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sogs pa ste/ rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni don
250b1(mdo sde): gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas/ bdag nyid stong pa mdzad do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam thams cad dang bral ba yin no//
250b2(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa la smon kyang sbyin pa la gnas pa rnams ma yin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /
250b3(mdo sde): shes rab dang / khams gsum pa dang / byang chub dang / lam dang / mya ngan las 'das kyang smon kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ci'i
250b4(mdo sde): phyir she na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi gnas par 'jig rten thams dri rnam par spyod do// bcu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos
250b5(mdo sde): bcu po dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam thams cad la gnas pa dang bral rnam so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i
250b6(mdo sde): bdag nyid can rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyi tshe ba med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ tha dad pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/
250b7(mdo sde): chos kyi byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nges par rtogs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod pa med pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ phan pa'i byam
250b8(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i byams pa dang ldan ma rnams yin/ phyog/
251a1(mdo sde): bcu kun tu khyab pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos
251a2(mdo sde): bcu de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can
251a3(mdo sde): rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dang / skyabs med pa dang / mgon med pa dang / rten med pa dang / dpung gnyen med pa'i slad
251a4(mdo sde): du byang chub sems pa snyed do// byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ chos nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'bad rtsol brtson 'gras rtsom ste dka' bar spyod pa brgya dag kyang byed do// /
251a5(mdo sde): de dag chos thos nas/ sems can rnams la phan par byed/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams phan par byed cing de la gzhog par byed tshul khrims ngan pa can rnams tshul
251a6(mdo sde): khrims la/ gnod sems can rnams bzod pa la/ le lo can rnams brtson 'grus la/ sems 'khrugs pa rnams bsam gtan la/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa can
251a7(mdo sde): rnams mthong nas shes rab la gzhog par byed kyang / sems can la sdug bsngal mi zad pa rtsub pa che ba dag gi nyen cing / byang chub les phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// rig
251a8(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas
251b1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni 'khor ba'i brtson ra rab tu 'bar ba nas/ byung ba'o zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed de/ bdag gi 'khro ba'i dpyangs
251b2(mdo sde): thag yun ring po nas thogs pa chad do zhes dga' ba skyed do// bdag ni rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa'i 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu rgal
251b3(mdo sde): to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis yun ring po nas bsgreng ba'i nga rgyalta / mtshan bsnyal lo zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag gis nyon mongs pa'i ri rnams ye
251b4(mdo sde): shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ ci ltar rdul yang mi snang ba de ltar bco mo zhes rab tu dga' skyed do// bdag nyid ni dbugs phyin pa yin gyis de ni gzhan yang dbugs dbyung
251b5(mdo sde): bar bya'o zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag nyid ni 'jig rten pa yun ring po nas gnyid log pa sred pa'i stobs/ yongs su zin pa gti mug gis bsgribs pa'i nad
251b6(mdo sde): na sad pa yin gyis/ da ni gzhan yang ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par lhung ba thams cad las rnam par grol bar bya'o// zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// bdag 'khor bri
251b7(mdo sde): 'brog dgon par yun ring po nas 'khyams te/ grogs med cing gnyis su med par gang yang 'khyams zhing / lam la mi mkhas pa la lam la mi shes pas lam stor
251b8(mdo sde): ba rnyod do// zhes rab tu dga' ba bskyed do// bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer dang nye bar gyur to zhes rab tu dga' ba skyed do// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
252a1(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gtang snyoms la/
252a2(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig gis rnam par shes bya ba'i gzugs rnams la gtang snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ mig gis
252a3(mdo sde): rnam par shes bya'i gzugs rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba rnams dang / de bzhin du rna bas rnam par shes par
252a4(mdo sde): bya'i sgra rnams dang / snas rnam par shes par bya'i dri rnams dang / lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang / lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang /
252a5(mdo sde): yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams la gtang snyoms su gnas pa yin te/ yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams kyis smras par mi 'gyur ba dang /
252a6(mdo sde): gnod par mi 'gyur/ rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal la gtang snyoms su
252a7(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin te/ 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis smras par mi 'gyur/ rma byung bar mi 'gyuraro//
252a8(mdo sde): bya ba byas pa'i sems can rnams la gting snyoms su gnas pa rnams yin te/ de dag la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rangs pa bskyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sem/
252b1(mdo sde): gang bsgral bar bya ba de dag nyid rgal bar bya'o zhes gtang snyoms su gnas rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gtang snyom/
252b2(mdo sde): la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
252b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ shi 'pho ba yang ston/ bcas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na rtse ba'ang ston/ mngon par byung ba'ang ston/ dka' ba spyod pa'ang ston/ byang chub
252b4(mdo sde): kyi snying por 'gro ba'ang ston/ bdud 'dul bar 'ang ston/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ba 'ang ston/ chos kyi 'khor ba'ang ston/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen po
252b5(mdo sde): yang ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang rkyen gang gis byang chub
252b6(mdo sde): sems dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang
252b7(mdo sde): dam pa na/ sems gang dag rtag par 'du shes pa yin pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad dang / khyad zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad
252b8(mdo sde): las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten kun nas phul du byung ba mi mnyam pa 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams kyis mgos pa ma chags pa shi 'pho bar mthong na/ rtag gi/
253a1(mdo sde): 'du shes ldog cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'byung ste/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la gnas pas bag yod pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rig/
253a2(mdo sde): kyi bu dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa na/ sems can gang dag bag med par spyod pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la dga' ba yod/ dad pa yod/ rangs pa yod kyang
253a3(mdo sde): yul la mngon par zhen pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du mi 'dod mi ston bsnyen bkur mi byed cing / de dag 'di snyams du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa'
253a4(mdo sde): yang bzhugs la bdag cag kyang 'khod de dus kyang ring du yod kyis 'dong bar bya'o// snyams du sems te ngag gi bag med par zlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang
253a5(mdo sde): shi 'pho ba ston te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos mthong nas skye ba la gnas par 'gyur zhing de dag sko ba 'gyur nas/ bag med pa mi byed de bag
253a6(mdo sde): yod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag skye bas 'dul ba yod pa de dag gis/ byang chub
253a7(mdo sde): dpa' ma'i mngal na/ 'dug pa'i mthu mthong na ngo mtshar rmad du byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
253a8(mdo sde): ma'i mngal du 'dug gzhin chos ston to// rigs kyi bu sems cin gang dag byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa dang byis pa'i spyod pa dang / slas kyi nang na 'dug pa
253b1(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba dang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams bsrung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa dang / byis pa'i spyod pa dang / sras kyi
253b2(mdo sde): nang na 'dug pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' mngon pa'i 'byung ba dang / rab tu 'byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de
253b3(mdo sde): dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung ba ston cing rab tu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag lha dang kwa dang gnod
253b4(mdo sde): sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin la sogs pa spyod pa dman pa la mos pa/ byang chub sems dpas spyod pas yongs su smin par bya ba yod pa de dag yongs su smin par
253b5(mdo sde): bya ba dang / mu stegs can gzhan tshar gcad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyod pa ston to// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag gis yun ring po nas bdag
253b6(mdo sde): cag gis/ byang chub sems byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshe mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa yod pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa
253b7(mdo sde): byang chub snying por 'gro ba ston la/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba la so so'i tshul bzhin mchod pa byed de/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas
253b8(mdo sde): pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pas rlom
254a1(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de dag las bzlog pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul ba ston to// sems
254a2(mdo sde): can gang zhi ba la gnas pa de dag de la gong du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par mtshang rgya ba ston to// gang gi tshe byang chub
254a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgra sna tshogs dang ca co sna tshogs gang yod pa de dag tham
254a4(mdo sde): cad kyang zhi bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi mthu de mthong na bdag cag kyang de ltar byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
254a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// zhes smon lam 'debs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang ston par bkur ba dang / ston par mkhas 'che la de dag gis
254a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / phyi ma'i chos mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa de dag tshang gcad pa dang sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin cing snod du gyur pa rnams
254a7(mdo sde): le lam bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ shi ka'i grong rdal du song nas lan gsum du bzlas te/
254a8(mdo sde): rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas 'dul ba yod pa de dag
254b1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rkyen te/ des byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi
254b2(mdo sde): pho brang dam pa nas shi 'pho ston cing / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub seMs dang
254b3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pas rnam par rol pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi khom brgyad rnam par spang ba rnams yin no//
254b4(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba'i chos las phyir log pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas bslab pa bcas la las mi 'da' ba rnams yin/ ser
254b5(mdo sde): sna dang bral ba rnams yin/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams yin/ bsod nams bya la brtson pa rnams yin/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/
254b6(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ smon las phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ skyo ba mang ba rnams yin/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams yin no// rigs
254b7(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba gang gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye zhing de dag tu skyes nus kyang / tshor ba mi
254b8(mdo sde): bzod pa rtsub pa chag yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la
255a1(mdo sde): gnod pa'i sems bskyed pa 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis dge ba bcu'i la
255a2(mdo sde): kyi lam dang ldan pa yin/ te/ de ltar na de ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs
255a3(mdo sde): pas bslabs pa bcas pa las 'da' ba gang gis dud 'gro'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dag du skyes nas dud 'gro'i nang du sdug bsngal
255a4(mdo sde): mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni ser snar 'gyur ba'i rgyu de dang / rkyen dang / gzhi des yid dgas kyi nang du skye
255a5(mdo sde): zhing / de dag du skyes nas kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ba med do// byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon spyad pa ste/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la/
255a6(mdo sde): bya ba byas pa yin pas/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba yin te/ de dag du skyes nas kyang rkyen phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing / rkyen de bas kyang
255a7(mdo sde): 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang po ma tshang ba'i rnam pa gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod mi rung
255a8(mdo sde): bar gyur pa'i/ dbang po dang mi ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams la brtson zhing bsod nams kyis brtan pa yin te/
255b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam chos sam dge 'dun la bya ba gang byas shing / bsnyen pa dang bsten cing bsgoms pa dang mang du byas pa dbang po phun
255b2(mdo sde): sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'i bya de dang de dag byed cing / dbang po phun sum tshogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no// byang chub
255b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul na sems can blun pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa'i ngang tshul can skal pa med pa legs par bshad pa dang /
255b4(mdo sde): nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par bya ba'i mthu med pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pa/ mar mi 'dzin pa phar mi 'dzin pa dge slong du
255b5(mdo sde): mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dag gi nang du mi skye'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dbus kyi yul gang na sems can de dag dbang po rno ba/
255b6(mdo sde): dbang po gsal ba/ mkhas pa mkhas par bkur bskal pa yod pa legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i mthu
255b7(mdo sde): yod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba/ phar 'dzin pa/ mar 'dzin pa dge sbyong tu 'dzin pa/ bram zer 'dzin pa dag gi nang du skye'o//
255b8(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi shes dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas na sangs rgyas
256a1(mdo sde): mi 'byung ba 'am/ mi nyid du skyes pa du ma 'bras med par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba lha tshe rings por 'gyur
256a2(mdo sde): ba'i nang du skye bar mi 'gyur gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang na sems can gdul bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes
256a3(mdo sde): par bya bar yod pas skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams na sangs rgyas mi zhugs pa dang / chos mi
256a4(mdo sde): thos pa dang / dge 'dun bsnyen bkur mi byed sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu mi skye'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ dkon mchog gsum phun sum
256a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sngon gyi smon lam phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gnas
256a6(mdo sde): de lta bu ngag thos kyang skyo ba mi mang ba dang / dmu rgod kyi ngang tshul can ma yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ gnas pa 'di lta bu dag thos ma thag tu skyo ba/
256a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te skyo bar gyur nas mi dge ba'i chos rnams la brtsams te 'byung ba tshol ba yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mi
256a8(mdo sde): khom pa brgyad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chu sems dpa' byang chub tu sems ma stor ba rnams yin no// bcu
256b1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo dang sgyu med pa drang zhing gya gyu med pa sems drang ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams dang /
256b2(mdo sde): yid gnyis dang nem nur dang the tshom med pa rnams yin/ chos la slob dpon gyi dpe' mkhyud dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos kyi ser sna dang bral ba rnams yin/
256b3(mdo sde): chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur pa'i las kyi mtha' dang bral ba rnams yin/ ci skad du smras pa de lta bur byed de/ mi slu ba rnams yin/ theg pa chen po yongs
256b4(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa rnams yin/ de yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang bcas/ ri mo dang bcas pa rnams yin/ theg pa chen po rol
256b5(mdo sde): pa chen po la 'bab pa theg pa chen po la bab pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba rnams la ston par 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes sked
256b6(mdo sde): ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems ma gtor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu tshos
256b7(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' che rabs dran pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkun byas pa rnams yin
256b8(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnam yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ sgrib pa med pa rnam
257a1(mdo sde): / de pa'i chos yongs 'dzin pa'i gang zas rnams la rim gro yod cing bkur sti yod
257a2(mdo sde): yin/ dga' ba mang ba rnams yin/ sgom pa rnams yin/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa rnams yin/ rdzus te skye ba rnams yin/
257a3(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa rnams yin te rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ dam pa'i chos la rim gro byed cing
257a4(mdo sde): bkur sti yod pa yin te/ de rgyu de dang rkyen dang / gzhi des lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang ngo klog go kun chub par byed do//
257a5(mdo sde): gzhan la yang rgya cher ston to// de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson pas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang tshul khrims rnam par dag yin/ tshul
257a6(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag pas 'gyod pa med pa yin/ de yang rim gro med pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims yongs su dga' ba'i phyir/ 'gyod pa med pas sgrib pa med pa
257a7(mdo sde): yin/ sgribs pa med pas dga' ba mang ba yin/ dga' ba mang bas sgom pa mang ba yin/ sgom pa mang ba sems mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// sems
257a8(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pas 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ 'gro ba yongs su dag pas rdzus te/ skye bar 'gyur/ rdzus te skyes pas rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa
257a9(mdo sde): yin no// rnam par shes pa ma rmongs pa'i phyir/ tshe rabs dran pa yin te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang / rjes su dran no// gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang lnga dang bcu
257a10(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum gyis Sha tshul khrims
257b1(mdo sde): dang nyi shu dang gsum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang lnga bcu nas tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar de rjes su dran no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa
257b2(mdo sde): tshe rabs dran pa rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na
257b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / thos pa dang dran pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos mnyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ dge 'dun mchod
257b4(mdo sde): cing bsnyen bkur ba dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang ldan pa dang / thal
257b5(mdo sde): mo sbar ba dang / gdud pa'i las dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ mang du thos pa'i gang zag chos smra ba dag dang bral ba rnams yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan dang
257b6(mdo sde): ma bral ba rnams yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos mnyan pa dang / ma bral ba rnams yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyan pa dang ma bral rnams yin/
257b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi nyan pa dang ma bral ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mnyan pa nyid dang ma bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag
257b8(mdo sde): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i
258a1(mdo sde): grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /
258a2(mdo sde): 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnams par spangs pa rnams yin/ 'du 'dzi la dga' ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / tshogs nyams pa'i gang zag
258a3(mdo sde): rnam par spangs rnams yin/ 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / 'du 'dzil dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / le lo can gyi
258a4(mdo sde): rnam par spangs pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang / khyim
258a5(mdo sde): pa dang sten pa rnam par spangs pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa na/ sdig pa'i grogs po rnam par spangs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu byang
258a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nges gnas 'di dag rnam par spong ba'i tshe/ gang de dag la zhe sdang ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya/ khrong khro ba'i sems dang bskos pa'i sems
258a7(mdo sde): bskyed par mi bya'i/ des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / sems can rnams ni khams so sor ston te/ sten par gyur nas/ chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka'
258a8(mdo sde): stsal gyis/ de bas na bdag gis snyan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// snyam du sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang
258b1(mdo sde): sngarnam na
258b2(mdo sde): / chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
258b3(mdo sde): sku'i chos nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ lus mnyam pa rnams yin/ lus yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ lus legs pa
258b4(mdo sde): slob pa rnams yin/ chos kyi lus rnams yon/ lus brtag par bya ba ma zhing gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams
258b5(mdo sde): oMn/ lus ni pa rnams yin/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams yin/ ye shes lus dang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi chos btso bo de dag da /
258b6(mdo sde): ldanan byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos rnying thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa gso
258b7(mdo sde): bam ldan 'das gang gi rta byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ches nyid 'di 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
258b8(mdo sde): gas kyi zlas da sa la hU~M sangs dang 'grus parnas pa gag/ dkyi 'phyi sa grums kyi rnam pa mas ca dang thul pa das
258b9(mdo sde): sa sa pa'i rnams sa kyi shi ma rnas pa tshum rna ma mi mngon pa'i byar gyis sangs su dgapa 'byung chus se /
259a1(mdo sde): dag pa thob po// sa gsum pa las byang chub sems dpa' khro ba dang / gnod sems thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir lus rma
259a2(mdo sde): mod pa thob po// sa bzhi pa la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir lus legs par grub pa thob po// sa lnga pa la
259a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rab tu gtogs pa'i phyir chos lus thob po// sa drug pa la brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka'
259a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos yongs su grub pa'i phyir/ lus brtag par bya ba ma yin zhing gting dpag dka' ba thob bo// sa bdun pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs
259a5(mdo sde): su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir/ lus bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob po// sa brgyad pa la spros pa thams cad dang bral
259a6(mdo sde): ba dang nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir/ lus zhi ba thobs po// sa dgu pa la lus tshad med pas khyab pa'i phyir/ lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'thob po//
259a7(mdo sde): sa bcu pa la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi lus thob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ye shes kyi bya ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro// byang
259a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i chos nyid tha dad du bgyi/
259b1(mdo sde): ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus tha mi dad du bya ba med de/ yon tan dang mthus na tha dad du bya ba yod do// byang chub
259b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar lus tha mi dad du bgyi ba ma mchis la/ yon tan dang mthus tha dad du bgyi
259b3(mdo sde): ba mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu lus lus shes bya ba 'di ni tha dad pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus brjod pa'i
259b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir ro// yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid ni tha dad par blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/
259b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci ltar gang 'di lta bu'i mthu'i yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid thob par blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ba
259b6(mdo sde): na don de nyid khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir khyod la dper bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che dang / byi don ma byas pa'i nor bu rin
259b7(mdo sde): po che ni 'di lta ste/ nor bu rin po zhes bya ba nor bu rin po che'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ ci ltar byi dor byas pa'i nor bu rin po che'i mthu dang yid du 'ong bas khyad par byed
259b8(mdo sde): pa ltar ni byi dor ma byas pa ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che dang bcas su de
260a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus nor bu rin po che ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor/
260a2(mdo sde): bu rin po che'i drung du yongs su dag pa zhes mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nor bu rin po che ni sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang /
260a3(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas te/ gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma thams cad bral ba'i phyir te/ byang
260a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i nor bu rin po che ni de tsam du khyad par byed pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar dri ma'i lhag ma las pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
260a5(mdo sde): dper na/ chos gnyis kyi zla ba na zla ba'i grangs su 'gro ba nas zla ba nyi'i ba'i du zla ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci 'dra ba de lta bur
260a6(mdo sde): zla ba nya la ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
260a7(mdo sde): skur bcas te/ lus kyi grangs su 'gro mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i drung na/ lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ rig
260a8(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba nya ba'i drung na tshes gnyis kyi zla ba ci lta ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyang lus su
260b1(mdo sde): brjod pa'i mtshan nyid cig mod kyi/ yon tan dang mthu'i mtshan nyid kyis ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dad+ya na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje ltar sra/
260b2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba
260b3(mdo sde): dang dri ma dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten gyi chos rgyad po de dag gis mi tshugs
260b4(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal dag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ skye ba dang rga
260b5(mdo sde): ba dang 'chi bdag gis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ mu stegs can dang phas kyis rko ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad dang / bdud
260b6(mdo sde): kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin/ 'dod pa la spyod pa thams cad
260b7(mdo sde): kyis mi tshugs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lus rdo rje bas sra ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
260b8(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkur ba rnams yin/ mchod par 'os pa rnams yin/
261a1(mdo sde): phyin par byed pa rnams yin/ rten par bya ba rnams yin/ nye bar 'tsho bar byed pa rnams yin/ brgyags shin tu phun sum tshogs/
261a2(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ tshogs shin tu bsags pa rnams yin/ mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ thog mar 'gro ba rnams yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen po
261a3(mdo sde): phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bkur ba yin pa nas/ ci ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grong khyer
261a4(mdo sde): chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas pa'i bar du yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po na rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po de dag gis
261a5(mdo sde): bkur ba yin/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams kyis bkur ba yin no// rigs
261a6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa rnams yin no// de bzhin
261a7(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang bslob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang /
261a8(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dag gis mchod par 'os pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni 'grog dgon par 'gron po mang po chen pas gcis pa dag
261b1(mdo sde): legs par bde zhing yongs su ma skyo bar byin par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'khor ba'i 'grog dgon par chen po'i nang /
261b2(mdo sde): na/ sems can 'gron pa mang po nyon mongs pa'i chan pas gtses pa legs par bde zhing yongs su ma skyo bar phyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/
261b3(mdo sde): ded dpon chen po la rten pa sdug bsngal ba dang phongs pa dag 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po la rten na/
261b4(mdo sde): gzhan mu stegs can dang kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa rnams 'brog dgon pa chen po nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po dang /
261b5(mdo sde): rgyal po dang las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang
261b6(mdo sde): 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams nye bar 'tshe ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni nam phyogs su 'gro bar bar
261b7(mdo sde): chas te/ 'gron po mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer chen por phyin pa bya ba'i phyir/ 'brog dgon par zhugs pa'i tshe/ grong khyer chen por phyin gyi bar brgyags phun
261b8(mdo sde): sum tshogs pas/ 'brog dgon par de ni/ legs par bde zhing yongs su skyo ba med par 'byung bar byed/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang
262a1(mdo sde): nam sangs rgyas kyis bsten pa'i phyogs su 'gro bar 'dod cing / sems can 'gron po mang po de'i 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen/
262a2(mdo sde): po 'jug par 'dod la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ bsod nams kyi brgyags kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs
262a3(mdo sde): pas 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'di lte ste/ gser dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang /
262a4(mdo sde): man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa mang po balcogs shing phyongs 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang nams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
262a5(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer chen por mngon par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi tshogs shing 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni nor bsag pas/
262a6(mdo sde): cho ga mi shes pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yod chos kyi nor bsags pas chog mi shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/
262a7(mdo sde): dper na/ ded dpon chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtso bo dang / dbang yod pa dang / ngag mnyan pas 'dron po mang po thams cad kyi thog
262a8(mdo sde): mar 'gro ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang 'di lta ste/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yongs kyi gtso bo dang / chos la
262b1(mdo sde): dbang ba dang / ma logs par smra bas sems can 'gron po thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ ded dpon chen po grong khyer
262b2(mdo sde): chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya la
262b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub dpa' bkur ba yin pa na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer chen por phyin par bya ba la mkhas par bya ba'i
262b4(mdo sde): bar du yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon chen po rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu ldan na/ byang chub
262b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yino// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lam mnyam pa yang rab tu shes/ lam nyam nga ba yang rab tu shes/ lam bde
262b6(mdo sde): ba yang rab tu shes/ 'tsham pa'i lam yang rab tu shes/ lam chu che ba dang chu med pa yang rab tu shes/ lam gyi dgongs mA lam dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam
262b7(mdo sde): gyis tshugs dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'khyud pa dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam drang po dag kyang rab tu shes/ lam 'byung ba yang rab tu shes so// rigs
262b8(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bcu po de dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' lam
263a1(mdo sde): ma log par ston pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byed
263a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lam ston gyi/ nyan thos kyi lam mi ston to// nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi lam ston gyi/ byang
263a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lam gyi mi ston gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ston gyi/
263a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam ston gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis lam ston to// bdag tu
263a5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams dang / chos su 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams la/ bdag med pa'i lam dang chos su
263a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med pa'i lam ston gyi/ bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gso ba dang / skyes bu dang gang zag gi lam mi ston to// mtha' gnyis la/
