292a4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa/ thams cad thugs su chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs rtse ba'i thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i gnas chen po ste/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/
292a5(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi ston pa'o// snyam ste/ de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang bzhi des dga' ba dang dad pa rangs pa skyed do// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi ston pa btso
292a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das de yin pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par snyed do// bcom ldan 'das des bslab pa'i lam bcas pa de las kyang bdag gis phyir 'ang 'da' bar mi bya ste/ de
292a7(mdo sde): ltar na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de la rim gro dang rjes su 'brang bar byas par 'gyur/ de 'di snyam du bdag su'i bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod ces sems cing
292a8(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang / grong pa dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyi bsod snyoms la yongs su spyod kyis bdag gis ci nas kyang de dag
292b1(mdo sde): gi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod pa dang / don che ba dang mthu che ba dang / bdag gis kyang yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par yongs su spyod par de ltar bya'o//
292b2(mdo sde): snyam mo// de 'di snyam du bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang grong pa dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag 'du shes ci dang ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms gtong snyam zhing de 'di ltar rjes
292b3(mdo sde): su sems te// bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / yul gyi mi 'di dag ni bdag la dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang ldan te/ dge sbyong gi 'du shes dang
292b4(mdo sde): ldan sbyin gnas kyi 'du shes ldan zhing bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin par gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag gis yon tan yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par bya ba dang / dge slong
292b5(mdo sde): gi yon tan dang sbyin pa'i gnas kyis yon tan rnams yang dag par blangs te/ gnas par bya ba de ltar spyad par bya'o// de 'di skams du bdag gis thog ma dang tha med/
292b6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas skye bo'i 'khor ba las rgal bar gyur tam/ zhes sems shing / de 'di snyam du bdag gis dge slong gi tshul thob pa 'di ni brgal ba dang po'o// bdag dge/
292b7(mdo sde): slong gi yon tan dang ldan pa 'di ni rgal ba gnyis pa'o// bdag le lo med cing chos nyid thob pa'i phyir/ ci nas kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i skye ba'i 'khor bas las
292b8(mdo sde): rgal bar gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtsams te/ gnas par bya'o snyams tu sems te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar yongs su rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag shes pa
293a1(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang /
293a2(mdo sde): ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khengs pa dag la dma' ba rnams yin/ nga rgyal can dag la nga rgyal
293a3(mdo sde): med pa rnams yin/ gya gyu can dag la drang po rnams yin/ rdzun du smra ba la bden par smra ba rnams yin no/ kha mi mkhas pa la snyan par smra ba rnams yin/ rtsu ba pa
293a4(mdo sde): dag la 'jam par smra ba rnams yin/ khro ba bdag la bzod pa mang ba rnams yin/ gtum pa dag la byams pa'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ sdug bsngal bdag la
293a5(mdo sde): snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams yin/ ser sna can dag la bgo bsha' byed pa'i ngang tshul can rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
293a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'jig rten shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o//
293a7(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ skyon med pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang sra sre med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa rnams yin/ sems
293a8(mdo sde): can thams cad la sbyor ba mnyam pas sems snyoms pa rnams yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mi chung bas dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan pa rnams yin no// gos pa med pas
293b1(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang grags pa sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams yin/ nem nur med pa'i sems dang ldan pas dad pa rnams yin/ le
293b2(mdo sde): lo med pa dang ldan pas/ brtson 'grus brtsams rnams yin/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang ldan pas/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab 'tshal ba'i
293b3(mdo sde): rang bzhin can ma yin pas mang du thos pa rnams yin/ shes rab rno bas dbang po mi rtul ba rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pas byams pa'i bdag
293b4(mdo sde): nyid can rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci chos de dag tshogs pas skye bar 'gyur ram/
293b5(mdo sde): 'on te lam tshang ba yang skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu tshogs pa de dag las gang gis chos gcig cig skyon med cing ma 'dres pa
293b6(mdo sde): sra sre med cing yongs su byang bar yongs su rdzogs par gyur la rigs kyi bu de'i phyir chos de dag tshogs pas skye'o// ma tshogs pas ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po
293b7(mdo sde): de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
293b8(mdo sde): mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang / mchod rten zhig pa'i chos pa dang / de bzhin ga
294a1(mdo sde): pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug pa dbul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la 'khrus kyi spos chu dbul ba dang / de/
294a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang skyang nul bya ba dbul ba dang / pha ma la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang / mkhan po dang bslob dpon dag la lus kyis
294a3(mdo sde): rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed cing de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te/ zang zing dang bcas pas ma yin la/ dge ba
294a4(mdo sde): rtsa ba de yang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su sngo zhing / de yang bsam pa thag pa nas sems pa ste/
294a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyis dri mas ma gos par skye'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim
294a6(mdo sde): gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nye bar len pa med pa rnams yin/ 'du 'dzi med par spyod pa rnams yin/ yul la rgyab
294a7(mdo sde): kyis phyogs pa rnams yin/ yul sred pa dang bralnga rnams yin/ yul gyis nyes pas mi gos pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims bcas pa la
294a8(mdo sde): rim gro byed cing / brtson 'grus dang shin tu bslabs pa rnams yin/ gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha ngan ngon dang na ba'i gso sman dang yo byad ngan ngon gyis
294b1(mdo sde): chog shes pa rnams yin no// lhung bzed dang chos gos dang yo byad la sogs pa bral ba rnams yin/ rtag par 'jigs pa'i yid dang ldan zhing yul rnams las skyob rnam
294b2(mdo sde): yin/ dben pa la dga' zhing rtag sgom pa las brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyis gnas nas mngon/
294b3(mdo sde): par byung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshul
294b4(mdo sde): chos pa dang / kha gsag gi snyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ gzhog slong gyi rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ thos kyis 'jal ba'i snying po bral ba rnams yin/ mi
294b5(mdo sde): rig par btsal ba'i snyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin/ yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ rnyed pa
294b6(mdo sde): la zhen pa med pa rnams yin/ rnyed pa la chags pa med pa rnams yin/ yongs su yi chad pa'i rang bzhin med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi rnyed pas chog shes pa rnam
294b7(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul chos pa dang / khwa gsag gi brnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
294b8(mdo sde): rnyed pa rnyed pa'i phyir lus kyis tshul chos par mi byed/ ngag gis chos par mi byed/ sems kyis tshul chos par mi byed/ ci ltar na lus kyis tshul chos pa mi byed pa
295a1(mdo sde): ga rnams yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa bdag med pa dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po mthong bas spyod lam ma chos gang zhe na/ gcar/
295a2(mdo sde): shing gang tsam du lta ba dang / skyo bar lta ba dang / sgrib pa med par lta ba rnams goms pa bags kyis dal nas 'dor zhing gdogs pa yin te// de ltar na lus
295a3(mdo sde): kyis tshul chos par mi byed do// ci ltar na ngag gis tshul chos pa mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu dang rnyed pa'i phyir bcom bskyungs pa smra ba ma yin
295a4(mdo sde): 'jam por smra ba ma yin/ dga' bar smra ba ma yin/ rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa yin te/ de ltar na ngag gi tshul chos par mi byed do// ci ltar na sems kyis
295a5(mdo sde): tshul chos par mi byed ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pa bstabs na/ tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar ston cing /
295a6(mdo sde): sems kyi 'dod pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ tshigs gis 'dod pas chung ba la sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod pa de ni nang gi gdung ba yin te/ de ltar na sems
295a7(mdo sde): kyis tshul chos par mi byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul chos pa dang kha bsag rnyed pa dang bral yin no// ci ltar na gzhog pa slongs kyi rnyed pa dang / bral
295a8(mdo sde): ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa'am/ sbyin bdag mthong na bdag gos kyis phongs so snyams bu dag lhung bzed kyis phongs so// bdag na pa'i
295b1(mdo sde): gsos sman gyis phongs so zhes gzhog slongs mi byed cing / sbyin par byed pa 'am/ sbyin pa'i bdag po la mi slong zhing tshig du mi brjod pa/ de ltar na byang chub sems
295b2(mdo sde): dpa' gzhog spongs kyi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar na thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed po dang / bral ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed sbyin bdag
295b3(mdo sde): mthong na/ bdag sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/ de la gris kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byin te/ de la bdag gis kyang phan pa
295b4(mdo sde): chen po byas so// des kyang bdag kyang la 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan par rig pa mang du thos pa'o// 'dod pa chung ba'o// zhes 'di dang 'di byin no// bdag gis kyang
295b5(mdo sde): de la snying rje ba'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/ blangs so zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod kyis de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thos kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral bI
295b6(mdo sde): yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang / bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems ni/ lus la rma byung ba dang /
295b7(mdo sde): sems la rma byung bas rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin no// de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa'i rgyu dang rnyed pa'i phyir rgyug pa dang / kun tu rgyug pa dang / 'chal pa
295b8(mdo sde): rdul khrims la spyod pa'o// sems kyi zani 'di lta ste/ rnyed pa la smon pa dang tshangs par tshungs par spyod pa gzhin gyis rnyed pa dag li gnod sems mang ba ste/
296a1(mdo sde): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba rnyed pa dang ba yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i//
296a2(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu med pa dang / yid bstan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang / g.yos rnyed
296a3(mdo sde): par mi sgrub pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag
296a4(mdo sde): pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang mchod rten gyi 'dres pa 'am/ chos kyi dang 'dris pa 'am/ dge 'dun gyi dang 'dres pa
296a5(mdo sde): 'am/ ma byin par 'am/ ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed/ chags pa'i sems mi skyid de/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs
296a6(mdo sde): su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa ma yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang / bdag
296a7(mdo sde): gir mi byed nor bu mi rtsi tshigs su mi byed cing dus dus su dge slong dang / bram ze dang / pha ma dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / gnyen bshes dang / sdug gi gnyen
296a8(mdo sde): 'tshams dag la gtong zhing dus dus su bdag yongs su spyod pa la yongs su spyod pa'i tshe/ chags pa med pa dang / zhen pa med par yongs su spyod do// rnyed pa ma rnyed na
296b1(mdo sde): yang myo pa'i sems ma skyed cing yongs su mi 'chad de/ sbyin pa byed pa dang / sbyin bdag rnams las dad par mi 'dzin pa yin te/ da tshus dang 'thun pa rnyed pa dge 'dun/
296b2(mdo sde): gyi gtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pas sngags pa byang chub sems dpas ma smad pa/ lhas bcas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas mi dbye bas mchog shes pa yin ni/
296b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems mtsho ba yongs su dag pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi skyo ba rnams
296b4(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi rgyu dang sems can gyi phyir 'khor ba na gnas pas yongs su mi skye'o// sems can gyi rgyu dang sems can gyi phyir/
296b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis yongs su mi skyo'o// sems can gyis don rnams la yongs su mi skye'o// sems can gyi dgos pa rnams la yongs su mi skye'o// sems can
296b6(mdo sde): gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mi skyo'o// gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la lam ston pas yongs su mi skyo'o// de dag la ma dad par yang mi byed do// byang chub kyi phyog
296b7(mdo sde): kyi chos yongs su sdu bas kyang yongs su mi skyo'o// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang yongs su mi skyo'o// bsam pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur/
296b8(mdo sde): kyang mya ngan las 'dis pa la mngon du mi lha'i/ byang chub la gzhol byang chub la 'dab/ byang chub la bab pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldanan pa
297a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yid yongs su mi skyo ba rnams yin// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/
297a2(mdo sde): kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / bag yod par spyod pa rnams yin/ lus kyang shin tu
297a3(mdo sde): bsdams shing / lus kyi ngan du spyad pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ ngag gis shin tu bsdams shing / ngag gi nang du spyod pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ yid kyis shin tu bsngos
297a4(mdo sde): shing / yid kyi ngan du spyod pa mi spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'jigs shing / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par spangs pa rnams yin/ rigs par smra
297a5(mdo sde): zhing mi rigs pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ cho su smra zhing chos ma yin par mi spyod pa rnams yin/ smad pa'i lam rnam par spangs pa dge ba'i lam gyi rjes su
297a6(mdo sde): 'brang ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la sun min 'byin pas/ nyon mongs pa dri nga ba'i yul thams cad dang bral ba rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs
297a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos nyid yongs su sbyong zhing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las srung ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de
297a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan zhing khro gnyer med
297b1(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dbang po shin tu dang ba rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ dbang po gsal ba rnams yin/ dbang po/
297b2(mdo sde): dri ma med pa rnams yin/ dbang po yongs su byung ba rnams yin/ gnod sems dang bral ba rnams yin/ bag la nyal ba dang bral rnams yin/ kun nas ldang ba
297b3(mdo sde): dang bral ba rnams yin/ za ba dang mdud par 'dzin pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ khrod khro ba dang bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang
297b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa rnams yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnams par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
297b5(mdo sde): gsungs pa'i don ci lta bu lags pa dang bdag gis 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na bzhin 'dzum pa lags/ nyon mongs pa
297b6(mdo sde): rnams dang bral ba na khro gnyer ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
297b7(mdo sde): rnams dbang po yongs su dag pas na/ bzhin 'dzum pa yin/ nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na khro gnyer med pa yin/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems
297b8(mdo sde): dpa' mang du thos pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste// 'khor ba ni 'dod chags kyi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o// zhes yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes//
298a1(mdo sde): zhe sdang gi mes rab tu 'bar ba'o// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so// gti mug gis mes rab tu dkrugs pa'o//
298a2(mdo sde): zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so// 'dus byas ni mi bya'o zhes yang dag ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba'o zhes
298a3(mdo sde): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni stong pa'o// zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad ni bdag ni
298a4(mdo sde): bdag med pa'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so// 'jig rten ni spros pa la mngon par dga'o zhes yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// chos
298a5(mdo sde): thams cad ni rkyen las byung ba'o zhes yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o// zhes yang dag par ci lta bzhin du rab tu
298a6(mdo sde): shes so// de yang thos pa dang bsams pa bsgoms pas shes kyi sgrar brjod pas nam gyis ma yin te/ de ltar shes nas kyang snying rje ba'i sems bstan pa nye bar
298a7(mdo sde): bzhag ste/ sems can rnams kyi don du rtsol zhing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom mo// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos
298a8(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ phyi ma'i dus
298b1(mdo sde): phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnams par 'jig cing / bstan pa'i khrugs par gyur pa dang / sems can rnams lam ngan par zhugs pa dang / ye/
298b2(mdo sde): shes kyi sgron me mya ngan las 'das te/ ston pa med pa'i tshe mdo sde rgya chen po don che zhing / mthu che ba dam pa'i chos thams cad kyi ma mo dang 'dzin cing klog la/ kha
298b3(mdo sde): ton du byed cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan la brjod cing kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan yang brjod cing ston la yang dag par ston la gsal bar byed pa
298b4(mdo sde): dang / de la zhugs pa'i gang zag rnams la dga' ba dang dad pa dang / rangs pa dang / de dag la phan 'dogs pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis dam pa'i
298b5(mdo sde): chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bdud rtsi 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bcud kyis len du 'du
298b6(mdo sde): shes pa bskyed pa dang / rtsi'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang / lus dang srog la mi blta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba dang / btsal nas kyang nam tan gyis
298b7(mdo sde): bsgrub po// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan
298b8(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan gyi rgyan pa rnams yin/ lus dpe byad bzang po'i
299a1(mdo sde): me tog rgyas pa rnams yin/ dbang po rnams pa rnams pa thams cad kyis mchog dang ldan zhing shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams yin/ de/
299a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas shing rjes su rje sten pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la lam rjes su thob pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs
299a3(mdo sde): pas thugs su chud pa rnams yin/ 'jig rten sdug bsngal ba yongs su skyong ba rnams yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul khrims bslabs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa'i gnas
299a4(mdo sde): rnams shin du mthar phyin pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhugs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang na gnas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu
299a5(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis rgyal po'i sras rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang tshangs pa
299a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong pas bcu pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams yin/ bdud thams cad kyis mi sgul ba rnams yin/
299a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mi g.yo ba rnams yin// chos thams cad kyi tshul la zhugs pa rnams yin/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa
299a8(mdo sde): rnams yin/ mi skye ba'i chos sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ shin tu gtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang
299b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa rnaMs yin/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rnams
299b2(mdo sde): yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten pas bcu pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos
299b3(mdo sde): bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsams pa dang bag la nyal ba shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can 'dod chags kyi bsams
299b4(mdo sde): pa can yang dag parar+ya bzhin tu shes so// zhe sdang gi bsam pa can dang / gti mug gi bsam pa can dang / dman pa'i bsam pa can dang / bar ma'i bsam pa
299b5(mdo sde): can dang / zhan pa'i bsam pa can dang / dge ba'i bsam pa can dang / bstan pa'i bsam pa can dang / yun ring po'i bsam pa can dang / sems can gtum
299b6(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa can rnams yin/ yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / de yang sems gcig la ci ltar shes bzhin du/ sems can gyi khams
299b7(mdo sde): kun la yang yang dag par ci lta bzhin tu rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa bag la nyal ba shes pa
299b8(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga dang ldan pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
300a1(mdo sde): lta ste sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyis gzugs nye bar ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i
300a2(mdo sde): gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyis gzugs
300a3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ nyan thos kyi gzugs/ brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la brgya byin gyi gzugs/ bdud kyis
300a4(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la bdud kyi gzugs/ tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ tshangs pa'i gzugs/ bram zes 'dul
300a5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams la/ bram ze'i gzugs/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rgyal rigs kyi gzugs/ khyim
300a6(mdo sde): bdag gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ khyim bdag gis gzugs nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rnam pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams
300a7(mdo sde): 'dul bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de dang de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar ston to// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
300a8(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' des pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
300b1(mdo sde): drang ba rnams yin/ 'jam pa rnams yin/ gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ dri ma med pa'i
300b2(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ mi brlang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams yin/ rtsub pa spangs pa rnams yin/ bzod
300b3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ des pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' nges pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi/
300b4(mdo sde): bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lta ba yongs su dag pas lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnam
300b5(mdo sde): yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ cho ga yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims 'thun pa'i spyod yul du
300b6(mdo sde): spyod pa rnams yin/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ khong yangs pa rnams yin/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa rnams yin/ lam/
300b7(mdo sde): ci bskal pa la mnyam pa rnams yin/ lam cig tu zhugs pa rnams yin/ ston pa gzhan la med pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
300b8(mdo sde): dpa' 'grogs na bde ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/
301a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ phan pa'i sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud do// bde ba'i sbyin pa dang / mi zad pa'i sbyin pa dang / phan par smra ba dang /
301a2(mdo sde): don du smra ba dang / cho su smra ba dang rigs par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / zang zing gi don 'thun pa dang / mtsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pa'i yo byad kyis sems
301a3(mdo sde): can rnams sdud do// rigs kyi bu phan pa'i sbyin pa ni gang chos sbyin pa'o// bde ba'i sbyin pa ni gang zang zing sbyin pa'o// mi zad pa'i sbyin pa ni gang lam gyi sbyin pa'o// /
301a4(mdo sde): phan par smra ba'i sbyin pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bstobs pa'o// don du smra ba ni gang yang dag pa'i bstan pa'o// tshe su smra ba ni/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa/
301a5(mdo sde): dang 'thun par chos bstan pa'o// rigs par smra ba ni/ gang don yang dag par chud mi gson pa'o// don bya ba ni gang mi dge ba'i gnas su gzhog pa'o//
301a6(mdo sde): zang zing gi don 'thun pa ni/ gang bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / ldag pa dang / btung ba dang / gzhib pa dang gos la sogs pa thun mong du yongs su spyod pa'o//
301a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mtsho ba'i yo byad kyis don 'thun pa ni/ gang gser dang / nor dang / mu tig dang / bye du rgya dang / dung dang / me shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang /
301a8(mdo sde): dngul dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / gzhon pa thun mongs du spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'
301b1(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di
301b2(mdo sde): lta ste/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba rnams yin/ sprod lam yongs su dag pa rnams yin/ blta na dag pa rnams yin/ blta na 'jam pa rnams yin/ blta na
301b3(mdo sde): mchog mi shes pa rnams yin/ blta na yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad khong khro ba med par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems
301b4(mdo sde): can thams can sems tshim par 'gyur ba rnams yin/ blta na sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/ te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de
301b5(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tshul du shes pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba
301b6(mdo sde): rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dag las yongs su srung ba rnams yin te/ 'khor ba'i 'brog
301b7(mdo sde): dgon par song ba bsgrol ba rnams yin/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba rnams yin/ mgon med rnams la dpung gnyen du gyur pa rnams yin/ nyon
301b8(mdo sde): mongs pa'i nad kyis nang par gyur pa rnams la sman par gyur pa rnams yin te/ rten med pa dag la rten pa rnams yin/ gnas med pa dag la gnas pa rnams
302a1(mdo sde): yin/ skyabs med pa dag la skyabs rnams yin/ gling med pa dag la gling rnams yin/ dpung gnyen med pa dag la dpung gnyen
302a2(mdo sde): pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dag ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gnas bca' ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub
302a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rtsi'i rgyal po shing lta bu rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi'i rgyal po shing chen po lta na bzang ba be zhes bya ba de bzhin ni
302a4(mdo sde): rtsa bas kyang sems can nad pa rnams nye bar 'tsho'o// sdong po dang yal ga rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / mthong ba dang /
302a5(mdo sde): bsnabs dang / myangs pa dang / reg pas kyang / nye bar mtsho ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' yang sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste//
302a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyi nad par gyur pa'i sems can rnams sbyin pas kyang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / shes rab
302a7(mdo sde): dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / yon tan gyi ro myangs pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya bas kyang nye bar 'tsho'o// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub
302a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' dang ci'i rgyal po shing chen po lta bu rnams yino// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams bya ba las brtson pa rnams
302b1(mdo sde): yin no// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la ci nus pa bya ba byed pa dang / sems can nad pa rnams la rtsi sbyor ba dang / sems can bkres pa/
302b2(mdo sde): dang / skom pa nyen pa rnams la zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa dang / rlung dang lhag pa dang nyi mas nyen pa'i sems can rnams la dga' ba'i sbyin pa dang / mkhan po dang slob
302b3(mdo sde): dpon dang gus pa'i rim gro byed pa dang / tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par spyod pa rnams la gus par smra ba dang phyag 'tshal ldang / thal mo sbyar
302b4(mdo sde): nas zhing 'dud par byed pa dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsugs lag khang dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / dus dus su nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang pa dang / bran
302b5(mdo sde): pho dang bran mo dang / las mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba la bgo ba shas yongs su skyod pa dang / dus dus su tshul khrims dang / ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze la snyen
302b6(mdo sde): bkur rigasti bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams bya ba la brtson pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub ses
302b7(mdo sde): dpa' sbrul po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin
302b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams la yongs su 'dri'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig kyang mi g.yo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos nyon to//
303a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bsnyen bkur
303a2(mdo sde): byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyang zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
303a3(mdo sde): gcig nas kyang mi g.yo sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba rnams la rim gro byed/ bkur stir byed/ sti stang byed//
303a4(mdo sde): mchod pa byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig
303a5(mdo sde): nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas
303a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing du mar yang chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ro// sangs rgyas kyis zhing gcig nas mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo //
303a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar yang sems can 'dul ba ci rnyed pa la de rnyed kyi sprul pa la de rnyed kyi 'gyed kyang de dag sprul
303a8(mdo sde): pa 'gyed pa'i tshe/ rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das
303a9(mdo sde): ci ltar gang lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa 'gyed pa na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir nyon
303b1(mdo sde): cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba ni gling bzhir snang ba byed la sems can rnams ka la phan 'dogs pa yin kyang nyi ma dang zla ba ni bdag gis/
303b2(mdo sde): snang ba bya'o// bdag cag ni sems can la phan pa 'dogs pa'o// zhes mi rtogs pa rnam par mi rtogs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sngon gyi las rnam par smin pa mngon
303b3(mdo sde): par 'du byed pas/ zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyi bya ba de lta bu 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sprul pa 'gyed na/ mi rtog rnam par mi rtog
303b4(mdo sde): ste/ bsgrib pa'am/ mngon par 'du bya ba mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sngon gyi las rnam par smin pas mngon par 'du bya ba rnams mngon par grub pa'i phyir
303b5(mdo sde): te/ sngon byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de ci nas kyang rnam par rtog pa med par yang sprul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
303b6(mdo sde): lta de ltar smon lam btab pa de lta de ltar/ mngon par 'du byas pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa la mkha
303b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chad
303b8(mdo sde): rgya ba rnams yin no// bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa shin tu grub pas/ sbyin pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ tshul khrims shin tu sgrub cing /
304a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi phung po skyon med pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / sra sre med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das
304a2(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba dang ldan pas/ tshul khrims shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ bzod pa shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ brtson 'grus
304a3(mdo sde): shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / bsam gtan shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ shes rab shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ thabs shin tu phun sum
304a4(mdo sde): tshegs pa rnams yin/ smon lam shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang / stobs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ ye shes shin tu grub cing thun mong ma yin pa'i ye
304a5(mdo sde): shes nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las 'das pa/ sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yan chad nas sa dag pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
304a6(mdo sde): dpa'i bar gyi ye shes las 'das pa dang ldan pas/ ye shes shin tu rdzogs pa'i rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla
304a7(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
304a8(mdo sde): pe'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di pa rnam pa drug rab tu 'gul te/ rab tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag
304b1(mdo sde): gam/ ri btang bzung chen po dag gam/ 'khor yug gi 'am/ 'khor yug gi ri chen po dag gam/ de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i ri dang / rin po che chen po de dag thams cad dang /
304b2(mdo sde): yul ga ya ga la ba dang / ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba de logs su/ bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dgab par bya ba'i phyir 'dun par gyur to// gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po
304b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ngam/ spos kyi shing ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dga' bar bya ba'i
304b4(mdo sde): phyir/ ga ya mgo'i ri ga la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das la chos kyi dga' ba 'bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang /
304b5(mdo sde): na bza' dang rgyan gyi bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po ri rab tsam byas par gyur to// brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skong pa brgya stong du ma yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal
304b6(mdo sde): zhing / thal mo sbar ba byas te/ 'dud cing / bcom ldan 'das la me tog ma na dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dag mthor bar gyur to// lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang
304b7(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dkyilan gnas te/ gos g.yob cing ca co dang / gzha brgya stong byed par gyur te/ lha'i me tog gi bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// kye ma'o/
304b8(mdo sde): deng ni 'jig rten du sangs rgyas skyes par gyur te/ kye ma'o chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor to// sems can gang gis rnalam du rnam grangs 'di grags par gyur pa de
305a1(mdo sde): dag kyang bsod nams dang ldan zhing / dge ba'i las byed pa ste/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstsags pa/
305a2(mdo sde): yin no// gang 'di la dad pa snyed pa de dag lta smos kyang ci dgos shes de dang de dag ched du brjod pa brjod do// lto 'phye chen po brgya stong du ma yang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid
305a3(mdo sde): la chos kyi dga' ba bya ba'i phyir/ 'brug ltar sgra'u 'ur 'ur ru ru 'byin sgrog par byed/ shin tu sgrog par byed cing / spos kyi sprin sna tshogs mngon par sprul te/ stong gsum gyi
305a4(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / ga ya mgo'i ri la spos chu'i char mngon par 'bebs kyang sems can rnams la gnod pa mi snang ngo // klu'i bu me brgya stong yang bcom
305a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das spyan sngar klu ro'i sgra 'byin to// bram ze dang mi 'am ci brgya stong du ma yang snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis klu len cing / mgo'i ri dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
305a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams la skor ba byed do// gnod sbyin bye ba brgya stong du ma yang pad ma'i char mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang grong khyer gyi mi dang yul
305a7(mdo sde): gyi mi brgya stong du ma yang / me tog dang bdug spos dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis
305a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byed par 'gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma dag nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ chos kyi dgab par bya ba'i phyir/
305b1(mdo sde): so so'i sprin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu dag nas/ 'od zer mang po dag skye bar gyur te/ 'od zer de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs/ gzugs sna tshogs/ snang ba sna tshogs/ can
305b2(mdo sde): sha stag ste/ de 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb dag na dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog dang de dag stong gsum gyi
305b3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la skor ba byed cing / mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bar gyur te/ 'khor nas ga ya mgo'i ri la bskor ba byas nas/ bcom
305b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug du nub par gyur to// rlung yang bde bar langs par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / mchod pa mngon pa 'du bya ba 'di 'byung ba
305b5(mdo sde): che/ byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob po// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang chos rnams la chos
305b6(mdo sde): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kyang sngan chad ma bskyed pa las byang chub du sems bskyed par gyur/
305b7(mdo sde): to// de nas ga ya mgo'i ri la gnas pa'i lha mo 'chi ba zhes bya ba dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dus shing / 'dug de stan las
305b8(mdo sde): 'das na/ bdag gi gnas su song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mchod pa blangs nas phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas
306a1(mdo sde): btsun par byas/ sti bstad byas/ rim gror byas so// bkur sti dang / brdzun pa dang ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / sti bstang dang / rim 'gro byas
306a2(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan de dang dag la ga ya mgo'i ri 'di nyid du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas stong bra
306a3(mdo sde): bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ don 'di nyid dag dang / tshul 'di nyid dag dang / yi ge 'di dag gis/ bstan pa bdag gis mngon par dran no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
306a4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba de ltar khyod kyi dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur ba thob par bya ba legs par thob po// de nas 'khor der tshogs pa'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam
306a5(mdo sde): du sems par 'gyur to// lha mo 'dis de srid cig nas chos rnam grangs 'di thos nas de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas kyang / 'dis bud med kyi
306a6(mdo sde): lus las ma bsgyur snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyis rtog pa sems
306a7(mdo sde): kyis yongs su shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lha mo ma'i chi ba 'dis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
306a8(mdo sde): che ba thob la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed du mang zhing / bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ bud med kyi lus ma bsgyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'ad
306b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can gyi don ni rgyu'o// sems can gyi don ni rkyen no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba ni/ rnam par thar pa/
306b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi bas gang yang dag par len du bcud pa dang / gzeng stod pa dang / byang chub du
306b3(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas te/ bgrang ba las 'das pa gang zhig ngas mngon par shes te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na lha mo mi 'chi ba
306b4(mdo sde): ni rdzu 'phral che mthu che ba ste/ rigs kyi bu lha mo mi 'chi ba 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i/ sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur bas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid du
306b5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang mi 'chi ba zhes/ bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
306b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo mi 'chi ba bka' stsal pa/ mi 'chi ba khyod kyis rang gi sangs rgyas zhing ston cig/ de nas
306b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lha mo me'ichi ba gzugs thams cad yongs su ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ lha mo mi 'chi ba gzugs thams cad
306b8(mdo sde): yongs su ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ad lag 'thil lta bur mnyam pa/ bai dUr+ya'i
307a1(mdo sde): bzhir snang bar gyur te/ ri nag po med cing tha mal ba med la/ gnas nas dag na yang dpag bsam gyi shing sha stag snang bar gyur to// gnas
307a2(mdo sde): gnas dag na dmig dang 'tshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i/ chus yongs su gang ba dag snang bar gyur to// mi phal ba med par snang bar
307a3(mdo sde): gyur to// de na bud med kyi sgra yang mi grags par gyur to// gnas dang gnas dag na pad ma shing rta'i 'phangs lo tsam dag snang bar gyur te/ pad ma de dag la byang
307a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i gzugs dkyil mo krung du khod pa de dag snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
307a5(mdo sde): rgyas mi 'chi ba de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par snang te brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs
307a6(mdo sde): su skor cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dus mas mdun gyis bltas te/ 'di ltar chos nyid khong nas brtsams nas chos ston par snang ba/
307a7(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas lha mo mi 'chi ba yang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas/
307a8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
307b1(mdo sde): gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ kha ton bgyid dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
307b2(mdo sde): par ston par bgyis na/ de bsod nams ci tsam cig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis//
307b3(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams la sbyin pa lhag par byin te/ de ltar sbyin pas bskal pa brgya stong mang por byin
307b4(mdo sde): pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi mo// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te legs par zhus te/ sems dad pas sems dad pa la byin na/ de bas
307b5(mdo sde): kyang 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni phran tshegs te/ chos kyi sbyin pa ni rdzu 'phrul che'o// de ci'i zhe na/ rigs
307b6(mdo sde): kyi bu 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyis/ zang zing gi sbyin pa rnam pa da mar myong / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis ro ni nam yang ma myong ste/
307b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa ni ma yin no// rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi
307b8(mdo sde): lam rnams dkod pas gang gis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam 'chang ngam klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston na/ de
308a1(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ rig kyi
308a2(mdo sde): bas 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams ni 'di las byung ngo // rigs kyi bu gang la la
308a3(mdo sde): zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba
308a4(mdo sde): dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis 'bras bu la bkod pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan tam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed
308a5(mdo sde): dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston na de bas 'di bsod nams mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos nyid 'di la rten na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
308a6(mdo sde): rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid 'di las rten na ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// chos nyid 'di la rten ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam
308a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ba dang / klags pa dang / spel ba dang / kha ton byas pas mdo sde thams cad
308a8(mdo sde): bzung ba dang / blags pa dang / spel ba dang / kha ton byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi ma mo ste/ rigs kyi bu chos
308a9(mdo sde): nyid 'di ma thob par chos nyid rgya chen po thob par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus nyan
308b1(mdo sde): thos chen po de dag thams cad stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la brtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
308b2(mdo sde): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang kyi rnam grangs 'thob pas skye ba'i 'khor
308b3(mdo sde): ba chen po bas par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to// ci skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas yang
308b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sa phyogs gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang / ston pa'i sa phyogs de
308b5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying por bzung bar bya'o// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor pas bzung bar bya'o// mchod rten chen por gzung bar bya'o// bdag cig ston pa gnas
308b6(mdo sde): 'di na bzhugs par bzung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid ni byang chub po// chos nyid ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'o// rigs
308b7(mdo sde): kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/ rigs kyi bu dag chos la mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang na chos
308b8(mdo sde): smra ba de gnas pa'i gnas de la yang mcho de rten du 'du shes skyed par bya ste/ chos smra ba de la yang bla mar 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen du/
309a1(mdo sde): hA 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// lam ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// chos smra ba de mthong dga' ba dang dag pa dang rangs pa
309a2(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o// rim gro byas te bstan la bdar bar bya'o// chos smra ba de'i sngags brjod par bya'o// legs so zhes brjod par mang bar bya'o// rigs
309a3(mdo sde): kyi bu dag ngas skal ba 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos smra ba'i 'di'i sngags pa brjod kyang phan par byas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
309a4(mdo sde): bu dag 'di lta ste/ bkur stir bya ba dang / bsngags pa brjod pa ni/ gyi na chung zad du zad do// rigs kyi bu dag gal te/ chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu
309a5(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis chos smra ba de 'ong ba'i lam rang gis khrag gis chag chag byas kyang / chos smra ba de la phan pa cung zad kyang byas pa medado//
309a6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bzung ba 'di ni dka' ba'o// rigs kyi bu dag chos smra ba des
309a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / stan pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i tshe/ 'jigs pa med par bya'o// ma zhum pa dang / sbam gong ba dang / zhe ma 'gras
309a8(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / gang btsang ma bgos te dad pa skyes par bya'o// bdag gi bsngags pa brjod kyang mi snyems pa dang / nga rgyal du mi gzung bar byas te/ bdag mi stod
309b1(mdo sde): gzhan mi smod cing des zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ri mor byas te/ bstan par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gso
309b2(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das dog sa'i phyogs gang du/ chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa'am bstan par 'gyur ba'i phyogs der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / chos
309b3(mdo sde): smra ba de la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas te/ mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka legs so legs
309b4(mdo sde): so// khyod kyis de ltar gyis shig/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis legs par chos nyid yongs su bsrung bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
309b5(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
309b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs dkon mchog sprin ces bya bar zung shig/ yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi le'u zhes bya bar
309b7(mdo sde): zung shig/ ye shes sgron ma zhes bya bar zung shig/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
309b8(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin
310a1(mdo sde): dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu la sogs pa lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag/
310a2(mdo sde): dang de ma yin pa gzhan lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong dag yid rangs
310a3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
310a4(mdo sde): rdzogs s+ho/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he be ro tsan rag k+ki ta dang / d+harma ta shi las zhus te/ gtan la phab pa skad gsar chad kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/
310a5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ma hA ya no pa te sha nA ma ma hA yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
310a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khag de bzhin
310a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyod de'i spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyis tshogs bsags pa/ spyod pa
310b1(mdo sde): chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas bstan pa mtha' yas pa/ de/
310b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs pa/ chags pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ dga' ba chen po bskyed pa dran pa dang / blo gros
310b3(mdo sde): dang / rtogs pas 'jug pa kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par dpyad pa do le la chags par rtogs pas 'jug pa/ bskal pa mu med par mngon par bstod
310b4(mdo sde): pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin du mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/
310b5(mdo sde): chos kyi 'khor shin tu bskor/ slob ma shin du dul ba'i thabs ni mtha' yas/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni bsnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i
310b6(mdo sde): 'tshams sbyor ba kun tu 'dzom pa la mkhas/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhan gyis grub pa ni/ rgyan ma chad cing / dge slong 'bum phrag drug bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen
310b7(mdo sde): bo dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad gnyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes
310b8(mdo sde): rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ khur bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang
311a1(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bag
311a2(mdo sde): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kun tu bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ mi dmigs pa
311a3(mdo sde): chos las byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa/ phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu bzhugs pa sha sta go/
311a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med gzhal du med//
311a5(mdo sde): dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/
311a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed pas/ nges par 'byung ba chos mnyan cing / dag par gnod pas ngoms mi shes pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par
311a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la mngon par brtson pa/ thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu bson pa'i sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la
311a8(mdo sde): rab tu gnas pa/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang / spros pa thams cad las shin du 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la/ 'di lta ste/
311b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros lha zhes bya ba dang / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rnam par gnon pa/
311b2(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / yid gnyis kun tu 'jom dang / rnam par bsgrags ldan dang / rnam par lta ba'i mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po mun pa'i phung po dang bral ba
311b3(mdo sde): zhes dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ dpag
311b4(mdo sde): tu med/ brjod du med pa dang / thabs gcig ste/ des na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par nges par byang ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i
311b5(mdo sde): sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmigs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo// stobs dang mi 'jigs pa yongs su grub
311b6(mdo sde): pa/ ye shes kyi 'byung gnas/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo la 'jug pa/ so so yang dag par rigs pa la sem par nges
311b7(mdo sde): pa'i sgo la 'jug par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ khong du chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo// mi skye ba'i chos ston/ theg pa gcig tu yang dag
311b8(mdo sde): par 'dug/ chos kyi dbyings tshul+la ste/ 'dres pa med pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa/ snying po dang
312a1(mdo sde): ldan pa/ chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thos cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul
312a2(mdo sde): la 'jug pa/ khong du chud pa/ nyon mongs pa dang lta bar song ba thams cad 'dul ba/ shes rab dang ye shes thogs pa med pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/ mnyam pa
312a3(mdo sde): med mtha' yas pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs kyi ye shes ston/ pa/ sangs rgyas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'i rjes su 'jug pa/ sangs
312a4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ byin gyis rlabs thogs pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa/ chos thams cad ji lta bzhin du rnam par gdon mi za ba ston pa/ mi
312a5(mdo sde): rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa nyid du 'jug pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ zam mo khong du chud pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad sogs pa/ sad
312a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / shes rab mi zad pa/ mngon par
312a7(mdo sde): sgrubs pa nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ lus dang sems
312a8(mdo sde): rab tu dben par shes pa/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba/ 'thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan
312b1(mdo sde): brjod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la dbang ba'i tshul la 'jug pa brjod do// ston to// rab tu ston to// 'dzin du 'jug go// mos par mdzad do// len du 'jug/
312b2(mdo sde): shes par mdzad do// rnam par shes par mdzad do// rab tu shes par mdzad do// rnam par grol to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par rab
312b3(mdo sde): tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i don gyi rnam grangs 'don gyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa na/
312b4(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du bu mo ri chen zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ lag pa g.yas par mu tig gi sen mo do thogs nas/ btso
312b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can chen po 'di dag gis bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam
312b6(mdo sde): grangs 'das pa'i le'u 'di bas par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / phyogs bcu rnams su yang rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa
312b7(mdo sde): rnams bla na med pa'i chos dkon mchog gis mthar gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig
312b8(mdo sde): des/ bdag gis mu tig gi se mo do 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul ba lags te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
313a1(mdo sde): kyi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su mu tig gi se mo de'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas shing bkod pa ci 'dra bas/ skyes bu dam pa
313a2(mdo sde): de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra bar 'gyur bar de 'dra ba dag khang pa rtsegs
313a3(mdo sde): pa de dag las kun tu dga' zhing / 'khor thams cad kyis bkod pa 'di mthong nas/ yid rangs par gyur cig de nas bu mo rin gyis mu tig gi se mo do de/
313a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la ba de logs su bor ro// mu tig gi se mo de de/ bor ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / bu mo rin chen gyi bden pa'i byin gyis
313a5(mdo sde): rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsugs gi mtshams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbu'i spyi gtsugs gi mtshams su khang pa brtsegs
313a6(mdo sde): pa chen po shin tu yangs pa/ rgya che ba/ rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ des mnyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba legs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'
313a7(mdo sde): de dag sngon bdag cag gi/ sangs rgyas zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi snying po 'di 'dra bar cig ces smon lam btab pa'i khyad
313a8(mdo sde): par ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bkod pa dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis khang pa rtsegs pa de dag las mthong ngo mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar tu gyur nas/
313b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ji tsam du bdag cag gis bskal pa grangs ma mchis par smon lam mngon par
313b2(mdo sde): 'dus bgyis pa de thams cad bu mo rin chen gyis skad gcig la bstan pa ni bu mo rin chen 'di bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi stobs can legs te/ ngo mtshar
313b3(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// skyes bu dam pa dag ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ bu mo rin chen gyi bden pa'i byin gyis rlab
313b4(mdo sde): las nges par byung ba'o// skyes bu dam pa dag bu mo rin chen gyis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun na/
313b5(mdo sde): bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di yongs su blangs te/ de nas bu mo rin chena'adis ji skad smras pa de ltar kun tu gnas so// gal te bu mo rin chen gyis
313b6(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gis/ rab tu gang bar kun gnas par gyur cig ces smra na yang de
313b7(mdo sde): bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos gyis rab tu gang bar kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de
313b8(mdo sde): de bzhin du 'gyur ro// gal te bar snang 'di thams cad gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin
314a1(mdo sde): du 'gyur ro// chus 'jig pa 'byung ba la me'i 'jig par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// gal te me'i
314a2(mdo sde): 'jig pa 'byung ba la chu'i 'jig par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di los sgyur ba'i kha dog dang / gzug
314a3(mdo sde): su gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog dang / gzugs dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i
314a4(mdo sde): kha dog dang / gzugs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i kha dog dang / gzugs su gyur cig ce na yang / de de bzhin du
314a5(mdo sde): 'gyur to// gal te bdad re re yang lag na mtshon thogs pa'i bdud kyi bde bye ba phrag brgya lhag pa la/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris thams cad kyi ral gri dang mdang thu
314a6(mdo sde): dang mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i mu tig se mo dor kun tu gnas pa dang / snga ma'i
314a7(mdo sde): me tog dang / ud pa la dang / pa ri sha ka dang / tsam ba ka'i lda ldir kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du gyur ro// gal te 'brog dgon par bza'
314a8(mdo sde): ba dang btung ba dang / kha zas med pa dag tu khyim bye ba phrag khrig bco brgyad pa'i grong khyer chen po kun tu gnas shing / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / kha zas mang
314b1(mdo sde): po 'byung bar gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gang gzugs su snang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
314b2(mdo sde): gzugs su kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du gyur ro// 'khor 'di thams cad nam mkha' la gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin tu 'gyur ro//
314b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag gal te bu mo rin chen gyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston par 'jug
314b4(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa de bar chad med cing mtha' dag rdzogs par/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par byung bar gyur cig ce na yang de bzhin du 'byung ste/ gang bu mo rin
314b5(mdo sde): chen bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di kun bstan nas/ bu mos bcom
314b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rin chen 'byung gnas ye shes rgya mtsho mnga'/ rin chen mchog ston yon
314b7(mdo sde): tan mtha' yas pa/ rgyal po'i rgyal po dgra dang shar gnyeng gcod/ byang chub ldag rin chen nor bdun sbyin/ rin chen 'od ni mtha' yas pa/ nor bu rin chen rnam pa sna tshog
314b8(mdo sde): 'od/ rin chen dam pa yon tan rin chen tog/ bde gshegs khyod la rin chen rnams kyis mchod/ rdo rje snying pos snying po nor bu gang / snang
314b9(mdo sde): kyi lo'i de cung zad kyang don med pas yin no// de nas bu mo rin chen gyis
315a1(mdo sde): 'od dri med snying po nor bu dang / rin mo che dang nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/ khyod kyi sku'i 'od kyi zil bu drag/ thub pa khyed kyi sku chad brtag par ni gas bcu
315a2(mdo sde): bar la gnas pas mi dmigs so// 'jig rten rtso khyod sa la bzhugs kyang go/ rdzu 'phrul yon tan srid pa'i rtser gnas mthong // rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams thams cad res kyang //
315a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba rang rang mdun na bzhugs par shes// thams cad phyogs nas mngon par yang / kun nas sgo nas mtshungs par med pa mthong // la las zhugs dang mnal dang chags
315a4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'khor rnams la las bde gshegs bsrung ba dang / mi bsrung bzhugs shing bsam gtan dgyes pa dang // mtshungs med khyod kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mthong /
315a5(mdo sde): khyod kyi ba spu re re nas 'od zer mchog/ btang ma thag tu phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas// rgyal ba'i sku ni pad ma 'byung gnas 'dra// bsam po ji bzhin yid kyang dga' ba
315a6(mdo sde): mdzad// bden la gnas shing rtag tu bden la dgyes// bden pa lhur mdzad ni gsung de bzhin mdzad// chos kyi 'byung gnas don dang 'dul la mkhas// yon tan kun
315a7(mdo sde): mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bu mo rin chen gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis/ mngon par bstod nas/ bcom
315a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te/ zhus nas zhus pa lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang
315b1(mdo sde): na/ bdag 'dus pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ dga' 'chid kyi rgyud 'ga' zhig brtsams te zha'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo khyod de
315b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas
315b3(mdo sde): skabs phye ba dang / bu mo rin chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba lags/
315b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bden par gsungs pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba rnams
315b5(mdo sde): lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams don du gsungs pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'del ba smra ba
315b6(mdo sde): rnams lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'dul bar gsungs pa ni gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la
315b7(mdo sde): legs so// zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bu mo legs so legs so// khyod kyi rtog pa bzang po// dri ba tshul bzhin yin no// spobs pa dge'o// bu mo de bas na legs par
315b8(mdo sde): shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bu mo rin chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan gyi ltar mnyan pa dang /
316a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo gsum po 'di dag ni/ byang chub da pa'i bden pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ gang /
316a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la mi slu ba dang / bdag mi slu ba dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu'o// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad
316a3(mdo sde): la slu ba ji lta bu zhe na/ bu mo gal te byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dod
316a4(mdo sde): par byed cing smon te/ mngon par dga' ba de lta bu ni bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad la mi slu ba'o// bu mo byang chub sems
316a5(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas dang bdag dang / sems can thams cad la mi smra ba ji lta bu zhe na/ bu mo gang gi tshe byang chub sems bskyed nas/ bdud dang dmigs pa can thams cad
316a6(mdo sde): kyis ji tsam du tshegs phyung zhing / ji tsam du gnod par byas pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mtho btsams shing / co bris te 'bral bar
316a7(mdo sde): byed cing / ral gri dang gdung zung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pas phug pa dang / ma thob pa dang / ma grags pa dang / smad pa dang sdug bsngal bas kyang mi g.yo// mi 'khrul rnam
316a8(mdo sde): par mi 'khrul mi zhum/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ mi skrag/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu mi skrag par mi 'gyur/ yi mug par mi 'gyur/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar thog ma'i lhag
316b1(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa de yang mi gtong zhing brtan por yang dag par 'dzin la/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par 'phags/
316b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang mgon dang dpung gzhin gyi sems bskyed pa dang / mtshungs pa med cing 'dra ba med pa'i sems bskyed pa de la/
316b3(mdo sde): kyang nyams mi nus te/ theg pa gzhan las 'dod pa'i sems lan 'ga' yang mi bskyed par sangs rgyas dran/ chos kyi 'khor la rton/ sems can thams cad la mngon du byed
316b4(mdo sde): stobs nye bar ston/ mthu skyed par byed/ rtsal gyis rnam par gnon/ brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu tshig gis gnod par mi nus pa de lta bu ni/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'
316b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad li mi sla ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / bdag dang sems can thams cad la mi sla ba gang yin pa
316b6(mdo sde): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'i mchog go/ de rnams pa zhes sangs rgyas la mi smra ste/ brtan pa dang / mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus rtul ba'o//
316b7(mdo sde): de rnam pa bzhis bdag mi smra ste/ bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / sgyu med pa'o// de rnam pa zhes sems can thams cad mi spu sbyor/
316b8(mdo sde): sbyor ba dang / byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ sdud pa dang / bu mo gang 'dadi dag bsdams pa dang / ngag sung ba dang/ ngag 'phrul ba med pa dang / tshig bden pa ste/ de bcas
317a1(mdo sde): pu yang rung / skye bo mang po'i nang du gnas kyang rung / tshig bden pa bar smra ste/ de rgyal srid kyi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig mi smra/ stong gsum gyi stong
317a2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches bka' bas/ brid kyang brdzun gyi tshig mi smra'o// bu mo de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni rnam pa gsum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs
317a3(mdo sde): su dag pa ste/ rnam pa gsum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha shes pa'i rnam pa dang / yon tan gyi rnam pa dang / khril yod pa'i rnam pa dang / bcos ma ma yin pa/
317a4(mdo sde): rnam pa dang / ma smad pa'i rnam pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa dang / g+has pa rig pa'i rnam pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / ngan 'gro bcod pa'i rnam pa dang /
317a5(mdo sde): bde 'gro 'byed pa'i rnam pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa la mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / mkhas pas mchod par 'os pa'i rnam pa dang / nang dag pa'i rnam pa dang / phyi
317a6(mdo sde): dag pa'i rnam pa dang / phyi rol legs par byas pa'i rnam pa dang / gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang / blang bar 'os pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa dang / tshig mi bslang ba'i rnam pa
317a7(mdo sde): dang 'jam pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang / khyad par can gyi rnam pa dang / kha rab tu dri zhim pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang / bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang / slu ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /
317a8(mdo sde): gdung ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / kha na ma tho ba rnam pa
317a9(mdo sde): gzhan sa nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang
317b1(mdo sde): dang / sbyin pa'i gnas kyi sa'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas la nye bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang / bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i dag rab tu 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/ bu mo 'di dag ni/
317b2(mdo sde): bden pa'i rnam pa yongs su dag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang
317b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sbyin par la mos pa dag gi yin gyi/ ser sna can dag gi ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar kun tu/
317b4(mdo sde): snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'i byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dag gis yin gyi/ ngang tshul ngan pa dag gis ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dag bcas
317b5(mdo sde): pa'o// gang tshul khrims yongs su dag par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i stobs rab tu thob pa dag gi yin gyi/ gnod sems
317b6(mdo sde): can dag gi ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang bzod pa dang nges par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag
317b7(mdo sde): yin gyi/ le lo can dag gi ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bcom par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// byang chub ni byang chub
317b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' bsam gtan rab tu gnas bdag gi yin gyi/ sems g.yeng ba dag gi ma yin te/ de 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag
318a1(mdo sde): par sgrub par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa dag gi yin gyi/ shes rab 'tshal ba/
318a2(mdo sde): ngag gi ma yin gyi/ 'di ni 'di'i dam bcas pa'o// gang shes rab dang ye shes kun tu sbyor ba de ni bden pa'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi tshogs kyi chos thams
318a3(mdo sde): cad dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / tshangs pa'i gnas dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rigs pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la yang de bzhin no// byang chub ni
318a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dag gi yin gyi/ dge ba'i chos rnam par spangs pa dag gi ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o// gang dge ba'i
318a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang 'phags pa'i rnam pa'i bden pa de la byang chub sems dpas brtson par bya ste/ gang 'di sdug bsngan
318a6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spong ba dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam sgom pa'o// de la sdug bsngal shes pa ni gang phung po rnams la dang bzhin gyis mi skye bar shes
318a7(mdo sde): pa'o// kun 'byung ba spang ba ni srid pa gang gis/ phung po rnams yang dag par 'gyur ba'i srid pa de shin tu mi 'byung zhing chags pa dang bral ba mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/
318a8(mdo sde): gang mngon par dga' ba med pa de ni gdod ma nas 'ong ba med pa'o// gang 'dod ma nas 'ong ba med pa de ni chos nyid ma spangs pa'o// gang chos nyid ma spangs pa de ni kun 'byung
318b1(mdo sde): ba spang ba'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa ni gang mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa shin tu zad cing 'gag pa ste/ gang 'gag pa'i tshe dngos po 'jig par 'gyur ba yang med la/
318b2(mdo sde): dngos po yod pa dang dngos po med mtshungs shing / mnyam par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad la gang mnyam par mthong ba ni/ 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// de la lam ni gang
318b3(mdo sde): mnyam par lta zhing mnyam par sbyor ba/ mi rtog pa mi mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad mi tshor ba/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/
318b4(mdo sde): len pa med pa/ ma byas pa/ rnam par ma byas pa/ 'di ni lam zhes bya'o// 'di la gang bden pa shes pa'i ye shes dang / sems can rnams yang dag par thob par byed
318b5(mdo sde): kyang / bdag mngon gsum du mi byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa zhes pa'o// bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khris bden pa
318b6(mdo sde): shes pa yongs su bzod pa rab tu thob po// bu mo de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin zhe na/ gang gi tshe chos la rtog par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba dang / chos
318b7(mdo sde): bsam dang / chos spyod yul ba dang / chos spyod pa dang / chos don tu gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos la dga' bas dga' ba mos pa dang / chos kyi dpung dang / chos
318b8(mdo sde): kyi rtog pa dang / chos kyi mtshon cha dang / chos kyi go cha bgos pa dang / chos kyi yan lag bgos pa dang / chos kyi snang ba dang / chos kyi mar me dang / chos kyi dran pa dang / chos
319a1(mdo sde): kyi blo gros dang / chos rtogs pa dang / chos brjod pa dang / chos la sbyor ba dang / chos spyod par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyis nyal ba dang /
319a2(mdo sde): chos kyi spyod lam dang / chos srung ba dang / chos kyi nor dang / chos kyi mi zad pa dang / chos rgya che ba dang / chos kyi bya ba byed pa dang / chos kyi lus dang / chos kyi ngal
319a3(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi yid la byed pa mi gtong ba ste/ chos spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de ni smra ba yin te/ chos ma yin pa smra ba ma yin no// de la chos smra ba gang zhe na/
319a4(mdo sde): bden pa gang yin pa de bden par smra ba dang / sangs rgyas la bsngags pa smra ba dang / chos srung bar smra ba dang / dge 'dun la bla ma dang / sri zhu bya bar smra ba dang /
319a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ba bsnyad pa smra ba dang / bsam pa mi 'dor smra ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la dmigs pa smra ba dang / sbyor ba ma mnyam par smra ba
319a6(mdo sde): dang / 'phags pa rnams kyis lto ba smra ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen pa smra ba dang / nga rgyal med par gus pa dang / ri mo bya ba smra ba dang / rtag tu
319a7(mdo sde): bsngags pa smra ba dang / chos mnyan pa na sti bstang du byas te/ mnyan par smra ba dang / chos kun tu tshol bas mi ngoms pa smra ba dang / chos ston pa la snyoms lus med
319a8(mdo sde): par smra dang / slob dpon chos 'chab pa med pa smra ba dang / byas pa bzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa chud mi gson pa dang / lan la mi re smra ba dang /
319b1(mdo sde): dgon pa la skrag pa med pa smra ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs ma nyams par smra ba dang / spungs pa'i yon tan gyi stong pa smra ba dang dge ba bcu'i las la 'jug pa
319b2(mdo sde): smra ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba smra ba dang / tshul khrims kyi de bya ba smra ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs smra ba dang / brtson
319b3(mdo sde): 'grus kyi zhum pa med smra ba dang / bsam gtan rnams kyi rab tu zhi ba smra ba dang / shes rab kyi khong du chud pa smra ba dang / thabs kyi yongs su gsal bar byed pa
319b4(mdo sde): smra ba dang / byams pa'i skyabs smra ba dang / snying rje khaM 'jug pa smra ba dang / dga' ba'i mchog tu dga' ba smra ba dang / btang snyoms kyi gnyis dang bral ba smra ba
319b5(mdo sde): dang / bden pa rnams kyi rjes su 'thun pa smra ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bstan par smra ba dang / mngon par shes pa bskyed pa smra ba dang / rton pa rnam
319b6(mdo sde): kyi chos smra ba dang / chos kyi mdo rnams kyi khong du chud pa smra ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi dran pa mi brjod pa smra ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
319b7(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i nan tan smra ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mngon par bstod pa smra ba dang / dbang po rnams kyi rno ba smra ba dang / stobs rnams kyi mi rtsi ba smra ba dang /
319b8(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rjes su rtogs pa smra ba dang / lam gyi sgrol ba smra ba dang / zhi gnas kyi 'jug pa smra ba dang / lhag mthong gi de kho na shes pa smra ba dang
320a1(mdo sde): rig pa dang rnam par grol ba yongs su gsal bar byed pa smra ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sa ji lta ba smra ba dang / rang sangs rgyas
320a2(mdo sde): kyi theg pa ston pa smra ba dang / theg pa chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su sgrags pa smra ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun pa smra ba dang /
320a3(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang skrag pa med pa smra ba dang / skye mched rnams kyis rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid smra ba dang / nor bdun smra ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug smra ba dang / gus
320a4(mdo sde): pa dang bcas pa smra ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba drug smra ba dang / mngon par shes pa drug smra ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug smra ba dang / mig lnga smra ba dang /
320a5(mdo sde): don dam pa smra ba dang / kun rdzob la 'jug pa smra ba dang / legs par byas pa'i las smra ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par smra ba dang / sangs
320a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yon tan dang / bsngags pa tshad med pa smra ba'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba ni/ bdag tu smra ba ma yin/ seMs
320a7(mdo sde): can du smra ba ma yin/ srog tu smra ba ma yin/ gang zag tu smra ba ma yin/ tshang bar smra ba ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba smra ba ma yin/ 'jig par lta ba sdu ba ma yin/
320a8(mdo sde): mtha' khas len pa ma yin/ dbus la mngon par zhen pa ma yin/ mi mthun pa smra ba ma yin/ 'gal ba smra ba ma yin/ rtsod pa smra ba ma yin/ phyogs yongs su
320b1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa smra ba ma yin/ dmigs pa smra ba ma yin/ lta ba kun nas bkris pa dang / the tshom dang / sgrib dang / chod pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khong khro ba
